story:
The first Gaming Baseball have been shipped and Season 1 is live on the 29th of September. Order your gaming baseball today and we receive it in the beginning of October.

“like an arcade game, the most fun I have had playing catch” 

- Alex Guilford coach and former pitcher

Get your Gaming Baseball today and join the world's first connected baseball league

 

The Gaming Baseball & the Backyard League App create engaging games for guaranteed fun playing catch with friends and family. The ball measures and detects your actions, giving you an arcade game feel with live commentary and sound effects.

"This ball feels like a baseball"

"It's precise and gives a great throwing experience!"

It is not about the tech, but we packed a lot of cool features into our regulation sized and weighted Gaming Baseball. The Patent Pending Gaming Baseball is based on tested and proven technology developed over the last 5 years, with 1000's of users and 15 million throws

Why players and coaches love the Backyard League

As one of the first teams in the world, the Bad News Bears from Tamiami Youth Baseball Association got a chance to try out Backyard League. They all agreed it was amazing. The gaming baseball can be a supplement to other training equipment, and is especially great at throw and catch exercises as it makes the players focus at high intensity. "Getting the chance to compete with players from around the world is great, as the boys love competition,” agrees coach Cueto.

The gaming baseball can be a supplement to other training equipment, and is especially great at throw and catch exercises as it makes the players focus at with high intensity. "Getting the chance to compete with players from around the world is great, as the boys love competition". 

Backyard League is developed in collaboration with the Norwegian Softball and Baseball Association. We have a shared mission to ensure more kids play ball and keep playing for longer. 

Season ONE has 6 games inspired by core fielding skills. Improve your throws and catches, accuracy and consistency, transfer time, and more. Playing the games also increases focus, concentration and gets your competitive juices flowing. Every round is a match-like experience as you compete to beat your own best or your opponents score.

A closer look at Bullseye and the in-game screen that spectators can follow while you play. Brings the thrill of target shooting to a game catch.

Paal and Eivind gives an intro to Fast Throw the high speed game of catch. Here you can also see how the live game commentary and the audience view on the screen looks. Every game is mapped against the score you are trying to beat, throw for throw.

LEAGUE MODE

Play the 6 games to unlock LEAGUE MODE. There is always a challenge waiting for you. With one click, you join real players from around the world.

LIVE VIEW

In every game you play against an existing score, your own best, or an opponent. The live commentary lets you know how you are doing. For those not playing, they can follow your performance live and cheer you on as you battle for the lead.

FINAL SCORE AND STATISTICS

When the final buzzer sounds you get your results, win or lose.  You can check out the detailed stats of your game, vs the score you were trying to beat. A great way to learn and see where you can improve your next game. In league matches you also get league points based on your performance, can you get a 3 star win?

ALWAYS ON

Backyard League brings players from all over the world together. There is always someone playing out there and there is always a match waiting. The notifications are designed to motivate players to get their gloves on and get out playing ball.

HOME SCREEN

Every time you open Backyard League you enter your home screen. From here you have access to all parts of the game. Update your profile, manage your Gaming Baseball, and check out what new achievements and rewards you can get.  As you rise up through the league rank you see your league score league level.

LEADERBOARDS

Follow your global placement in each games leaderboard. Tap any player and see their profile before you challenge their score, playing live as the commentator keeps you up to date on how you perform. Leaderboards are based on daily, weekly, monthly, and best score per season. 

PROFILE AND ACHIEVEMENTS

As a player, your public profile can be seen by all other players and any player can follow you. Collects achievements for many different activities in the game, some for performance, some just for fun.  

CHALLENGE YOURSELF

From the leaderboard you can switch to your own scores. View your progress, round for round, daily, weekly, monthly, or by season. View stats for any game and play against your best score to get a new personal best. Playing in this mode is a great way to have fun and to challenge yourself.

Eivind, co-founder and chief designer, excited as the first Gaming Baseballs have arrived. This is what you get in the box. Season 1 in a few weeks.Everything you need to join us and hundreds of pioneering players from around the world.  We promise it will be an experience you want to share.

WHAT IS IN THE BOX

You get everything you need to join Backyard League in the Gaming Baseball box. 
The box is just bigger than the ball, saving shipping and trees.
ASTM, FCC, and CE certified as well as child safety certified.
We offer a 12 month warranty.

 

PLAY SAFE

We are dads, so we designed the experience the way we want it to be for our own children. In Backyard League everyone should have fun playing together, competing, building their profile, collecting badges. All without any concerns about your privacy.

NO personal data required to play

NO personal data collected

NO subscription, extra cost or in-app purchase

NO open communication between players

We have done this before!

The founders from left: 
Paal Smith-Meyer brings creative brain and 14 years of experience as creative director at LEGO
Eivind Solberg excels at attention to detail, with decades of experience as industrial designer
Stian Vælitalo’s got creator magic and experience designing and coding systems for the national bank and postal system.
Jarle Nordby-Bøe brings decades of IoT and Bluetooth experience from Texas Instruments. 

In 2016 we  started Playfinity to use technology smarter, to inspire active play, as it is not our kids fault they are stuck to screens, it is the way the experiences are designed. With 1000´s of players, 100 events, 40 million of throws, kick ands jumps since we released our first smart ball in 2018. We combining our experience from sports and play to bring gaming to baseball and turn backyards into the new place to game :)

Visit our company site and check out what else we have done: https://playfinity.com/

Our journey has just started and we hope you will join, play and give us input so we can bring fun back into sports and sports back to kids so they have more fun playing together and keep playing longer.

The first prototypes of the gaming baseball came to life in the fall of 2019. We have tested many material combinations to get the right durability, weight, shape, balance, grip, and overall feel. The core of the ball is a patent pending design that protects the tech and gives the ball it's qualities.

A ROBUST DESIGN

We designed and tested the ball to feel like a baseball and perform like a gaming device. Regulation size and weight, with a robust design that can take a beating. The box includes tuners for adjusting weight and balance. The core is made of an impact resistant ABS material and the PU rubber outer gets better the more you play.  

QUICK CONNECT

Handle all connections from within the app. We optimized the way we use Bluetooth for active gaming. The Gaming Baseball updates the phone 70 times every second. You can play at distances of up to 70 yards from the phone. Back in range the ball will update the game. 

Over-the-air upgrade your ball directly from your phone in 20 seconds making the gaming ball smarter.

SMART POWER

How to get the most play out of one standard battery? How about up to 40.000 throws.
Over the years we have optimized power management during and after play. No off button to forget. Open the app and press the button to power up the ball. The ball goes into 2 sleep modes to conserve batteries.  

PRODUCTION UNDERWAY

We know we have an amazing product and we pride ourselves in delivery. So we have finished all tooling, testing, and production is under way. This means we are ready to ship the first gaming balls in September 2021 to the first backers and in October onwards to all backers.

This is not our first product and the gaming baseball is built on our proven technology that we first launched in 2018. We have since improved the core tech and the gaming experience based on 1000's of players and over 30 million throws, kicks and jumps.

We have a selection of gloves, a shirt and a cap you can add to any perk, to complete your Backyard League experience.

Having a great glove when playing is an integral part of the experience. We have chosen Rawlings to provide gloves to Backyard League. In this campaign we can offer a great Player Series junior glove for kids 5-7 years, and Renegade youth and adult gloves. Add the glove that fits your hand to any perk or select the special combination deal.

 

SHIPPING

Baseball is loved everywhere and we want players from all across the world to be able to join. We have established distribution from 3 hubs to ensure delivery close to your backyard. We have flat shipping rates within 3 main regions

 

WARRANTY AND CERTIFICATION

The Gaming Baseball has undergone all the testing required to be a safe product to bring into the home. ASTM, FCC, and CE certified with additional toy standard certification. We offer 12 month warranty or longer in countries where this is applicable.

 

Questions

If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me on paal@playfinity.com

We look forward to sharing the experience of Backyard League with you this fall as a pioneer of a new way to play catch. 

Paal, Eivind, Jarle, Stian and the rest fo the team

story:
https://dasung-tech.myshopify.com/products/dasung-25-3-e-ink-monitor-paperlike-253

 

Why we need a Paperlike E-ink Monitor

■  Do your eyes hurt when you look at a computer screen?  
■  Do you have children or elderly relatives who are sensitive to the glare?      
■  Are you an office worker who stares at a computer 10 hours a day?

In the information age, we look at our computers and smartphones for more than 12 hours a day. Our eyes are easily exposure to the damage caused by traditional LCD displays. Strong light, flash and blue light make our eyes dry, inflamed, deeper myopia, dizziness and even cause headache. We urgently need a paper-like monitor to save our eyes.

E-ink is the world's best ambient-light-reflecting display technology. lt drives ink droplets inmicrocapsules by voltage to make natural, clear images on the screen, illuminated by lighting the environment rather than a backlight. 

 

If you are sensitive to bright lights or have headaches working with LCD displays, this is the monitor you've been waiting for. DASUNG E-ink Monitor Paperlike 253 is easy on the eyes and larger than ever, offer your incredible using experience!

 

Who need Paperlike 253

Lawyers, teachers, students, programmers, traders, writers, editors, office workers, the elderly, people with visual impairment (dry eye, myopia, macular disease etc.)

 

25.3" Large Size E-ink Screen

Paperlike 253 has super large size 25.3” retina display, high contrast, fine quality, no flashing and no glare. It’s the perfect eye-saver. An unprecedented eye-friendly and user- friendly E-ink product that featuring nearly 4 K paper size which demonstrates strong visual shock that
the vision and thoughts of users can wander more freely and enjoy the exprience of large size screen. You will be enjoying the incredible using experience.

 

Professional Immersive Office Work Monitor

Editing word documents, programming, or doing internet research, you can easily open two applications at a time due to its sheer size. Paperlike 253 can display horizontally or vertically and mirror or extend the content on your primary computer screen. Support windows, Mac os, Linux and other mainstream operating systems. Work with split-screen and multi-window operations. Multiple tasks to be performed simultaneously. Highly improve your work efficiency. Totally different experience.

 

 

Work with Smartphone

Paperlike 253 can connect with any device that outputs video signal output via HDMI, such as iPhone, iPad, HUAWEI P30, etc. 

Note: When wired connecting to smartphones requires adapter.

 

DASUNG Turbo

We optimized our custom chip to provide unmatched E-ink refreshing speed by reconstructing the video stream signal processing, memory scheduling and other functions and algorithms.

 

 

Advanced image algorithm ＆ multi-dimensional adjustment mechanism

DASUNG is committed to optimizing the quality of E-ink for more than seven years. Paying attention to every detail. Respecting each of our users. Through the cross adjustment of the three dimensions of “grayscale”, “ink drop blackness” and “contrast”, the speed and image quality can be optimized, which can meet your different needs in office, entertainment and learning to protect your eyes well.

 

Easy to operate. Compatible with most devices

Three image modes allows you to personalize it by selecting the appropriate image quality to achieve different display effect. Professional ＆ Multiple ports (DP, HDMI, Type-c ports etc.), make it compatible with most devices, easy to connect ＆ operate.

 

 

Compatible with 100*100mm VESA Hole Stand

We have elaborately selected a height adjustable 100*100mm VESA stand for customers.

 

Rare aluminum alloy shell

 

Specifications

 

What’s in the box

 

About DASUNG

DASUNG was established in March 2014, as a national high-tech enterprise, Zhongguancun Golden Seed Enterprise, a well-known new concept application creator in the E-ink industry. Adhering to the spirit of craftsmanship, we have focused on the development of E-ink Monitors for 7 years. We have absolute leading edge in how to quickly drive E-ink screen, control ghosting and control adaptation systems. We made several E-ink products which are known as "black technology." In December 2014, we released the world's first 13.3” E-ink monitor Paperlike, and was invited to participate in the 2015 CES in the United States. In 2019, we released 7.8" E-ink tablet "Not-eReader". So far, we have got more than 160 media coverage in over 20 languages. We have sold E-ink products to over 78 countries or regions around the world. Paperlike 253 integrates all the innovations of our latest technologies, from size to kernel firmware, so far it’s unique globally.

 

Who's talking about us 

 

Timeline

Please share this with your friends and family!

Users yearn for and expected eye-friendly E-ink product. Creating a new era of large screen. Immersed in it with joy and happiness.
story_txt:
https://dasung-tech.myshopify.com/products/dasung-25-3-e-ink-monitor-paperlike-253 
Why we need a Paperlike E-ink Monitor
■  Do your eyes hurt when you look at a computer screen?  ■  Do you have children or elderly relatives who are sensitive to the glare?      ■  Are you an office worker who stares at a computer 10 hours a day?In the information age, we look at our computers and smartphones for more than 12 hours a day. Our eyes are easily exposure to the damage caused by traditional LCD displays. Strong light, flash and blue light make our eyes dry, inflamed, deeper myopia, dizziness and even cause headache. We urgently need a paper-like monitor to save our eyes.E-ink is the world's best ambient-light-reflecting display technology. lt drives ink droplets inmicrocapsules by voltage to make natural, clear images on the screen, illuminated by lighting the environment rather than a backlight.  If you are sensitive to bright lights or have headaches working with LCD displays, this is the monitor you've been waiting for. DASUNG E-ink Monitor Paperlike 253 is easy on the eyes and larger than ever, offer your incredible using experience! Who need Paperlike 253Lawyers, teachers, students, programmers, traders, writers, editors, office workers, the elderly, people with visual impairment (dry eye, myopia, macular disease etc.) 25.3" Large Size E-ink ScreenPaperlike 253 has super large size 25.3” retina display, high contrast, fine quality, no flashing and no glare. It’s the perfect eye-saver. An unprecedented eye-friendly and user- friendly E-ink product that featuring nearly 4 K paper size which demonstrates strong visual shock thatthe vision and thoughts of users can wander more freely and enjoy the exprience of large size screen. You will be enjoying the incredible using experience. Professional Immersive Office Work MonitorEditing word documents, programming, or doing internet research, you can easily open two applications at a time due to its sheer size. Paperlike 253 can display horizontally or vertically and mirror or extend the content on your primary computer screen. Support windows, Mac os, Linux and other mainstream operating systems. Work with split-screen and multi-window operations. Multiple tasks to be performed simultaneously. Highly improve your work efficiency. Totally different experience.  Work with SmartphonePaperlike 253 can connect with any device that outputs video signal output via HDMI, such as iPhone, iPad, HUAWEI P30, etc. Note: When wired connecting to smartphones requires adapter. DASUNG TurboWe optimized our custom chip to provide unmatched E-ink refreshing speed by reconstructing the video stream signal processing, memory scheduling and other functions and algorithms.  Advanced image algorithm ＆ multi-dimensional adjustment mechanismDASUNG is committed to optimizing the quality of E-ink for more than seven years. Paying attention to every detail. Respecting each of our users. Through the cross adjustment of the three dimensions of “grayscale”, “ink drop blackness” and “contrast”, the speed and image quality can be optimized, which can meet your different needs in office, entertainment and learning to protect your eyes well. Easy to operate. Compatible with most devicesThree image modes allows you to personalize it by selecting the appropriate image quality to achieve different display effect. Professional ＆ Multiple ports (DP, HDMI, Type-c ports etc.), make it compatible with most devices, easy to connect ＆ operate.  Compatible with 100*100mm VESA Hole StandWe have elaborately selected a height adjustable 100*100mm VESA stand for customers. Rare aluminum alloy shell Specifications What’s in the box About DASUNGDASUNG was established in March 2014, as a national high-tech enterprise, Zhongguancun Golden Seed Enterprise, a well-known new concept application creator in the E-ink industry. Adhering to the spirit of craftsmanship, we have focused on the development of E-ink Monitors for 7 years. We have absolute leading edge in how to quickly drive E-ink screen, control ghosting and control adaptation systems. We made several E-ink products which are known as "black technology." In December 2014, we released the world's first 13.3” E-ink monitor Paperlike, and was invited to participate in the 2015 CES in the United States. In 2019, we released 7.8" E-ink tablet "Not-eReader". So far, we have got more than 160 media coverage in over 20 languages. We have sold E-ink products to over 78 countries or regions around the world. Paperlike 253 integrates all the innovations of our latest technologies, from size to kernel firmware, so far it’s unique globally. Who's talking about us  TimelinePlease share this with your friends and family!Users yearn for and expected eye-friendly E-ink product. Creating a new era of large screen. Immersed in it with joy and happiness.

story:
Congrats! We hit the Stretch Goal and so you win when pledge products: Extra Case / Stand Holder

Summary that you'll receive inside a box （not just a product ）:

- SLIM-FOLD keyboard &

- FREE Bundled with the USB-C Charging Cable &

- FREE products / gift box personal name printing service (if you'd been granted)&

- FREE language stickers (per request) &

- Gift of Extra Case / Stand holder

 

Y2021 Latest Technology Breakthrough

 

Top Ranking project

What're people say:

“We know when you’re getting things done, your keyboard is an essential accessory. But what about when those all-too-necessary moments come up in which you need to free up some desk space or pack it up? We got you. The thin and lightweight design of  3.5mm wireless keyboard allows for easy transportation on the go!”     Recommended you by Steve & Elon

SLIM-FOLD is a Foldable & Smart Bluetooth Keyboard

The Smart SLIM-FOLD is the Lightest & Slimmest Bluetooth Wireless Foldable Keyboard in the world. 3.5mm thin, 150g light-weight & built-in smart magnetic on/off Switch for portable experience. Unlike other Folding keyboard with small key pad, 

we made it different!

SLIM-FOLD comes with full-size keypad layout,ergonomic design, tactile feel, smooth Input, high efficacy & no intermittent, and so fits for your day long usage. SLIM-FOLD Keyboard comes with a Foldable-Pouch not just protect the keyboard when it’s folded in the bag, also can transformed to an iPad/iPhone Stand work perfectly with Keyboard as work station.

Lightweight

150g (4.9oz) only, hand-held with few figners not an issue actually.

Foldable Design with Smart magnetic features 

Chocolate button, typing is more comfortable 

Custom PBT key cap, wear-resistant and non-greasy finger touch more fit, can relieve your finger fatigue caused by long-term use of the keyboard.　

65 Keys with 120 Functions  

65 fullsize keys layout, compatible with FOUR different operating systems (iOS, Android, Windows & macOS), gives you 120 combination functions which include multimedia keys. 

 

 

Magic Foldable Pouch 

SLIM-FOLD Keyboard comes with multi-purposes foldable pouch, not just protect the keyboard when it’s folded in the bag, and also can Magically transforming to be a Stand Holder for smart phones, tablets and iPad etc.

Pouch Stand Holder keep your big iPad firmly 

 

See how the magic work 

 

 

Smooth Folding Design

Convenient you on the go & apply it on meetings, bring your "office" anywhere you go.

 

 

Outstanding Technology Application

Our SLIM-FOLD Keyboard Can Standby One Third Year long. 

 

Power Energy-saving mode

Keyboard idle 10 minutes, it enters Sleeping mode, Blue LED off. When press any key in 3s, wake up and Blue LED on.

Rechargable

When battery flat, Red LED flashing. Check battery not flat or recharge it.

For recharging

First, Connect USB-C to keyboard and other end to any USB power adaptor.

Second, Red LED on while recharging and off at full.

Nordic Chip Inside

World's top Bluetooth chip, Low power consumption but robust wireless connectivity, supports wide range of products / systems.

NO MORE TANGLING WIRES 

Allow you wirelessly connect to different devices & switch each other 

 

Waterproof

Accident of Coffee / Tea / Water, worry is a thing of past!

With its durable & waterproof design to prevent malfunction by accidents,

It still works even after coffee spills or washing by water.

Simply dry off and you can keep using SLIM-FOLD Keyboard

(Not advise the USB-C port)

 

Supports Apple TV, Bluetooth Enabled Smart TV 

 

Keyboard Language Characters Output Setting

SLIM-FOLD Keyboard follow your system language setting and output language characters according to the client device language setting.

For your client device, eg. Mac. In the System Preferences, click the Keyboard option. And follow below steps.

Clicking on the + (Add) button prompts a pop-up window to open, displaying an alphabetized list of all the available languages on the left-hand side and the corresponding keyboard input sources on the right.

If your client device setting is already your favorite language, no need to follow Mac setting instrutcion here, but turn around to verify this SLIM-FOLD device its language layout and stick on key button character label.

And so QWERTY or QWERTZ keyboard layout, it depends on your own language setting.

But Key Button printing should be adjusted, default QWERTY 

 

FREE Mulit-Languages Key Button Stickers

This SLIM-FOLD keyboard can adapt to the client device's system, output the language characters according to the client device system setting.

This product default English Keyboard Layout, But we can provide multi-language key button stickers, FREE!

And so, users who can label their own language letters on key button, as result,

Keyboard layout would be their own language accordingly.

Eg. QWERTY of English physical layout of , but for French, it would be AZERTY,

Here you're some language keyboard layout photo:

English Keyboard Layout (default) 

And more & more languages Keyboard Layout of Key stickers would be made and included in the package.

The language stickers listing: Italian, German, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Korean, French, Spanish, Japanese, Arabic, Filipino, Thai, Russian, Malaysia, Netherlands, etc.

However, 

the final production of these language stickers which depends on our backers need.

 

Keyboard Specification

  • Model:                                    MPC-003
  • Name:                                    Mini Foldable Keyboard
  • Pair Name:                            MIPOW MPC-003
  • Input:                                      5V / 100mA
  • Effective Range:                  10m
  • Li-ion Battery Capacity:   120mAh / 3.7V / 0.444Wh
  • Size:                                        296.2 x 94.5 x 5.3mm / (11.5 x 3.7 x 0.14) inch
  • Standby Time:                     120 Days
  • Operation Time:                  85 Hours

Keyboard Main Functions

  • Wireless Bluetooth Connectivity
  • Supports devices Operation System:  iOS, Android, Windows, iPadOS, macOS, plus Apple TV and Bluetooth Enabled Smart TV 
  • Multi-pairing and multi-tasking
  • Connect to any smart device including smart phones, tablets and iPad etc.
  • Easily switching in between paired devices.
  • 120 Days stand-by time or 85 hours operation time
  • 65 Keys layout and 120 functions
  • Multi-purposes folding pouch to A stand holder
  • Rechargeable, built-in USB-C
  • Waterproof key board, with its durable & waterproof design accidents, can easy clean after coffee spills and dry off.
  • Magnetic Folding Sensor ON/OFF automatically

 Keyboard Dimension

 

THREE Color Selections 

THREE option available:  Business-Black | Motion-Yellow 

Plus Third one colorful keys come with Business-Black background.

Business-Black which is the general color for the technology products, suitable for every group and different walks of people.

Motion-Yellow which is a dynamic and energetic image, a sense of smart and modern. 

Third choice, by responded to our dear Backers' request, now we have this alternative color keyboard but need your vote and finally we produce one only.

ie.

Business-Black Plus Colorful Keys option, Either Option 1 (mixed white & orange keys)

Or Option 2 (mixed color keys)

Please drop us your vote here about your choice as shown above.

 

Presentation Motion-Yellow Keyboard, your beloved one.

 

Motion-Yellow same functions and presentation of smart, beauty and energetic of you! 

 

What you'll get inside a single product package

 

Retail Product Packaging 

*FREE name printing service

In order to thanks our supporter who pledge from 5pcs, we will provide free name printing on products only, on each product individually, worth $25! 

For Groupon (10X) Backers:  Other than Name printing on product, Name printing on packaging as extra. And you will be asked to fill out printing survery after campaign ends shortly.

 

For pledge 5-Sets or more:

Corporate or Personal Name on Product Printing (15Letters)

Personalized Name Printing Product as following picture 

For Groupon (10-Sets) Backers:

Corporate or Personal Name on Black Gift Packaging (15Letters)

Corporate or Personal Name on Product Printing (15Letters)

 

Personalized both <Name Printing Product> & <Printing Packaging>  

For those who don't meet the above requirements but have introduced 4 more Backers, also can have such FREE service. Anyway, please don't hesitate to drop us a note if you're really love to have such printing service for you!

Stretch Goal

 When overall Pledge more than 50000 USD,  

thankfulness gift of Extra Case or Stand Holder offer to each Backer

Extra Case:

Or Stand Holder:

When overall Pledge more 100000 USD, 

thankfulness gift of Bluetooth Mouse offer to each Backer

Follow up message to the Stretch Goal

Good news to you & all, you may receive the parcel includes:

- FREE Bundled with the USB-C Charging Cable and

- FREE products/gift box printing service(if you'd been granted)

- PLUS the above the Stretch Goal thankfulness gifts

We'd pack with the USB-C cable together with the product and thankfulness gifts, send out to you & all, this will be happened shortly after this campaign ends, Oct. 2021.

 

Appreciate if you help on meeting these goals and helping to spread out this good news to your circle of friends, family, classmates, colleagues, social media account followers,  please simply pass them this link of Indiegogo project:

https://igg.me/at/kbd/x/26996143#/

If you’re really help to share this campaign page, please don’t hesitate to show us your works that you’d done, by the time when we send you parcel of product, we would remember you and bundle with the thankfulness gift inside the box, as a special bonus gift to you!

To make a long story short, this is regardless the performance of Stretch Goal.

 

Our Design Goal 

At MIPOW, we strive for a difference. We are always on the look out for

new technology, because we believe that we can change people’s lives for better, enriching people’s everyday lives through Design &Technology.

The desire to “help people enjoy happier lives through technology,”

 

MIPOW has a professional and passionate development team.We understands that having a quality product is the first step to success but your support is the key that brings the success further and greater, has devoted lots of resources to support and promote the launching 15 products in Kickstarter and all success!

Project starting from conceptual idea

Outlook draft built-up 

Populated with buttons layout 

Shaping product by different view of angles 

We drawn every line by Heart and think of you! 

Keyboard Structure & Assembly 

Made It For You:  By Hand & Heart 

Keys Selection | Positioning | Material preparation | Backplate fixing 

In prior shipment, every product undergone test

Manufacturing Facilities 

Our Honorable Team 

What are they say?

Risks and challenges

We’re diligently working to create a cool, fun and interesting projects that brings the convenient lives to the users, from complexity to simple. We have dedicated our heart, soul, and imagination in planning and crafting out the most important item ever.

The following months we’re moving forward the well designed project and to build more samples for evaluation by different parties, and fine tune it if there’s any discrepancy found, and next to build the injection molds and start the full production process.

Timing is dependably a major test as for the creation and shipment of the product. We will work with a top-notch delivery company to offer secure and quick delivery. Please note that we want to make sure the products we ship out are in good quality and this can cause delays. Our team is ready to handle each Backer’s question/enquiry and ensure all our dear Backers can get their products without any issues.

Please note that 3.5mm World's Slimmest Foldable Wireless Smart Keyboard is the most advanced technology on the market. We may still need more time to pass some tests as we want to make sure the products we produce are the best reliable.

With our years on experienced electronic manufacturer, we are confident to handle any foreseeable risks and deliver a high-quality product to our Backers on time.

We would frequently update you and keep you be informed the overall processes, as we are committed to getting this innovative product into your hands on schedule as promise. We are so excited to see your smiling face by using it.

story:
La version française ci-dessous

Meet DishAfrik

DishAfrik is the recipe app where you can experience the taste of Africa. You will be able to find all your favourite recipes and even more on DishAfrik. With 54 countries in Africa, over a billion people, and countless delicacies, there would always be something new to cook on DishAfrik!
 

Get first in line with DishAfrik

Our goal is to be the destination to find all recipes from the motherland. So that, wherever you are, you can always connect or reconnect to the authentic African taste. 

Are you Missing that favorite dish? or looking to try something new? You only have to look it up on DishAfrik, and you have all you need to know in other to make it.

When you back the campaign, you will get the chance to be first in line to get the DishAfrik experience and join a community of food lovers. 
 

Rewards

Here are the following benefits you get as a backer of the campaign:

  • Digital thank you
    We say a big thank to you on our social media platforms
     
  • Opportunity to be an early user of the DishAfrik app
    Be part of the first set of people to use the DishAfrik app
     
  • Exclusive membership to DishAfrik foodie group chat

    Access to invite only group chat for foodies
     
  • Exclusive access to DishAfrik online cooking classes

    Free access to online cooking classes where you learn how to cook all those delicious dishes
     
  • DishAfrik 100 most popular dishes (Digital cookbook)

    Cookbook consisting of the top 100 dishes on DishAfrik
     
  • Exclusive access to Nutritionist


    Get a free group webinar session and discounted private session with Nduta Wambura, a nutrition science educator and communicator, who focuses on using Evidence-Based Nutrition Science.
     
  • DishAfrik NFT
    NFT of pictures of 54 dishes with the recipes included
     
  • Meet with founders
    An Ask Me Anything session with the co-founders 

 

Note about the NFT

NFT stands for Non-fungible token. It allows you to digitally prove ownership of digital things like music, digital arts etc. The DishAfrik NFT would be a montage of 54 different dishes from 54 different countries. One will contain just the pictures, the other one will also include the recipe.With this NFT you would be able to digitally prove that you supported the indiegogo campaign, while having a digital art you can keep or later sell.

 

Proposed Features of DishAfrik

The DishAfrik journey is starting. It will begin with the development of the DishAfrik mobile App. Features will include but not limited to discovery, nutritional and taste profile information, socio-cultural information, cooking classes and community.

 

Meet the team

Dade Aderemi is responsible for all things technology. He enjoys "living diversity", getting to know about different cultures and traveling. He has been to at least a country on all the continents except South America, Antarctica and Oceania. He plans to visit South America once the covid pandemic is over (Antarctica and Oceania will have to wait till another time) . He is Nigerian Dutch and currently resides in Amsterdam, The Netherlands.

Mary Maamah is responsible for all things operations. She believes Participation is fun, and living diversity is a must. Apart from her background and work experience in the Finance, and Legal sectors, she also runs a home cooked food business. She is a Ghanian and she is based in Accra.

 

Risks & Challenges

We are both working full time jobs while we build DishAfrik. The funds raised from this campaign would enable us have one or two work days focused on DishAfrik apart from the evenings and weekends we already spend.

Because of this, the speed of development won't be as fast as if we were working full time. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help by spreading this campaign amongst your network and also on social media.
 

Contributing via PayPal

You can also contribute via PayPal by sending payment to admin@dishafrik.com or via the PayPal payment link: paypal.me/dishafrik 

You will get the rewards that corresponds to the amount contributed. Once payment is received, we would contact you to confirm.   

This arrangement is needed because Indiegogo does not integrate with PayPal.

Rencontrez DishAfrik

DishAfrik est une application de recettes où n'importe qui, de n'importe où, peut découvrir, apprécier et partager la richesse des cuisines africaines.

L'objectif de DishAfrik est de permettre à chacun d'explorer des cuisines différentes à travers l'Afrique, tout en fournissant des informations contextuelles et utiles telles que des profils de saveurs, des informations nutritionnelles etc.

Dans 54 pays en Afrique, avec plus d'un milliard de personnes et d'innombrables délices, il y aurait toujours quelque chose de nouveau à cuisiner sur DishAfrik!

DishAfrik commence par une application mobile, puis s'étend à d'autres plate-formes : Web, montres intelligentes, gadgets de cuisine intelligents, etc.

 

Caractéristiques proposées par DishAfrik

Le voyage DishAfrik commence. Cela commencera par le développement de l'application mobile DishAfrik.
Voici des fonctionnalités qu’on propose:

Rechercher/Filtre
Pour permettre cela, on développe la capacité de rechercher et de sélectionner les recettes en fonction de facteurs tels que leurs ingrédients (par exemple, trouver des recettes qui incluent la feuille de baobab et la tomate en excluant la viande rouge).
Il sera également possible de rechercher et de sélectionner les recettes en fonction du goût (par exemple, n'afficher que les recettes salées, à l’umami ou à l’aigre). Il serait également possible de sélectionner en fonction des allergies.

En outre, il serait possible de limiter la recherche à un pays ou à une région particulière (par exemple, afficher uniquement les recettes du Botswana ou afficher uniquement les recettes d'Afrique de l'Ouest)
 

Information nutritionnelle.
Pour la création de DishAfrik, on développe une base de données exhaustive avec les informations nutritionnelles des ingrédients utilisés dans les spécialités africaines. Cela garantit que pendant que vous aimez faire les recettes, vous apprenez également à connaître les valeurs nutritionnelles qui vous aident à prendre des décisions alimentaires..

Profils de goût
DishAfrik fournit des informations de profil de goût pour les recettes. Il existe actuellement 5 profils gustatifs généralement connus: sucré, salé, acide, amer et umami. Le cas échéant, on identifie et définit des profils gustatifs supplémentaires propres aux recettes. Des informations sur les textures gustatives, telles que croquant, moelleux, etc. seraient également incluses.

Informations socioculturelles
Les recettes ne se limitent pas aux étapes de cuisson. Les contextes socioculturels des recettes seraient également mis en évidence. Par exemple, si une recette est principalement préparée pour des événements spécifiques, un aliment de base ou toute autre information intéressante concernant la recette.

Classes de cuisine
DishAfrik fournit une plate-forme pour ceux qui souhaitent partager la façon de cuisiner des recettes africaines avec le monde. Il s'agit d'une session virtuelle où vous pourrez regarder, suivre et poser des questions sur la façon de préparer des recettes trouvées sur DishAfrik.

D'autres fonctionnalités à l'horizon incluent des intégrations de commerce électronique, un planificateur de repas, des fonctionnalités sociales, etc.
 

Récompenses

En plus d'aider à donner vie à DishAfrik, selon le montant que vous choisissez de contribuer, vous bénéficiez de certains ou de tous les avantages suivants:

  • Un Grand Merci 
    • On vous dit un grand merci sur diverses plateformes de médias sociaux
  • Rejoignez-nous en tant que bêta-testeur
    • Faites partie du premier groupe de personnes à utiliser et à commenter l'application DishAfrik
  • Rabais exclusif
    • Accès à des réductions et les offres spéciales de DishAfrik
  • Insigne VIP
    • Avoir un badge qui serait à jamais sur votre profil qui montre que vous nous avez soutenu
  • Rencontre avec les fondateurs
    • Une session AMA (Ask me anything) avec les co-fondateurs
  • NFT DishAfrik sans recettes
    • NFT de photos de 54 plats sans recettes 
  • NFT DishAfrik avec recettes
    • NFT de photos de 54 plats avec les recettes 

Remarque sur le NFT

NFT signifie jeton non fongible. Il vous permet de prouver numériquement la propriété de choses numériques comme la musique, les arts numériques, etc. Le NFT DishAfrik serait un montage de 54 plats différents de 54 pays différents. L'un ne contient que les images, l'autre contient également la recette.

Avec ce NFT, vous pourrez prouver numériquement que vous avez soutenu la campagne indiegogo, tout en ayant un art numérique que vous pouvez conserver ou vendre plus tard.

 

Pourquoi soutenir DishAfrik

Notre objectif est d'avoir des recettes des 54 pays sur l'application DishAfrik. Lorsque vous soutenez la campagne, vous aiderez avec la première étape qui est la réalisation du prototype.

La prochaine étape serait une collecte de fonds pour la réalisation de la plate-forme.

On commence par deux pays de l'Afrique de l'Ouest , puis deux de l'Afrique de l'Est, deux de l'Afrique francophone, deux de l'Afrique australe puis deux de l'Afrique du Nord.

Après cela, on poursuit une stratégie d'expansion pour couvrir les 54 pays en Afrique.
Les fonds collectés dans cette campagne nous aideront à faire le premiers pas vers cet objectif. Les fonds serviront à financer des activités suivantes :

  • Mettre en place l'infrastructure technique de base,
  • Ajouter plus de 200 recettes du Nigeria et du Ghana,
  • Implémenter les fonctionnalités de recherche.
  • Établir une base de données de profils nutritionnels et gustatifs. Cela sera rassemblé à partir des données obtenues de l'USDA (United States Department of Agriculture) 

 

Rencontrer l'équipe

Dade Aderemi est responsable de tout ce qui concerne la technologie. Il aime "vivre la diversité", découvrir différentes cultures et voyager. Il a visité au moins un pays sur tous les continents sauf l'Amérique du Sud, l'Antarctique et l'Océanie. Il prévoit de se rendre en Amérique du Sud quand la pandémie de covid se termine (l'Antarctique et l'Océanie au futur). Il est néerlandais-nigérian et réside actuellement à Amsterdam, aux Pays-Bas.

Mary Maamah est responsable de toutes les opérations. A son avis, participer est non seulement amusant mais il faut aussi vivre la diversité. En plus de son travail et expérience professionnelle dans la finance et la domaine juridique, elle dirige également une entreprise de cuisine de chez elle. Elle est ghanéenne et habite à Accra
 

Risques et défis

On travaille tous les deux à temps plein, tout en développant dans le même temps DishAfrik. Grâce à cette campagne, les fonds collectés nous permettraient d'avoir une ou deux journées de travail focalisées sur DishAfrik, en dehors des soirées et week-ends que nous passons déjà.
Pour cette raison, le développement ne serait pas assez rapide si nous travaillions à temps plein.

 

D'autre façons de contribuer

Vous pouvez également nous aider en diffusant cette campagne au sein de votre réseau et également sur les réseaux sociaux..

La version française ci-dessous
Meet DishAfrik
DishAfrik is the recipe app where you can experience the taste of Africa. You will be able to find all your favourite recipes and even more on DishAfrik. With 54 countries in Africa, over a billion people, and countless delicacies, there would always be something new to cook on DishAfrik! 

Get first in line with DishAfrik
Our goal is to be the destination to find all recipes from the motherland. So that, wherever you are, you can always connect or reconnect to the authentic African taste. 
Are you Missing that favorite dish? or looking to try something new? You only have to look it up on DishAfrik, and you have all you need to know in other to make it.
When you back the campaign, you will get the chance to be first in line to get the DishAfrik experience and join a community of food lovers.  
Rewards
Here are the following benefits you get as a backer of the campaign:


Digital thank youWe say a big thank to you on our social media platforms 

Opportunity to be an early user of the DishAfrik appBe part of the first set of people to use the DishAfrik app 

Exclusive membership to DishAfrik foodie group chatAccess to invite only group chat for foodies 

Exclusive access to DishAfrik online cooking classesFree access to online cooking classes where you learn how to cook all those delicious dishes 

DishAfrik 100 most popular dishes (Digital cookbook)Cookbook consisting of the top 100 dishes on DishAfrik 

Exclusive access to NutritionistGet a free group webinar session and discounted private session with Nduta Wambura, a nutrition science educator and communicator, who focuses on using Evidence-Based Nutrition Science. 

DishAfrik NFTNFT of pictures of 54 dishes with the recipes included

story:
Introducing GEN i2

GEN i2 is everything a golf simulator has to offer embedded inside a golf ball. That’s right, the technology is inside the golf ball. Play full rounds with friends or connect to tournaments through the app, play a full round under an hour, or take it out on the course (if you want) and get live accurate feedback during your round! This is the solution to all your golfing problems!

 

 

  1. Golf ball- USGA regulation weight and feel. In other words, this ball looks and feels just like a normal golf ball, only it’s smarter.
  2. Club sensor- 9 axis sensor that calculates what your club is doing to give you live feedback about your game
  3. Multi Terrain Mat- A mat to use in your home or office so that you can have an authentic golfing experience with greens, fairways, and rough.
  4. Easy Pop-up Net- No more costly and bulky hitting bays. Easily pop up the net in seconds indoor or outdoors.
  5. Free Android and iOS app- The app will give you data about your swing, allow you to connect with online players, or just simply play a round whenever and wherever.

 

Amazing Features

The GEN i2 is a full simulator golf ball that is meant for indoor or outdoor use. By putting the sensor inside the ball, we are able to give you a better golfing experience for a fraction of the cost. Simulators can cost thousands, as can membership fees to the clubs, so we made it possible for you to play your favorite courses on your phone whenever. Set up takes seconds with our popup tent, mat, and user friendly app! Whether you are inside or outside, just connect your ball sensor, and club sensor to the app via Bluetooth, swing, and play. For those golfers who feel confident enough, take your ball and play it on the course! While playing, you will get live feedback about your balls distance and your body movement! Don’t like a swing? Request instant feedback from our Quick Coaching and see how to improve on the spot!

 

In The News

The GEN i2 had its first unveiling at the 2018 PGA show in Orlando Florida. Below are some of the different publication companies that featured us on their websites and that attended this unveiling while at the show! 

GEN i2 getting the stamp of approval from other publications

 

The Design

The GEN i2 is designed for golfers, ranging in all ages and levels, whether you are a seasoned player who wants to receive live feedback about your swing on the course or a beginner who is too embarrassed to learn and can’t afford coaching!

 

Connecting to the App

Download the user friendly app and create a profile. Once your profile is created, all you’ll need to do is connect your sensors, select your gaming or training experience, then start playing.

With our mobile gaming, you will be able to play with friends near and far or join tournaments for prizes via internet.

With the coaching, you will get data points that are IMPORTANT to your swing and we will tell you what to do with that information.

Easy Set Up and Breakdown

Our simulator comes with a popup net and a mat that not only takes up less space, but is significantly easier to set up and breakdown. Its safe anywhere: your living room, garage, patio, den, or office! Play then GEN i2 anywhere, anytime, no more excuses!

When broken down, the net and mat take up barely any space! Store it under your bed, in the garage, or in any closet!

Specs

 

The Company

Founder of Coach Labs Inc., Jason Koo is a serial entrepreneur. He has 20 years of experience as an inventor and product developer that spans retail, promotional products, and technology. He has created global brand through mass-marketing with Sunglass Hut, Walmart, Target, CVS, and Best Buy. Jason Koo has blended his passion for golf and innovation by creating a plethora of training aids and golf accessories.

Fox Sports broadcaster Curt Menefee has been a partner with Coach Labs since the very beginning. Curt has been around sports his entire life and has taken his extensive knowledge in training and helped create the GEN i2.

PGA professional Tim Leible began his career as an automotive engineer, focused on sensor systems and vehicle electronics. Hi spassion for the golf game drove him to become a Class A PGA professional. His competitive playing experience and more than 10 years spend coaching the game helped him not only design the GEN i2, but also view it from all angles to make a better user experience for you.

FAQ

  • Why is the super early bird so cheap? Is the quality really there?
    We get it, $299 while our competitors are in the thousands? It can be a little worrisome. Here at Coach Labs we have dedicated years into our sensor technology. When we say that the sensor is embedded and protected, we mean it. The price is low because by putting the sensor inside the ball, we have eliminated a lot of costs on hardware! We have the best found the best nets and mats and are dedicated to getting you the best quality product, all at cost.
  • When is expected delivery?
    Expected delivery is midsummer, so very soon!
  • Is the design strong enough to withhold a full swing?
    The sensor embedded golf ball has been tested many times, we have finally gotten the core small enough to be protected inside the core of the golf ball.
  • What version of Bluetooth will the GEN i2 use?
    The GEN i2, club, and body sensor will all use Bluetooth 4.0 Low battery connection.
  • What’s the warranty policy if I have issues with my GEN i2?
    We have a one year warranty for any people experiencing issues with their GEN i2 or additional sensors.
  • What is the battery life for the GEN i2 and additional sensors?
    The GEN i2 will last you around 8 full rounds or 800 swings before you need to return it to us for a new ball, at a discounted price of course. The club and body sensor will be rechargeable and the battery life will last around six to eight hours of continuous use.
  • What comes with my GEN i2 simulator kit?
    The GEN i2 simulator kit will come with a GEN i2 sensor golf ball, one club sensor, one hip sensor, a mat, and a net.
  • Will I need internet to use the GEN i2?
    You will need wifi or internet connection if you are connecting to tournaments, playing full rounds with friends, utilizing the quick coaching, or accessing the server to make account changes.
    If you just want to swing and get analysis in your home, you do not need access to internet.
  • Where can I set up my GEN i2?
    ANYWHERE! You can set up your GEN i2 in your office, in your home, on your porch, outside! The limits are endless! As long as you have a space high enough to swing a club, you can set up and play GEN i2 in seconds.
  • Do I need all the sensors or can I just use the ball?
    You will need to connect the club and body sensor to use the ball sensor.
  • How much does the GEN i2 weigh?
    The GEN i2 ball weighs the same as any other regulation golf ball, which is 45.9 grams.
  • What are the dimension of the mat and net?
    The mat is 2ft and 1in by 1ft and 5in. The net broken down is 3 ft by 3ft. The net fully set up is 10ft by 5ft by 7 ft. So it will fit in any normal sized apartment, home, or office!

 Amazing FeaturesThe GEN i2 is a full simulator golf ball that is meant for indoor or outdoor use. By putting the sensor inside the ball, we are able to give you a better golfing experience for a fraction of the cost. Simulators can cost thousands, as can membership fees to the clubs, so we made it possible for you to play your favorite courses on your phone whenever. Set up takes seconds with our popup tent, mat, and user friendly app! Whether you are inside or outside, just connect your ball sensor, and club sensor to the app via Bluetooth, swing, and play. For those golfers who feel confident enough, take your ball and play it on the course! While playing, you will get live feedback about your balls distance and your body movement! Don’t like a swing? Request instant feedback from our Quick Coaching and see how to improve on the spot! In The NewsThe GEN i2 had its first unveiling at the 2018 PGA show in Orlando Florida. Below are some of the different publication companies that featured us on their websites and that attended this unveiling while at the show! GEN i2 getting the stamp of approval from other publications The DesignThe GEN i2 is designed for golfers, ranging in all ages and levels, whether you are a seasoned player who wants to receive live feedback about your swing on the course or a beginner who is too embarrassed to learn and can’t afford coaching! Connecting to the AppDownload the user friendly app and create a profile. Once your profile is created, all you’ll need to do is connect your sensors, select your gaming or training experience, then start playing.With our mobile gaming, you will be able to play with friends near and far or join tournaments for prizes via internet.With the coaching, you will get data points that are IMPORTANT to your swing and we will tell you what to do with that information.Easy Set Up and BreakdownOur simulator comes with a popup net and a mat that not only takes up less space, but is significantly easier to set up and breakdown. Its safe anywhere: your living room, garage, patio, den, or office! Play then GEN i2 anywhere, anytime, no more excuses!When broken down, the net and mat take up barely any space! Store it under your bed, in the garage, or in any closet!Specs The CompanyFounder of Coach Labs Inc., Jason Koo is a serial entrepreneur. He has 20 years of experience as an inventor and product developer that spans retail, promotional products, and technology. He has created global brand through mass-marketing with Sunglass Hut, Walmart, Target, CVS, and Best Buy. Jason Koo has blended his passion for golf and innovation by creating a plethora of training aids and golf accessories.Fox Sports broadcaster Curt Menefee has been a partner with Coach Labs since the very beginning. Curt has been around sports his entire life and has taken his extensive knowledge in training and helped create the GEN i2.PGA professional Tim Leible began his career as an automotive engineer, focused on sensor systems and vehicle electronics. Hi spassion for the golf game drove him to become a Class A PGA professional. His competitive playing experience and more than 10 years spend coaching the game helped him not only design the GEN i2, but also view it from all angles to make a better user experience for you.FAQ

Why is the super early bird so cheap? Is the quality really there?We get it, $299 while our competitors are in the thousands? It can be a little worrisome. Here at Coach Labs we have dedicated years into our sensor technology. When we say that the sensor is embedded and protected, we mean it. The price is low because by putting the sensor inside the ball, we have eliminated a lot of costs on hardware! We have the best found the best nets and mats and are dedicated to getting you the best quality product, all at cost.

When is expected delivery?Expected delivery is midsummer, so very soon!

Is the design strong enough to withhold a full swing?The sensor embedded golf ball has been tested many times, we have finally gotten the core small enough to be protected inside the core of the golf ball.

What version of Bluetooth will the GEN i2 use?The GEN i2, club, and body sensor will all use Bluetooth 4.0 Low battery connection.

What’s the warranty policy if I have issues with my GEN i2?We have a one year warranty for any people experiencing issues with their GEN i2 or additional sensors.

What is the battery life for the GEN i2 and additional sensors?The GEN i2 will last you around 8 full rounds or 800 swings before you need to return it to us for a new ball, at a discounted price of course. The club and body sensor will be rechargeable and the battery life will last around six to eight hours of continuous use.

What comes with my GEN i2 simulator kit?The GEN i2 simulator kit will come with a GEN i2 sensor golf ball, one club sensor, one hip sensor, a mat, and a net.

Will I need internet to use the GEN i2?You will need wifi or internet connection if you are connecting to tournaments, playing full rounds with friends, utilizing the quick coaching, or accessing the server to make account changes.If you just want to swing and get analysis in your home, you do not need access to internet.

Where can I set up my GEN i2?ANYWHERE! You can set up your GEN i2 in your office, in your home, on your porch, outside! The limits are endless! As long as you have a space high enough to swing a club, you can set up and play GEN i2 in seconds.

Do I need all the sensors or can I just use the ball?You will need to connect the club and body sensor to use the ball sensor.

How much does the GEN i2 weigh?The GEN i2 ball weighs the same as any other regulation golf ball, which is 45.9 grams.

What are the dimension of the mat and net?The mat is 2ft and 1in by 1ft and 5in. The net broken down is 3 ft by 3ft. The net fully set up is 10ft by 5ft by 7 ft. So it will fit in any normal sized apartment, home, or office!

story:
Always carrying a heavy and bulky phone during outdoor exercise?

Need an extra SIM card slot for a business trip?

Wanna overcome social anxiety?

 

 

All you need is a Mint - the smallest 4G smartphone, includes just the essentials and liberates you from social anxiety. Let the phone just be a phone.

 
 

 

 

Mint is small enough to slip into your pocket without the worry of size and weight. You can carry it around with you all day without noticing it and have it ready to use anytime you need it. The perfect size fits neatly into the palm of your hand.

 

 

Mint’s elegant and sleek design is a homage to the Apple design aesthetic. It has classic squared-off sides and a minimalist interface, with just volume & power buttons, along with a Type-C port.

 
 
 

Hands-on review

Check this hands-on review from  Tech Spurt, and take a closer look at Mint.

 

Check this hands-on review from  Das kann was, and take a closer look at Mint.

 
 

Check this hands-on review from Unbox Fantasy, and take a closer look at Mint.

  • Portable

Mint is small enough to fit into any pocket. It’s super lightweight and easy to carry around for outdoor activities, sports, or jogging.

 
 
  • Global Positioning System

Mint is GPS enabled for accurate location for apps and navigation.

 

 

  • Dual SIM Card

With its dual sim card function, Mint makes working is a breeze using a second number for business or travel.

 

 
  • 72 Hours Working Time

With its 1250 mAh battery capacity, a single charge allows Mint to last for up to 72 hours. (Working time will vary depending upon the apps, tasks and calls that are required.)

 
 

 

  • Family Friendly

Mint is the perfect gift for friends and is great for families with kids. It’s a less expensive, yet powerful option that is easy for kids to use and carry.

 
 
  • Two Color Options

With 2 modern colors to choose from, you can let your personal style shine through.  Black and Blue. Pick the one you like or get them all!

 
 
 

Want to get a conversation going? Just pull out Mint and it is instantly the center of attention. You will have everyone asking about this innovative and interesting little smartphone.

 
 

 

  • Global Carriers Support

Mint supports most of the 4G network carriers worldwide, including Asia, Europe, America, and more.

 
 
  • Unique Camera

Mint is equipped with two useful cameras. On the rear, there's a quality 5MP camera and the front of the phone has a 2MP selfie snapper.

 
 
  • Bluetooth

The Bluetooth wireless technology allows you to connect with other Bluetooth-enabled devices.  Share documents or listen to music in an easier way.

 
 
 
 

Mint smartphone is a professional team focusing on small smartphones and has ten years of experience in designing and manufacturing. We’re on a mission to create and bring more fun to people!

story:
ICU Designs Cell Case

iPhone 11 & iPhone 12

 

How It All Began

 

 

Where Your Support Is Going

We are in the Final Stage of Production and are asking for $15,000.  After spending tens of thousands on the samples and prototype stages, we are in need of your help to bring the product over the finish line. 

We are offering a discount for all supporters of the campaign.  We are including a cleaning cloth to keep your mirror clean for all supporters.  For multiple orders, we are offering cleaning cloths and screen protectors.  All funds received will be going towards the Production Stage for the initial orders.  We hope to exceed our goal.  Exceeding our goal will help create more tooling machines to be able to produce more cases for other cell phones. 

With each new cell phone, a new tooling machine has to be made.  That machine is made out of iron and steel and costs thousands of dollars to make.  To note, each case has its own individual tooling machine.  One tooling machine can not make an XR, iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11 Pro Max, and so on.  It can only make one cell phone per tooling machine.  The sizes are all just a little bit different from the others.   With extra funding, we will be able to have more tooling machines to make more cell cases for more cell phones.

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Please share our campaign with all your friends and family.  Use the Indiegogo share tools to share our passion project on your social media accounts.  We know how valuable your social accounts are and we appreciate it!  If you are on Facebook and Instagram, please follow us to keep up with our journey.

​​

  igg.me/at/icudesigns-cellcase​

 

www.icu-designs.com   

www.facebook.com/icudesignsla 

 

www.instagram.com/icu.designs/

story:
The World’s Smallest & Lightest Power Bank "SMARTCOBY"

  • Just 0.5 inches thick, extremely lightweight at 0.3lbs (137g) and the size of a business card!
  • Including a super high-spec. PD 3.0, QC4+, pass-through, and automatic switching slow/rapid speed charging function!
  • A simple design with 8,000mAh high capacity for ease of use, and variety of colors ideal for everyday life.

"Power banks are heavy and big!" SMARTCOBY will overturn such conventional thinking. For the future in high capacity power banks, all while being just the size of a credit card, we introduce SMARTCOBY: the standard for next-generation power banks.

 

With limited smartphone battery capacity, daily power bank use has become ubiquitous so we have designed the best one for you. SMARTCOBY is not only extremely compact but also has multiple functions. SMARTCOBY will definitely make your lifestyle more convenient.

 

Current State of Mobile Batteries

 As high-spec smartphones and tablets are becoming more and more popular, we at CIO Co., Ltd. feel that many power banks have not yet caught up with the evolution of smartphones. 

We have sold tens of thousands of our products in Japan so far and currently, the strongest feeling we have received from our customers is that they are not 100% satisfied with current products.

People using other branded power banks complain that:

"I’m a little worried because of its low capacity, but it is okay as long as it is light…!"

"This power bank is really heavy but I feel covered because of its high capacity and quick charge technology."

 

Our Challenge to Achieve Both Compactness and High-spec 

In the market today, implementing single-function power banks is no longer difficult. We can easily make lightweight power banks, large capacity power banks, and quick charge power banks. However, there are some disadvantages.

  •  Lightweight power banks often have only small capacity and are often depleted after one charge leaving the user without backup if recharging the power bank has been forgotten. 
  • Large capacity power banks are heavy. 
  • There are very few quick charge technology power banks and practically none are lightweight ones.

"CIO Co., Ltd." has succeeded in developing the ideal power bank by striving to attain 100% customer satisfaction. We have developed various new technologies through this project, such as lithium battery technology, transformer technology, and we have also improved the quality of the battery. Finally, we have succeeded in developing a power bank that is close to perfect!

It is lightweight and small; moreover, it has both a large capacity and high-spec integration! It is an unprecedented power bank in every way. Here, we introduce to you, SMARTCOBY!

 

CIO Co., Ltd. has been featured in:

Developing Ideal Power Banks

Which kind of power bank is the most convenient?—The answer is a power bank which is suitable for daily use. Since almost everyone is using power banks for various purposes, the standard for "suitable for daily use" is very high.

Lightweight and compactness are major requirements, but if the installed capacity is 5,000mAh or less, it will not be able to charge current smartphones even once, and will have to be charged daily.

This will become tedious, and eventually the battery will end up being unused at home, or forgotten in a bag or backpack with no charge. Also, if charging takes too long, it may end up being replaced for a heavier (but larger capacity) power bank. 

If a different cable from smartphones is required, this will also lead to issues:

If it becomes necessary to carry around additional cables for the power banks, people may forget to bring the cables and they cannot charge their smartphones.

If the cables are broken once, they have to get a new one or they cannot use the power banks.

SMARTCOBY has cleared the essential requirements for daily use, and our power banks have better and more functions than before. 

 

Features of SMARTCOBY

  • Compact: 2.6x3.5x0.5inches (65x90x13mm)
  • Super lightweight: 0.3lbs (137g) the same as 2 eggs!
  • Compatible with PD 3.0 and QC4+, quick charge technology for the next generation.
  • MacBook compatible.
  • Multiple-functions are compatible with many devices.

 

01. Compact and Ultra Light

What satisfies you the most about daily use power banks? Small and lightweight power banks are the ideal power banks. With the latest LiNiMnCo (NMC) batteries, we have succeeded in producing safer and lighter weight power bank, compared to others on the market. 

 

SMARTCOBY weighs in at an incredible 0.3lbs, much lighter than the iPhone. Due to this, it adds little weight to your bag without the bulk and will not take much space on your desk.

SMARTCOBY guarantees space-saving power banks. 

 

02. Charge Your Smartphone More than Twice

If the capacity of your power bank is 2000-3000mAh, no matter how compact your battery is, it will not be able to charge a smartphone fully because modern smartphone batteries are hungry for more power. You may be deceived if you think charging once is enough. 

Ideally, fully charging your power bank daily will assure you have the needed backup power, but this is unrealistic.

Have you ever accidentally forgotten to charge your power bank and find your power bank is depleted when you need it the most?

In fact, the ideal capacity of power bank is the one that can charge your phone at least twice. Remember the larger the power bank capacity can be heavier. This makes most high-capacity power banks  unsuitable for daily use.

The credit-card sized SMARTCOBY, has succeeded in developing 8,000mAh capacity*.

*10,000mAh version is also available.

 03. Quick Charge Technology

Quick charge is often overlooked but actually is a very important point. Today's smartphones are compatible with all kinds of quick charge technologies, so if power banks have less than 5V/2.4A of output, it will not be able to meet the charging performance of this generation of smartphones.

It is such a waste that your smartphones are compatible with quick charge technology, but most power banks do not incorporate or provide quick charge technology.

"SMARTCOBY" is compatible with Power Delivery 3.0 and Quick Charge4+ (QC3.0 backward compatible), so it can quickly charge on both iPhone and Android devices.

SMARTCOBY can quick charge an iPhoneXS to about 50% capacity in only 30 minutes. 

In addition, it is also compatible with Macbooks and iPad Pro charging as it supports 18W output.

04. Rapid Charging of Power Banks

If the power bank charging speed is slow, its effectiveness will be halved even though the capacity is large.

On the other hand, if the recharging speed of the power bank is fast, you can recharge it to 40% capacity in only an hour. Even if you forget to charge it at night, you can quickly charge it the morning and it's ready for the day.

"SMARTCOBY" supports 18W rapid power recharging to the power banks, so you can fully charge it in just two and a half hours.

Note: In order to operate 18W rapid power charging, you need to use an adapter and a cable compatible with PD or QC.

 

 

05. Multi-function

Pass-Through Charging:

If you want to charge both your phone and your power bank with only one outlet, pass-through charging enables you to charge both your smartphone and recharge the power bank. 

 

 Compatible with USB-C and Lightning Input:

Generally, you need a Micro USB cable to charge most other power banks. Therefore, both iPhone and Android users must carry a dedicated cable for that power banks, which is very inconvenient.

By contrast, "SMARTCOBY" can be charged by either Lightning cables or USB-C cables. Android users can use USB-C cables, and iPhone users can use Lightning cables to charge SMARTCOBY, eliminating the need to carry two cables.

 

 

06. Convenient Accessories for Daily Use

Strap-hole: You can attach it a key ring or a hanging strap*, giving you flexibility.  

*Only 8000mAh models have a strap hole: not available on 10,000mAh models.

Storage Pouch and Cable Tie: We want you to use "SMARTCOBY" every day, so we are particular about the accessories. As a supporter of the "SMARTCOBY" campaign, you will receive a mesh fabric draw-string storage pouch. This pouch will make carrying the "SMARTCOBY" even more convenient.  In addition, a leather cable tie that can be attached to the strap hole is also available*. This makes keeping the "SMARTCOBY" cable neat and untangled in your bag.

* The 10000mAh model does not have a hanging strap and a cable tie. Only the storage pouch is included.

 

Choice of 8,000mAh models or 10,000mAh models

8,000mAh is simple single-tone surface to suit your daily life.

10,000mAh features a shiny rubber coating and TPE on the side to make the surface stand out; an enjoyable design.

Either model is recommended, please choose depending on your purpose and preferences.

 

Specifications of SMARTCOBY

 

Cables

MFi-certified USB-C cables and PD compatible charging cables (Android/Macbook/ USB-C compatible PC Version) are available, making SMARTCOBY even more convenient. 

MFi-certified USB-C to Lightning Cables

MFi-certified USB-C to Lightning cable is only 0.65ft and can charge from the iPhone 8* or up to the latest version of Apple devices**. Power Delivery enables quick charge. (MFi-certified Model: CIO 0101, CIO 0102)

*This cable can charge iPhone5/6/6s/7 even though these devices are not compatible with Power Delivery.

**iPhone8/8plus/X/XS/XS Max/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/iPad mini5/iPad Pro compatible

Android USB-C to USB-C cables

PD-compatible charging cable (Android/Macbook/USB-C compatible PC Version) is only 1.6ft. It is compatible with a maximum of 100W charging.

Since you can charge both your smartphone and computer using "SMARTCOBY", this cable is just the right length.

 

SMARTCOBY Design

 To achieve lightweight and 8,000mAh of capacity, we used the latest LiNiMnCo (NMC) batteries. 

We have produced two designs: 8,000mAh and 10,000mAh models.

Our Team

CIO Co., Ltd. was founded in 2017, operating mainly at EC malls such as Rakuten and Yahoo  Shopping in Japan. Based on the concept, "delivering the latest and most exciting gadgets♪", we do not just import the products,  but we are committed to developing new products for our customers. 

We have experience launching several projects, Super Mobile Charger and  deskHack on a Japanese crowdfunding site and successfully raised over $ 81,000 on each project. 

We have been striving to deliver Japanese high quality and cost-effective products to our customers. We are thrilled and really appreciate this opportunity to share our convenient and useful product to the world through Kickstarter and Indiegogo. 

 

SMARTCOBY Proof of Concept

We recently demonstrated a working prototype of the SMARTCOBY and shot the following video.

The following one-shot unedited video demonstrates a fully functional pre-production SMARTCOBY with all charging ports working. 

  • The USB-C port is shown to charge an iPhone11 with PD3.0 (USB-C to Lightning). 
  • The USB-C port is shown to charge a Macbook 2018 with PD3.0 (USB-C to USB-C).
  •  USB-C is shown to charge Galaxy Note9 with QC4+ and PD3.0(USB-C to USB-C).
  • While SMARTCOBY is being recharged via its USB-C input port (USB-C to USB-C), SMARTCOBY is able to charge the iPhone11 (USB-A to Lightning) at the same time.

Pass-through charging is also demonstrated. 

 

Project Timeline

 May 2019　Initial Product Conception

 June 2019 　SMARTCOBY8000 and SMARTCOBY10000 Product Design 

 July 2019 　Product Samples Developed

 September 2019 　Prototype Completed and Pre-production

 November 2019 　Kickstarter launched

 December 2019 　Begin Manufacturing

 February 2020 　Indiegogo launched

 March 2020 　Shipping to Distribution Centers

 April 2020 　Reward Shipping to all Backers

 

Thoughts on This Project

Even if you want to use the same old power bank every day while still being discontent because ... it is too heavy...or always runs out of power...or the charging takes forever!

We want to share with you a new sense of value because with "SMARTCOBY" you will realize that something so lightweight and high-spec can actually be amazingly useful!

"SMARTCOBY" can be a trigger to improve your quality of life. By cutting both charging and recharging times, your life can be improved by maximizing the convenience of this essential daily-use product.

That’s why we started this project.
