 Lightweight power banks often have only small capacity and are often depleted after one charge leaving the user without backup if recharging the power bank has been forgotten. 
Large capacity power banks are heavy. 
There are very few quick charge technology power banks and practically none are lightweight ones.

"CIO Co., Ltd." has succeeded in developing the ideal power bank by striving to attain 100% customer satisfaction. We have developed various new technologies through this project, such as lithium battery technology, transformer technology, and we have also improved the quality of the battery. Finally, we have succeeded in developing a power bank that is close to perfect!
It is lightweight and small; moreover, it has both a large capacity and high-spec integration! It is an unprecedented power bank in every way. Here, we introduce to you, SMARTCOBY!

 
CIO Co., Ltd. has been featured in:

Developing Ideal Power Banks
Which kind of power bank is the most convenient?—The answer is a power bank which is suitable for daily use. Since almost everyone is using power banks for various purposes, the standard for "suitable for daily use" is very high.
Lightweight and compactness are major requirements, but if the installed capacity is 5,000mAh or less, it will not be able to charge current smartphones even once, and will have to be charged daily.
This will become tedious, and eventually the battery will end up being unused at home, or forgotten in a bag or backpack with no charge. Also, if charging takes too long, it may end up being replaced for a heavier (but larger capacity) power bank. 
If a different cable from smartphones is required, this will also lead to issues:
If it becomes necessary to carry around additional cables for the power banks, people may forget to bring the cables and they cannot charge their smartphones.
If the cables are broken once, they have to get a new one or they cannot use the power banks.
SMARTCOBY has cleared the essential requirements for daily use, and our power banks have better and more functions than before. 
 
Features of SMARTCOBY

Compact: 2.6x3.5x0.5inches (65x90x13mm)
Super lightweight: 0.3lbs (137g) the same as 2 eggs!
Compatible with PD 3.0 and QC4+, quick charge technology for the next generation.
MacBook compatible.
Multiple-functions are compatible with many devices.


 
01. Compact and Ultra Light
What satisfies you the most about daily use power banks? Small and lightweight power banks are the ideal power banks. With the latest LiNiMnCo (NMC) batteries, we have succeeded in producing safer and lighter weight power bank, compared to others on the market.   
SMARTCOBY weighs in at an incredible 0.3lbs, much lighter than the iPhone. Due to this, it adds little weight to your bag without the bulk and will not take much space on your desk.
SMARTCOBY guarantees space-saving power banks.  02. Charge Your Smartphone More than Twice
If the capacity of your power bank is 2000-3000mAh, no matter how compact your battery is, it will not be able to charge a smartphone fully because modern smartphone batteries are hungry for more power. You may be deceived if you think charging once is enough. 
Ideally, fully charging your power bank daily will assure you have the needed backup power, but this is unrealistic.
Have you ever accidentally forgotten to charge your power bank and find your power bank is depleted when you need it the most?
In fact, the ideal capacity of power bank is the one that can charge your phone at least twice. Remember the larger the power bank capacity can be heavier. This makes most high-capacity power banks  unsuitable for daily use.
The credit-card sized SMARTCOBY, has succeeded in developing 8,000mAh capacity*.
*10,000mAh version is also available.

 03. Quick Charge Technology
Quick charge is often overlooked but actually is a very important point. Today's smartphones are compatible with all kinds of quick charge technologies, so if power banks have less than 5V/2.4A of output, it will not be able to meet the charging performance of this generation of smartphones.
It is such a waste that your smartphones are compatible with quick charge technology, but most power banks do not incorporate or provide quick charge technology. "SMARTCOBY" is compatible with Power Delivery 3.0 and Quick Charge4+ (QC3.0 backward compatible), so it can quickly charge on both iPhone and Android devices.
SMARTCOBY can quick charge an iPhoneXS to about 50% capacity in only 30 minutes. 

In addition, it is also compatible with Macbooks and iPad Pro charging as it supports 18W output.
04. Rapid Charging of Power Banks
If the power bank charging speed is slow, its effectiveness will be halved even though the capacity is large.
On the other hand, if the recharging speed of the power bank is fast, you can recharge it to 40% capacity in only an hour. Even if you forget to charge it at night, you can quickly charge it the morning and it's ready for the day.
"SMARTCOBY" supports 18W rapid power recharging to the power banks, so you can fully charge it in just two and a half hours.
Note: In order to operate 18W rapid power charging, you need to use an adapter and a cable compatible with PD or QC.
 

 
05. Multi-function
Pass-Through Charging:
If you want to charge both your phone and your power bank with only one outlet, pass-through charging enables you to charge both your smartphone and recharge the power bank. 
 
 Compatible with USB-C and Lightning Input:
Generally, you need a Micro USB cable to charge most other power banks. Therefore, both iPhone and Android users must carry a dedicated cable for that power banks, which is very inconvenient.
By contrast, "SMARTCOBY" can be charged by either Lightning cables or USB-C cables. Android users can use USB-C cables, and iPhone users can use Lightning cables to charge SMARTCOBY, eliminating the need to carry two cables.
   
06. Convenient Accessories for Daily Use
Strap-hole: You can attach it a key ring or a hanging strap*, giving you flexibility.  
*Only 8000mAh models have a strap hole: not available on 10,000mAh models.

Storage Pouch and Cable Tie: We want you to use "SMARTCOBY" every day, so we are particular about the accessories. As a supporter of the "SMARTCOBY" campaign, you will receive a mesh fabric draw-string storage pouch. This pouch will make carrying the "SMARTCOBY" even more convenient.  In addition, a leather cable tie that can be attached to the strap hole is also available*. This makes keeping the "SMARTCOBY" cable neat and untangled in your bag.
* The 10000mAh model does not have a hanging strap and a cable tie. Only the storage pouch is included.
 
Choice of 8,000mAh models or 10,000mAh models
8,000mAh is simple single-tone surface to suit your daily life.
10,000mAh features a shiny rubber coating and TPE on the side to make the surface stand out; an enjoyable design.
Either model is recommended, please choose depending on your purpose and preferences.

 

Specifications of SMARTCOBY

 
Cables
MFi-certified USB-C cables and PD compatible charging cables (Android/Macbook/ USB-C compatible PC Version) are available, making SMARTCOBY even more convenient. 
MFi-certified USB-C to Lightning Cables

MFi-certified USB-C to Lightning cable is only 0.65ft and can charge from the iPhone 8* or up to the latest version of Apple devices**. Power Delivery enables quick charge. (MFi-certified Model: CIO 0101, CIO 0102)
*This cable can charge iPhone5/6/6s/7 even though these devices are not compatible with Power Delivery.
**iPhone8/8plus/X/XS/XS Max/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/iPad mini5/iPad Pro compatible
Android USB-C to USB-C cables

PD-compatible charging cable (Android/Macbook/USB-C compatible PC Version) is only 1.6ft. It is compatible with a maximum of 100W charging.
Since you can charge both your smartphone and computer using "SMARTCOBY", this cable is just the right length. SMARTCOBY Design
 To achieve lightweight and 8,000mAh of capacity, we used the latest LiNiMnCo (NMC) batteries. 

We have produced two designs: 8,000mAh and 10,000mAh models.


Our Team

CIO Co., Ltd. was founded in 2017, operating mainly at EC malls such as Rakuten and Yahoo  Shopping in Japan. Based on the concept, "delivering the latest and most exciting gadgets♪", we do not just import the products,  but we are committed to developing new products for our customers. 
We have experience launching several projects, Super Mobile Charger and  deskHack on a Japanese crowdfunding site and successfully raised over $ 81,000 on each project. 
We have been striving to deliver Japanese high quality and cost-effective products to our customers. We are thrilled and really appreciate this opportunity to share our convenient and useful product to the world through Kickstarter and Indiegogo.  SMARTCOBY Proof of Concept
We recently demonstrated a working prototype of the SMARTCOBY and shot the following video.
The following one-shot unedited video demonstrates a fully functional pre-production SMARTCOBY with all charging ports working. 

The USB-C port is shown to charge an iPhone11 with PD3.0 (USB-C to Lightning). 
The USB-C port is shown to charge a Macbook 2018 with PD3.0 (USB-C to USB-C).
 USB-C is shown to charge Galaxy Note9 with QC4+ and PD3.0(USB-C to USB-C).
While SMARTCOBY is being recharged via its USB-C input port (USB-C to USB-C), SMARTCOBY is able to charge the iPhone11 (USB-A to Lightning) at the same time.

Pass-through charging is also demonstrated. 

 
Project Timeline
 May 2019　Initial Product Conception
 June 2019 　SMARTCOBY8000 and SMARTCOBY10000 Product Design 
 July 2019 　Product Samples Developed
 September 2019 　Prototype Completed and Pre-production
 November 2019 　Kickstarter launched
 December 2019 　Begin Manufacturing
 February 2020 　Indiegogo launched
 March 2020 　Shipping to Distribution Centers
 April 2020 　Reward Shipping to all Backers Thoughts on This Project
Even if you want to use the same old power bank every day while still being discontent because ... it is too heavy...or always runs out of power...or the charging takes forever!
We want to share with you a new sense of value because with "SMARTCOBY" you will realize that something so lightweight and high-spec can actually be amazingly useful!
"SMARTCOBY" can be a trigger to improve your quality of life. By cutting both charging and recharging times, your life can be improved by maximizing the convenience of this essential daily-use product.
That’s why we started this project.

story:
When at an event, you take pics or videos with your phone, you have to make a tough decision:

Should you immerse yourself in the thrill of the moment or capture that moment on your smartphone to remember forever?

"As a social influencer, using eyeQ  I'm no longer a videographer, I'm an active participant that gets to share the experience of being right there with my audience" 

-Adryenn Ashley

With eyeQ, you can do both. Simply slide your smartphone into the eyeQ Mixed Reality Smart Viewer, look through the lenses and — voila! — you simultaneously experience the moment while capturing, sharing, and live streaming it in real time.

It’s a total revolution in the way we view, capture, and record the world.

Not only does eyeQ let you capture images and video while viewing in first-person, it also comes with 16x zoom that lets you magnify what you’re seeing.

Why eyeQ?

Picture this: You’re in the middle of one of life’s special occasions. Maybe it’s your little one’s dance recital, your friend’s wedding, or a wicked surf competition. You want to capture it on video forever, so you use your smartphone, but you also want to see and experience the moment live.

Tired of pinching your phone screen when zooming and covering up what you are trying to capture? With eyeQ, you can zoom with a simple finger press on the touchpad.

With eyeQ you won't have to choose between experiencing or capturing the moment.

Just slip your smartphone into eyeQ and suddenly you can shoot the action while viewing it in eye-popping HD.  eyeQ’s advanced optics magnify your screen up 16x so you can view the live event in HD. The innovative touch pad interface connects through Bluetooth to activate all your phone’s camera functions. Its simple, one touch slide zoom action allows you to zoom in and out of the action while you view, record, live stream and share simultaneously.

 

It’s been a long research and development journey to create the most immersive viewing and recording experience ever conceived.

eyeQ and its custom-built app, complement your phone’s technology to produce a live experience that compromises nothing while you create lasting memories. Here are eyeQ’s key features

eyeQ turbo charges your phone's screen display. It captures visual input from your phone and displays it on a gorgeous screen inside your eyeQ immersive smart viewer. See the world in true HD.

eyeQ boasts advanced optics that let you zoom in and out of events as you watch or record. Current specs allow for up to 16x zoom — so you can view images at 16 times their normal size. You can use the zoom feature when shooting photos, recording video, or just viewing anything you want to look at.

eyeQ’s intuitive touchpad maps to a heads up display to control your phone's advanced camera features all at your fingertips.

eyeQ enhances the capabilities of your smartphone’s photo and video camera with advanced control functions. Shoot real time video or capture one special moment in a photo — all while experiencing the scene in rich immersive reality

eyeQ's Live app connects with your smartphone’s GPS and motion sensing capabilities to apply a time-stamp and geographic location to your videos, photos and panoramas.

eyeQ's ergonomic design enhances your phone's built-in image stabilization making it possible for you to view and capture action shots like never before.

The eyeQ app for iPhone and Android, provided free with the eyeQ viewer, controls all key functionality from one intuitive interface. We’re hard at work on even more exciting features, like drone piloting, first person viewing, support for a telephoto attachment, panoramic views, and more.

"As a social influencer, using eyeQ, I’m no longer a videographer, I'm an active participant that gets to share the experience of being right there with my audience"— Adryenn Ashley

“The eyeQ brings a technological edge to the avid sports fan’s experience. I see great potential for the adoption of augmented reality into the live game environment. By allowing the fan to capture treasured moments while not sacrificing the live experience itself, the eyeQ brings fans closer to the team and to each other.”— Matt Ryder,  Former SJ Sharks Executive

"WOW! This better than I imagined! I’d use it at so many venues…I love going to concerts and outdoor events and would  use it even if  I wasn’t capturing, it’s amazingly clear to view through!”— Jeremy Wall,  Founder /CEO  Lumenus

“Recording video with Pi’s eyeQ real life viewer is ten times better than my iPhone!!! It’s the spectators’ GoPro™”— CJ Jacobs, ReadWrite

“eyeQ  is something I really got excited about!  We wandered the show looking for new and different things, saw lots of cool airplanes and stuff like that…but with this thing I went WHOA – this is really cool!”— ESPN  Chauncey’s Great Outdoors

Watch the full ESPN interview >

Our initial inspiration for the eyeQ came from a galaxy far far away in the original Star Wars  episode when the electro-binoculars were first introduced.  We imagined how cool it would be to use them to solve a universal problem for missing exciting moments at live events while capturing them with our smartphones.

We have special memories and events we love to attend. Sometimes, we want to immortalize them in photo or video. When taking pictures or shooting video the usual way, your device ‘blocks the view,’ as you hold one arm outstretched with the device in front.

Our aim is to do away with the problems of normal smartphone filming – blurry footage, squinting at screens and missing out on the moment. We want to create a future where the moment is as precious as the memories, and we can enjoy BOTH in gorgeous hi-definition. This ‘immersive reality’ is what we want to bring to you and the world with the eyeQ – and we’re working every day to bring the dream to life.

We believe, if it’s worth capturing…it’s worth experiencing

Thank you,
Mary

About the Creators

Parle Innovation was born out of the curiosity and imagination of two tech entrepreneurs, Mary Parle Shulenberger and Art Shulenberger.

The duo’s goal was first and foremost to develop innovative, hi-tech solutions to modern day problems. EyeQ is nothing less than a revolution in spectator viewing and video capture and we’ve got a whole lot more planned after this. We’re counting on you, the Kickstarter community, to fund initial production and bring the first of many innovative tech products to life.

The eyeQ Team

 

 

 

 

 

Follow us | Instagram | Facebook | Twitter

Risks and challenges

Our eyeQ team has a strong background in product design and engineering. We have shipped products to leading companies around the world. Our software engineers have worked with Apple and Android development teams and we do not anticipate any compliance problems
We are building our technology and electronics on a widely used protocol.

We've previously submitted apps that work with this technology and the eyeQ’s touchpad. Our intuitive iOs App is currently available on the iTunes App Store, search: eyeQ Live.

Developing innovative hardware always carries risks, from design problems to unexpected costs. That's why from the very beginning it's been our priority to eliminate as many risks as possible. We've spent the last 24 months developing the eyeQ with several versions of working prototypes to make sure it is robust and reliable. We've also produced 10 pre-production prototype units to test the user experience and to flush out any remaining design and production issues.

While we are working hard to meet and exceed your expectations of our product, we do know there is potential for delays and miscalculations in our projections. In case of any mishap, we will do everything we can to communicate and make it right. We value your support and look forward to giving you an amazing eyeQ experience for years to come.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q Which iPhone models and sizes are compatible with eyeQ? How are different sized phones accommodated?

A The eyeQ is compatible with the latest iPhones and Galaxy smartphones with an adjustable universal mount that supports iPhones 6 - X including Plus series and the latest Samsung Galaxy smartphones from s5 up with the latest models with similar form factors as the supported iPhones.

Q Will eyeQ support a telephoto or wide angle camera like GoPro?

A Accessories sold separately or included with our stretch goals for the eyeQ will include:
Adaptors for telephoto and GoPro cameras
Pebble super charger 5000 mAh
Mono and tripods
eyeQ carrying bag

A Will  the eyeQ support AR apps?

Q eyeQ is Augmented Reality (AR) enabled and compatible with any AR content service that is produced to play on either an iPhone or Samsung smartphone.  This means that you will be able to not only take advantage of the real-life HD viewing capabilities inherent to the eyeQ but enjoy all the additional benefits of utilizing AR where available.   The opportunity to not only enjoy reality but to enhance the experience through the real time integration of information streams; life-like objects (including stationary and motion based) will significantly enrich your ability to enjoy the moment.  Further,  Parle Innovation, the developer of eyeQ will make venue specific AR available through team or league approved sources which is switch selectable (additional charges may apply).

Q What is the battery life of the eyeQ?  

A The eyeQ has a 400 mAh Li-Po rechargeable battery capable of operating the eyeQ all day (12+ hours of normal usage).  It will likely outlast your phone’s battery.

Q Is eyeQ compatible with iPhone only?

A The eyeQ is compatible with the latest iPhone and Galaxy smartphones designed with a universal mount that supports iPhones 6 - X including plus series and the latest Samsung Galaxy smartphones.

Q What happens if you're using your eyeQ and your phone rings?

A Great question! You would put your phone on "do not disturb" if you were videoing a special moment, same as when you are at a wedding, a recital or any live performance you are recording. Or you can always take a call, it’s super easy to remove the phone from the eyeQ mount and answer your phone call or text.

Q What will the warranty be on the eyeQ?

A The eyeQ branded device and eyeQ branded device accessories, will be covered under a warranty to be free from defects in materials and workmanship under normal use for a period of one (1) year from the date of purchase with any registered eyeQ product.

Q What kind of optics are in the eyeQ?  

A eyeQ has advanced precision optical glass lenses mounted in our unique synchronized inter-pupillary distance adjustment mechanism.  Lens power is optimized for immediate transition from direct vision viewing to eyeQ immersive viewing, with or without eyeglasses.

Q What is the weight of the eyeQ?

A Over the past two years, our engineers worked hard on making the eyeQ light and easy to carry.  Our product specifications require that the eyeQ should weigh no more than between 6 – 8 ounces.

Q Can my videos and photos taken with eyeQ be edited with GoPro or other 3rd party editing software?  

A Absolutely!  Photos and videos you take with the eyeQ and the eyeQLive app will be stored in your smartphone photo album or you can upload them to any cloud storage where they can be accessed anytime and brought into the editing software of your choice.

Q How will the eyeQ keep up with new smartphone releases – from a hardware and software perspective?

A The eyeQ’s phone mount accommodates a full range of physical sizes without need of modification.  Each new release of the eyeQ app will allow the app to recognize and work for new phone models as they become available.

Q What is Augmented Reality (AR)?

A Augmented reality is where information or virtual objects are displayed in the same field of view with the live display of a real scene.  Sports fans will recognize AR in the TV image display of a highlighted first down line in a football game.

Augmented reality is a subcategory of mixed reality, which refers experiences that overlay graphics on video streams of the physical world.

Q Will my smartphone fit into the eyeQ with it's phone case?

A The eyeQ will support your smartphones case as long as its not a bulky or thick wallet case.

Or you can always take a call, it’s super easy to remove the phone from the eyeQ mount and answer your phone call or text.Q What will the warranty be on the eyeQ?A The eyeQ branded device and eyeQ branded device accessories, will be covered under a warranty to be free from defects in materials and workmanship under normal use for a period of one (1) year from the date of purchase with any registered eyeQ product.Q What kind of optics are in the eyeQ?  A eyeQ has advanced precision optical glass lenses mounted in our unique synchronized inter-pupillary distance adjustment mechanism.  Lens power is optimized for immediate transition from direct vision viewing to eyeQ immersive viewing, with or without eyeglasses.Q What is the weight of the eyeQ?A Over the past two years, our engineers worked hard on making the eyeQ light and easy to carry.  Our product specifications require that the eyeQ should weigh no more than between 6 – 8 ounces.Q Can my videos and photos taken with eyeQ be edited with GoPro or other 3rd party editing software?  A Absolutely!  Photos and videos you take with the eyeQ and the eyeQLive app will be stored in your smartphone photo album or you can upload them to any cloud storage where they can be accessed anytime and brought into the editing software of your choice.Q How will the eyeQ keep up with new smartphone releases – from a hardware and software perspective?A The eyeQ’s phone mount accommodates a full range of physical sizes without need of modification.  Each new release of the eyeQ app will allow the app to recognize and work for new phone models as they become available.Q What is Augmented Reality (AR)?A Augmented reality is where information or virtual objects are displayed in the same field of view with the live display of a real scene.  Sports fans will recognize AR in the TV image display of a highlighted first down line in a football game.Augmented reality is a subcategory of mixed reality, which refers experiences that overlay graphics on video streams of the physical world.Q Will my smartphone fit into the eyeQ with it's phone case?A The eyeQ will support your smartphones case as long as its not a bulky or thick wallet case.

story:
The Syllucid Charge is not only convenient to use, it’s designed to create a better future for people and the environment.

Together with our partners, we’re working towards reforming our industry by ensuring greater accountability, more sustainable materials, better working conditions and fairer pay. At the same time, we’re investing into a reforestation project in the Peruvian Amazon.

We need tons of different cables and connectors to charge all our devices.

 

Cheap materials and poor design lead to cables that break easily -- a great excuse for companies to keep producing and selling more.  

 

Making these cables has a major environmental impact, and their supply chains hide a number of serious issues. For example, the electronics industry releases as much CO2 as all airplanes worldwide and the illegal mining of metals used in electronics is a major cause of deforestation in the Amazon.

 

Simplify charging

Never worry about having the wrong cable for your different devices.

 

Support all your devices

A single cable that works with all your Apple and Android devices, plus laptops and micro USB accessories.

 

Fewer cables

One clean, durable solution saves money and reduces clutter, plus cuts your environmental impact.

 

Easy to use

Simply plug in the connectors and you’ll always have the right cable with you.

 

Made for sharing

Save the day with the cable that’s perfect for you and your friend’s devices - no matter what brand they prefer!

Secure

Made with the strongest commercially available magnets.

 

Use with one hand

Connect quickly and easily, even if you only have one hand free.

 

Protect your devices

No more snags or damage caused by catching cables.

The last cable you need

Nylon braiding (100% recycled!) and extended strain relief improve toughness and durability. 

 

Gold-plated connectors

18k gold-plated connectors ensure stable, long-lasting connections.

 

Fairtrade isn’t just about farming -- it improves accountability and working conditions for miners, too! Because our cables contain gold, we're working with Fairtrade to support gold miners in Peru.

Fairtrade gold is sourced exclusively from small-scale mines that meet the Fairtrade Gold Standard: an internationally recognised best-practice indicator for workers’ rights and environmental protection.

 

Fair pay

Workers in Fairtrade-certified gold mines receive a guaranteed Fairtrade Minimum Price for their product. Buying our cable means you're supporting fair incomes for small-scale miners.

 

Safety

Small-scale mining is a dangerous occupation which often involves working in small, dark and poorly ventilated tunnels. Fairtrade raises awareness of health and safety risks and ensures proper safety equipment and policies are in place.

All electronics use tin solder to join components. Tin mining is known to fund wars, employ child labour and cause environmental damage, which is why it’s important to care where it comes from.

 

Responsibly sourced

We source all our solder from a company called Stannol. Stannol, working in collaboration with FairLötet, is committed to supporting social justice by investigating and securing fair and sustainable supply chains and to provide solutions for responsibly made electronics.

 

Accountability

Stannol and FairLötet are demanding more transparency, better accountability and fairer conditions within the electronics industry. That’s exactly what we are trying to achieve with our charging cable. Only by understanding how and where our products are made can we begin to improve the system.

Partnering with PUR Projet, we’ve committed to donating 5% of our profits to a reforestation and agroforestry project in Peru, a country particularly hit by gold mining in rainforest areas.

PUR Projet works with companies to regenerate ecosystems we all depend on. By empowering local communities to run long-term socio-environmental projects, they help companies strengthen their supply chains through agroforestry, land restoration and sustainable agricultural practices.

 

Reforestation

The project involves various planting activities including mixed-stand reforestation and agroforestry. By smartly integrating trees into farming systems, we’re helping farmers build resilience to climate change, improve soils and diversify income from sustainably-harvested FSCⓇ-certified timber.

 

Sustainability

PUR Projet also works to improve local skills by training farmers on agroforestry techniques and sustainable forest management, as well as working on capacity building with cooperatives to support stronger land rights for the farmers they work with.

 

 

Simplify your charging experience with the all-in-one essentials kit. Get the magnetic charger cable, all three connectors, a USB A adapter and a handy free carrying case… plus the peace of mind that you’re doing something great for the planet.

Choose the number of magnetic charger cables you want. Connector options are available once you select the perk.

 

Add-ons

Add-ons including our cable organiser, additional connectors and a USB A adapter are available at the checkout.

Want to support our cause but don’t need a charger cable? Consider one of the donation perks to help us change an industry. You’ll have our thanks for supporting our mission and for helping battle unnecessary consumption!

 

Originally working together at Fairphone, with a background in sustainability and electronics, we were frustrated by the lack of meaningful improvements being made to essential, everyday electronics. So we decided to be the ones to make a change. We took a deep dive into the core problems and possible solutions, and created a road map for fixing a broken industry.

Hélène Colpin, Claudia Carrillo, Liz Keel, Alice Blomberg, Nuala Keyser, Danique Jaspers, Anna Sørrig and the numerous others for all of the volunteer time, energy and hard work you’ve put in to make this project a reality.

 

 

Amazing progress towards fairer and more sustainable supply chains have been made for both food and clothing. However, electronics have a lot of catching up to do. We’ve made a fantastic first step to securing our supply chains, but we still have a long way to go.

We demand high standards when it comes to quality and are committed to producing long-lasting products to minimise your overall impact. This means not cutting corners and extended periods for quality control.

We’re currently a small enthusiastic team with a lot of work ahead of us. To take on an industry we need to grow, and we need your help to do it.

 

We started Syllucid because we believe the best way to disrupt an industry is from within. Buying our cable not only gets you an awesome product, but it helps us towards realising our mission for a fairer and more sustainable future for people and the environment.

We need your help to spread the word. Let your friends and family know by liking and sharing our story and campaign on social media.

story:
The First 60W GaN Charger for Every Apple Device in One

The Apple ecosystem of devices offers seamless integration from device to device. Except when it comes to chargers. You need to bring dongles, chargers for every device, and a multitude of plugs, cables, and adapters to connect each and every device.

Wattsugar puts a stop to the cable clutter. It brings you one charger for every Apple device. Charge your MacBook, your iPhone, your Apple Watch and your AirPods in 1 outlet through 1 device. Pretty sweet, right?   

Small & Made To Go With You 

 

 

Wattsugar was made to go with you wherever you go. It’s small and compact, about the same size as a men’s slim wallet, and will fit your on-the-go lifestyle, whether it’s from the coffee shop to the office to the airport.

Wattsugar charges all your devices from just one socket and gets rid of all your cable clutter at once.

One Charger for Every Apple Device

Wattsugar works with any Apple device, not just one. Wattsugar charges your MacBook (or Windows laptop), Apple Watch, AirPods (or wireless earbuds), iPhone (or Android smartphone), iPad (or Other tablets) through just one outlet.    

MacBooks (MacBook 12" / Air / Pro 13” / Pro 15”)

 

 

Apple Watch (Gen 1 to 5)

 

Note: Available only on Pro Versions 

 AirPods

iPhone & Android Phone

iPad & Other Tablets​

Quick Charge 4 Devices At The Same Time 

Wattsugar charges all your devices at the same time. No other charger can charge your laptop, phone (or 2 even phones), an Apple Watch, and your AirPods at the same time.

 

Charge Every Wired And Wireless Device  

Wattsugar is built with dual ports for USB-C (supporting both PD 3.0 and QC 3.0), USB-A, MFI Apple Watch magnetic wireless charging, and triple wireless charging areas.

Doubles as a Power Bank In A Pinch

Wattsugar is more than a regular wired charger. It doubles as a wireless Power Bank with a 5000mAh lithium built-in battery. Meaning you can charge your device on the go, even when you don’t have access to outlets like on trains, planes, and automobiles.

Go Wireless 

 

Charge your smartphone & AirPods or Apple Watch with up to 10W Qi wireless quick-charging. The Wattsugar Apple Watch charging area is certified for MFI Qi quick-charging. No outlets required.

Travel-friendly Pin Converters For Any Country

Wattsugar isn’t just for use when you’re in the city you live in. If you’re traveling internationally you can use its adapters to make it compatible with outlets in the UK, Australia, and Europe.

 

The Sweet Things Being Said About WattSugar

 

We’re really excited about WattSugar (like super excited) but we’re not the only ones who are excited to get an all-in-one charger for every Apple device that’s made for the on-the-go lifestyle! Check out some of the sweet things people have written about WattSugar.

 

Wattsugar vs Apple vs 60w Anker 

Two Versions for Your Needs

Oh That Sweet, Sweet 60W USB-C Quick

Charge

Using quick charging technology allows Wattsugar to support Power Delivery 3.0 and Quick Charging 3.0. And it’s designed to work with your laptop to charge devices with smart power distribution technology.  

  • With a USB-C output, you can charge your devices up to 2.7x faster than your old 18W charger. 
  • You can even bring your iPhone 11 Pro up to 50% in just 30 minutes.
  • Using an Android? Don’t fret, you can charge it to 80% in just 30 minutes.

Perfectly Made for Any Plug

Thanks to the extra wireless charging areas on its two sides (for AirPods), Wattsugar is perfectly designed for being used in different scenarios, like charging on a Wall-Plug or through power-bar thanks to the angle of the charger.

How to use Power Bank mode

When placed horizontally the Wattsugar allows you to use the 10W wireless charging pad located on its side to charge your phone or AirPods.

 

When placed vertically the Wattsugar allows you to use the two wireless charging pads made for AirPods and Apple Watches.

Safety in Sophistication

Within a small frame is an extremely sophisticated design, holding USB-C, USB-A, QC, and PD charging and an internal battery letting it function as a Power Bank. We wanted to make the smallest 60W charger ever, so we placed a circuit board and components in a compact and space-efficient way to save space. We used the most efficient parts in the industry (the ones delivering the best performance in the smallest space). The circuit board is closed off by thin, high-density heat sinks to help control and dissipate heat. Finally, we enclosed the entire Wattsugar in a fire-resistant, polycarbonate enclosure to keep it sleek and minimalist. 

Certifications passed and obtained for consumer safety by various organizations.

Pass-Through Charging and Overcharging

Wattsugar supports Pass-Through Charging, so you can charge other devices while Wattsugar's own battery is charging in a safe manner. There’s no worry about Overcharging either, as Wattsugar’s internal control circuit regulates the flow of electric currents to shut the power bank down when it reaches a 100% charge. 

Proof of Concept Video

 

Charging Mode

VIDEO 3

Power Bank Mode

What You’ll Get When You Order

The Wattsugar’s Specs

Product Dimensions:

  • Product Size: 3.5*3.5*1.5Inch /88.8*88.8*37.7mm
  • Product Weight: 284g / 10oz / 0.6 lb
  • Power Input: AC 100-240V 50/60Hz 3A Max
  • Max Power Output: 60W
  • Ports: 1 x USB-C and 1 x USB-A
  • USB-C: 60W Power Delivery 3.0, Quick Charge 3.0, 5~15V/3A, 20V/3A

Charger mode

  • USB-C output：5V3A、9V3A、12V3A 、15V3A 、20V3A
  • USB-A output：5V2A 10W Max
  • USB-C & USB-A total output(using at the same time)：C:45W A:10W
  • QI Charging output：2.5W
  • Smartwatch QI Charging output：2.5W

Battery mode

  • USB-C output：5V3A 15W Max
  • USB-A output：5V2A 10W Max
  • USB-C & USB-A total output(using at the same time)：5V3A Max（each 1.5A Max）
  • QI Charging output：2.5W
  • Smartwatch QI Charging output：2.5W
  • QI Wireless charging for smartphone: 10W

Wattsugar is compatible with:

  • Wireless Phones: iPhone11 / 11 Pro /11 Pro Max / XS / XS Max / XR / X / 8 Plus / 8 / Samsung Galaxy S10 / S10+ / S9 / S9+ / S8 / S8+
  • Wired : iPhone11 / 11 Pro / 11 Pro Max / iPhone XS / XS Max / XR / X / 8 Plus / 8 / 7 / 6; Samsung Galaxy S10 / S10+ / S9 / S9+ / S8 / S8+ / Note 8 / Note 7; Pixel 3/2/XL, Nexus 5X / 6P, LG G6 / G7 /Nintendo Switch
  • Apple Watch：Gen 1 to 5
  • iPad Models: iPad Air / iPad mini / iPad Pro 11” / iPad Pro 12.9” (3rd generation) / iPad Pro 10.5’’ / iPad
  • Mac Models: MacBook 12” (Retina, Early 2015 - 2017) / MacBook Air 13” (Retina, 2018 and later) / MacBook Pro 13” (2016 and later) / MacBook Pro 15”
  • Window Laptop: Dell XPS 13, XPS 15, Inspiron 13, Inspiron 7000 / Huawei MateBook X, MateBook X Pro, MateBook 13 WRT-W29, MateBook E, MateBook D / HP Elite X2, EliteBook X360, Spectre 13, Spectre 15, Spectre 360, Spectre folio 13-ak0000tu / Lenovo ThinkPad X1, YOGA730, and Xiaomi Air. and More

 

Note: Use a USB-C to Lightning cable for Power Delivery fast charging for iPad models earlier than 2018, and all compatible iPhones.

The Team Behind Wattsugar 

Wattsugar Is owned by Shenzhen Ruineng Wireless Technology Co., Ltd. We are a group of professionals with years of experience in producing electronics for consumers. We share a passion for innovation and technology.

When naming this device, we took our inspiration from energy booster in all of our lives - sugar. So whenever your device needs a boost of energy, all it needs is “a bite of sugar” from us.

story:
Review by GiGadgets

 

World’s Fastest SSD & 6-in-1 USB-C Hub


Your new high capacity all-in-one SSD storage and USB-C multiport adapter — TurboHub — combines the versatility with efficiency to expand your laptop's connectivity and equip you with all the tools you need to boost your productivity.

 

 

Forget about lack of storage

 

... or missing ports on your laptop

 

 ... or space-consuming ugly dongles




TurboHub is the ultimate all-in-one solution

you are looking for.

 
 
 

Review by Tech I Want

 

 

Review by Matt Talks Tech

 

 

 

 

Media About Us

Versatile Device Compatibility

 

Equipped with Thunderbolt 3 connector, your TurboHub is designed to work with both Windows and Mac laptops, as well as with the devices of today, tomorrow and yesterday.

...with your tablet

 

...with your smartphone

 

 

...with any other device

 

 

 

FEATURES 


 

macOS, Windows, ChromeOS, etc. — no matter what operating system you have installed on your laptop or computer, eventually, you'll need additional storage.

Along with providing multiport connectivity, TurboHub is the lightweight, pocket-friendly and high-capacity external solid-state drive (SSD) solution you are looking for.

With up to 4TB of available storage, you will get additional space to save all your media, data, game and program files and effectively boost your computing experience.

So why settle for anything besides the best external SSD?

 

Quickly Store, BackUp & Transport Your Files 

Looking for a storage that will backup your files, games, programs, videos and photos in seconds? 

Powered with a lightning-fast 950MB/s read and write system, TurboHub is the world's fastest SSD and USB-C hub. You will be able to transfer all the files from your cameras, drones, or computers to your TurboHub in a blink of an eye.

No additional software needed. Simply drag and drop your files!


3 Capacities to Fit your Needs


 

Need that extra space for storing all your presentations, work files, photos and video footages from vacations, family events, team retreats and more?

Available in 1TB, 2TB and 4TB capacities, TurboHub is the best external SSD for your storage needs, in any situation and anywhere you go.


 

 

6-in-1 USB-C Multiport Adapter

Gone are the days of the dongle-cluttered backpack or table. Thanks to its six optimized ports, TurboHub is a USB-C hub that significantly expands connectivity for your MacBook, and USB-C or Thunderbolt-enabled laptop. It allows you to connect 4K HDMI video output, USB Type-C and Thunderbolt 3 ports, 1GB Ethernet port, and an SD card reader to your laptop.

Time to mount up your device to an ideal workstation with the best external SSD.

  •  HDMI 2.0 Port: 4K60Hz port to connect multiple monitors and play 4K video without delay
  •  USB 3.1 hub: second-generation USB hub for high-speed data transfers.
  •  Thunderbolt 3: 40 Gbps high-speed USB to connect your Apple products to any device.
  •  Type-C USB: USB-C 3.1 Gen2 connector to ensure superior connectivity with mobile and accessories.
  •  SD Card Reader: A fast and convenient way of transferring data with 300MB/s.
  •  Ethernet Port: wired internet connection with 1000Mbps network speed

 

 

Expand Connectivity with Extension Cord

 
Each TurboHub comes with an extension cord. If your device is not easily accessible or only has a single USB-C port, simply use the cord to connect your TurboHub to your device.  Connect TurboHub everywhere and enjoy its speed and storage anywhere!
 
 
 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

Will TurboHub work with my device??

Does your device have a USB-C Port? Then yes!


No? Don’t worry. TurboHub comes with a USB-C to USB-A adapter, so you can easily connect your TurboHub to your device. Find it in the Add-ons section.

Is it possible to charge my MacBook when TurboHub is attached to it?

Yes, you can charge your Macbook with your TurboHub connected.

Should I get the dual or single Type-C connector? If you have a Macbook with two USB-C ports we recommend you to get the dual Type-C model. For all other devices with a single USB-C port we recommend the single Type-C model.
Does the single type-C connector have a slower write/read speed? No, they both have the same read and write speed.
Does TurboHub work with the new MacBook air M1 Chip? Yes, TurboHub works with the new MacBook Air M1 Chip.
Do I have to pay any other fees besides shipping? No, you don’t pay any VAT, we got you covered.

 

Have more questions? Check out all the FAQs here.

 

Turbo Data Transfers  


Featuring a second-generation Type-C USB port, TurboHub operates up to 7x faster than your traditional SSD storage — ensuring up to 950MB/s read & write speed.


Whether you are moving recently taken photos from your camera's SD card or a few GB of files from one computer to another, the fastest SSD and USB-C hub is always there for you to enjoy the efficient and lightning speed data.
 

 



       

Gigabit Ethernet Connectivity Port  

 

Unstable Wi-Fi connection? Sounds familiar? With a 1000Mbps (1Gbps) Ethernet port, your TurboHub ensures the reliable wired network connection you need. 

Whether you are playing online games or streaming 4K videos, you may be better off with a wired internet connection instead of your standard WiFi. Enjoy the power of speed.

 

Extra Deep SD Card Slot  

 

A compact and lightweight SD card reader is a perfect addition for any photographer, traveler, blogger, or videographer. TurboHub's heat-resistant and extra-deep SD Card reader ensures up to 300MB/s data transmission speed and efficiency.

No drivers. No special programs. Simply drag and drop media files from your SD card to your laptop.
 

ThunderBolt 3 Superior Port  

Thunderbolt 3 allows transferring data 8x faster than your standard USB 3. With its 40 Gbps speed and USB Type-C connectivity, Thunderbolt 3 will make sure that any data transfer task of yours is a matter of minutes.

It allows you to effortlessly connect your laptop to various devices. Thanks to this port, your TurboHub can handle two 4K displays, providing the speed, convenience, and ultimate flexibility you need.

 

Multiple Display Connectivity  

 

Having multiple displays is just…amazing!

 

Boost your productivity, enhance your gaming experience, or watch your favorite YouTube, Amazon Prime, or Netflix shows while getting ready for your presentation.

 

Powered with USB Type-C and HDMI ports, TurboHub makes it easy to link two additional screens to your laptop and create a versatile workstation all from a USB-C hub.

 

Easy Connectivity with Single or Dual Type-C

 

Your TurboHub comes in two options, with a single or dual USB Type-C connector to save you from the hassle of getting additional adapters.

It’s the same TurboHub, just best suited for your device’s ports. If you’ve got a device like a Macbook that has dual ports, you may want to choose a dual USB Type-C connector and enjoy Thunderbolt 3. Or if your laptop, tablet, or other devices feature a single Type-C port, the single USB Type-C connector is what you’re looking for. 

You’ll be able to confirm your choice in the post-campaign survey which we will send you via email.


 

Our Guarantees


14-Day Satisfaction Guarantee

If you’re not completely in love with TurboHub within 14 days of purchase, simply send it back to us for a full refund.

Guaranteed Delivery 

We guarantee the delivery of TurboHub to all our backers. If for any reason, we are unable to ship your TurboHub to your location, you will receive a full refund.

1-Year Warranty 

We guarantee that TurboHub is free from any defects under normal use and conditions, for a period of 1 year from the date of purchase. Our warranty extends to all TurboHub components.

Tax-Free Delivery 

We ship worldwide without applying a Value Added Tax (VAT) or other import taxes on shipping. 

 

TurboHub Demonstration 

 

Launch Windows or Linux on Your Macbook 

 

 

With this Macbook Pro SSD upgrade, you can easily boot Windows, Linux, or any other operating system with optimal speed.

 

Take your Gaming to the Next Level 

TurboHub is the perfect external SSD for XBox One, Playstation 5, or your PC! Install and boot your games faster right from your TurboHub, without cluttering your rig!
 

 

Durable and Lightweight Design 


The sturdy aluminum body,  ordered from renowned manufacturers and assembled with the best craftsmanship, encases all the components of your TurboHub, keeping your data and files intact wherever you are — in the office, on a plane, or at home.

TurboHub is a compact, portable, lightweight, and blazing fast external SSD and USB-C multiport adapter that is designed to work with your Mac and other devices.

TurboHub is for everyone 

From travel and food bloggers to businessmen, photographers and designers, everyone now needs the fastest SSD to stay on top of their work. What’s important is that this USB-C multiport adapter meets your needs and requirements and excels your expectations.

 

Add your favorite add-on while checking out


 

Hi!
We are the TurboHub team, and we are excited to welcome you to our official Indiegogo page.

We are a team of professional engineers, developers, R&D, marketing and communication specialists committed to building creative and versatile solutions to enhance productivity and provide new opportunities.

Derek and Jordan, the two engineering gurus of our team with over 10 years of product development experience started exploring the USB-C multiport adapter and SSD technology and successfully developed the pocket-size USB-C hub with the fastest SSD.

Technical Specifications

 

 

Let's look inside the TurboHub


 

What’s Included



 

Timeline 

 

TurboHub Production Process

 

 

 

Spread the Word  

Want to help us make TurboHub a real hyper product?  Spread the word about it, and let's together bring the fastest SSD and USB-C Hub to the world!

 







Press Kit

 

TurboHub is designed and fully managed by The Crowdfunding Formula (TCF), the biggest digital marketing team responsible for the top crowdfunding campaigns. Join our campaigns in raising an average of $1.2M.

story:
Meet SmartPad, a smart display that allows you to use as an Android tablet PC, monitor, and smart TV at the same time.

 

The SmartPad is not only multi-functional but also very powerful, convenient, and lightweight. Take it to go anywhere at any time. Perfect for designers, students, businessmen, gamer, coders, photographers, remote nomads.

  • Smart TV 

Watch your favorite live TV channels, movies, music videos from Hulu, Netflix, and more. You can access all the movies and TV shows that you like with our smart TV feature. True-to-life 4K Ultra HD pictures also provide a better TV experience.

 

  • Portable Monitor

SmartPad can connect with multiple devices including a laptop, smartphone, tablet, and gaming devices.  Boosting your productivity while increasing a perfect entertainment experience.

 

  • Android Tablet PC

Download countless APP from the Android market. Using it to edit your docs, video, web surfing, playing games, or you can even connect your SmartPad with a keyboard and mouse. SmartPad has what it takes under the hood to be ready for every demand in your busy life.

 

4K resolution brings bright colors and vivid images, which provides an enticing and thoroughly entertaining experience. The 16:9 screen proportion shows the real image of the game/scene/work perfectly and quickly. The 10 point touchscreen provides great pressure sensitivity and also allows multitouch.

 

Enjoy 4K picture quality that feels deep, natural, and real. See colors that are natural and beautiful to the human eye and look realistic.

 

SmartPad is able to multitask simultaneously, users can enjoy greater convenience with split-screen mood to complete their work, study, and entertainment.

 

  • Connecting With Type-C Output

Support external equipment through TYPE-C interface signal input. Connect the smartphone, Switch to SmartPad via Type-C cable. Including devices: Huawei mates serial 10 above, P serial 20 serial above;  Samsung Note serial 8 above, Galaxy 8 above.

 

  • Connecting With HDMI Output

Connecting games, laptops, and other peripherals with HDMI output. Including devices: Apple Macbook, TV box, Switch, PS4/5, and the other devices with HDMI output.

 

  •  USB 2.0

Video, pictures, music, and files can be automatically read through USB2.0 from the flash disk, which allows you to work with multi-devices at the same time and increase your working efficiency.

 

  • Mirror Projection

Under the same WI-FI environment, support cable-free projection mode, once you connected, enjoys greater freedom of wireless.

 

 

  • Built-in Batteries

The power to do more, built-in 10,000 mAh batteries provide 6 hours of power. Strong endurance to support you going.

 

  • Ultra-wide 14.1’’ screen

Incredible detail with a large screen brings you a fantastic enhanced visual experience.

 

  • Slim, lightweight, and portable

The precise design gives users the best experience. Thin and portable SmartPad is lightly to carry in a backpack. Ultra-thin width for only 5mm.

 

  • A specially designed stand

No need to spend extra money on a stand. SmartPad comes with a specially designed stand that provides a better user experience.

 

  • Landscape or Portrait Mode

With landscape or portrait mode, you can place it your way to get things down easily. It delivers you an awesome viewing experience when viewing websites or watching videos.

 

  • Customize your user interface

UI system allows users to select their favorite APP layout, no need to waste more time to locate your frequently-used APP. Moreover, editing the homepage album by scanning QR codes to upload its favorite memory as an electronic photo album.

 

  • Dual speakers & 2MP camera

Dual built-in speakers deliver stereo and clear sound from various media, bringing an enhanced immersive feeling. 2MP camera allows you to stay connected with your favorite people.

 

  • Sync Your Creativity, Write down your ideas and make them come to Life! 

When inspiration comes, seize it immediately with Lynkcool SmartPad. Tap the screen and use your stylish pen to write down or draw on Smartpad.

 Hands on Video

story:
The ”NEWMIRE DUO PHONECASE” is a unique and practical phone case which facilitates the multiple use of two phones, beyond simple storage functions. This product has been created by a developer who experienced firsthand the many problems of using two smartphone devices (including damages, loss, and storage).

 

We’ve solved the inconveniences of using just one phone while working on two or more tasks: which involves hiding the currently operating screen, running another task, and bringing up the previous screen again to continue the first task.

Utilizing two screens with two phones help people who require high use of mobile phones throughout the day due to work and other demands where they need to handle various tasks promptly and simultaneously.

You can simultaneously carry out various tasks (calls/ writing documents/ Internet/ apps/ taking photos & videos/ music/ SNS chatting/ games, etc.), including sending and receiving video feedback in real-time while working, contacting others with texts and chats while internet searching, and being active on social media while watching Youtube.

The convenience of this is in a different league to using typical phone cases or carrying around two phones separately. It’s the smartest way to handle work swiftly.

One-phone users, as well as existing two-phone users, can also add a spare phone to enjoy the Internet on two screens via Hotspot or WIFI, which will improve work efficiency and pleasure.

The Duo-Phone Case will serve as a useful product for general office workers, sales jobs (insurance sales, vehicle sales, other sales positions), transport jobs (freight transport, taxi driving, shipping, etc.), general salespeople (wholesale and retail traders, distributors, warehouseman, etc.), specialists (brokers, practitioners in law/medicine/education, etc.), the general public (students, housewives, freelancers, etc.) and their affiliated associations, organizations, companies, and more.

The extremely practical “NEWMIRE DUO PHONECASE” that saves valuable time and maximizes work efficiency, elevating the quality of your life.

 

 

 

 

The “NEWMIRE DUO PHONECASE” enables fast transitions between one-phone/ two-phone/ closed status.

The “two-phone status” that supports consecutive tasking offers the view of two phones laid alongside each other, maximizing the speed and efficiency of work processing. The case is easy to carry and store, while improving task accuracy and productivity: you can look at one screen while engaging in work on the other screen.

 

The “NEWMIRE DUO PHONECASE” is compatible with old and new models, including the iPhone Max, Galaxy Note, and all other large-sized models. You can use it for all cellphone models that are smaller than the one-sided size of the case’s body.

 

A type Only

The wallet type case allows the storage of cards, cash, and name cards inside, all at the same time. Its size is compact and slim enough to fit in your pockets.

 

You can attach and remove it to and from any area made of metal by using the magnet embedded in the phone case. For example, you can attach the phone to a fridge while washing dishes at home and playing music or videos, or do the housework while talking on your phone. You can also do simple repetitive work like packaging or storage while making work-related calls at the same time.

 

The case also features a slider. So you can shoot photos and videos, even while the mobile phone stays in the case, by pushing up the slider with one hand.

 

 

 

“NEWMIRE DUO PHONECASE” comes in 7 colors and 2 different types.

 

Between the 2 types, the A type is a wallet-type product featuring 8 card insertions and 4 cash-inserting pockets, and the B type is a product without the wallet feature.

Both types are able to accommodate two phones simultaneously. You can use the slider feature for shooting photos or video, as well as utilizing the varied folding styles. Contents can be watched in comfort by laying the case at a tilted angle.

 

 

 

The sliders are set up on the right-front side and left-back side of the body, while card insertions, cash slots, and suction cups are in the center body.

folding one body right will put the case in a two-phone active status. As magnets are embedded in the upper and lower body, the neighboring bodies stick to each other once the case is folded.

The suction cups located in the middle maintain a closed fastened status while the case is not being used, preventing the body from moving by sticking close to the mobile phone screen.

 

Open the case body, remove the tape cover on the slider.

Put the jelly case to the center based on the outer line.

Push the jelly case and slider up to check if the camera lens can be exposed outwardly.

Check if the camera lens is exposed outwardly and if it is, press the attaching side firmly. If the camera lens isn’t exposed, adjust the location of the jelly case.

Do the same for the other side’s slider surface, in the above order.

 

 

 

 

Aside from those already mentioned, the case accommodates most HTC, Sony, Huawei, OnePlus, and Motorola cellphones. 

Please check that your mobile phone size (including the jelly case) is within 3.26 inch(8.3 cm) width * 6.69 inch(17 cm) height (the size of one attaching side when folding the case).

Please check if the back of your phone (the adhesion side) is flat

 

 

 

 

 

 

Existing two-phone cases are bulky like bags and only play a simple storage function. A compact and smart case aiding a more convenient use of two phones beyond mere storage was needed.

To create a product with a high level of completion, we modified the design dozens of times and underwent numerous tests to enable an application to all models. 

Through the “NEWMIRE DUO PHONECASE,” we hope more people to use their two phones with utmost comfort and will continue to strive to showcase even more original and groundbreaking products to our customers with ceaseless research and development.

 

We often had to use two phones due to work reasons, but two-phone cases that were sold in the current market were closer to bags than cases. After struggling to find a desirable product, we decided to make a two-phone case ourselves.

We attached a slider for convenience and designed the case as a wallet type to offer storage for cards and cash as well. The various folding styles, including one phone, two phone, and inactive status, allow the case to be used as each individual wants.

“NewmireTech” is a company specializing in mobile phone accessories with the pursuit of novel, revolutionary, and person-centered products. We wish many people to use their two smartphones without any discomfort through “NewmireTech.”

 

Please first send the payment confirmation sheet, quality assurance, and product photo via e-mail within 14 days of receiving the product.

Exchange for a new product will be available once you send the product as instructed after the above has been checked.

Exchange is unavailable for product damages attributable to the user, and free exchange is available for 1 year for malfunctions due to the defects in the product itself. (The shipping fee should be paid by the customer.)

 

[When an exchange is unavailable]

Cancellation after the completion of the funding is unavailable, and cancellation is possible until the funding closes.

  • Scratches or damages caused by the customer
  • When the tag and label have been removed by the customer
  • When the refund schedule is not complied with (within 14 days after the product arrives)

[Management & Maintenance Guide]

  • Please set up the phone case before fastening the device.
  • Directly attaching the case to the phone may cause damages.
  • Dry cleaning is recommended for maintaining the original color and shape.
  • Do not to wash the case to prevent damages.
  • The leather case must be protected from water.
  • For occurrences of deformation, clean and dry with a soft and dry fabric.
  • Avoid frequent use of leather cleaner and avoid all contact with solvents, products containing alcohol, or oily products to prevent leather damages.
  • As leather products are extremely sensitive to light, take caution to not expose them to light or artificial light for long hours.
  • Do not expose the product to bright light for long hours.
story_txt:
The ”NEWMIRE DUO PHONECASE” is a unique and practical phone case which facilitates the multiple use of two phones, beyond simple storage functions. This product has been created by a developer who experienced firsthand the many problems of using two smartphone devices (including damages, loss, and storage). We’ve solved the inconveniences of using just one phone while working on two or more tasks: which involves hiding the currently operating screen, running another task, and bringing up the previous screen again to continue the first task.Utilizing two screens with two phones help people who require high use of mobile phones throughout the day due to work and other demands where they need to handle various tasks promptly and simultaneously.You can simultaneously carry out various tasks (calls/ writing documents/ Internet/ apps/ taking photos & videos/ music/ SNS chatting/ games, etc.), including sending and receiving video feedback in real-time while working, contacting others with texts and chats while internet searching, and being active on social media while watching Youtube.The convenience of this is in a different league to using typical phone cases or carrying around two phones separately. It’s the smartest way to handle work swiftly.One-phone users, as well as existing two-phone users, can also add a spare phone to enjoy the Internet on two screens via Hotspot or WIFI, which will improve work efficiency and pleasure.The Duo-Phone Case will serve as a useful product for general office workers, sales jobs (insurance sales, vehicle sales, other sales positions), transport jobs (freight transport, taxi driving, shipping, etc.), general salespeople (wholesale and retail traders, distributors, warehouseman, etc.), specialists (brokers, practitioners in law/medicine/education, etc.), the general public (students, housewives, freelancers, etc.) and their affiliated associations, organizations, companies, and more.The extremely practical “NEWMIRE DUO PHONECASE” that saves valuable time and maximizes work efficiency, elevating the quality of your life.    The “NEWMIRE DUO PHONECASE” enables fast transitions between one-phone/ two-phone/ closed status.The “two-phone status” that supports consecutive tasking offers the view of two phones laid alongside each other, maximizing the speed and efficiency of work processing. The case is easy to carry and store, while improving task accuracy and productivity: you can look at one screen while engaging in work on the other screen. The “NEWMIRE DUO PHONECASE” is compatible with old and new models, including the iPhone Max, Galaxy Note, and all other large-sized models. You can use it for all cellphone models that are smaller than the one-sided size of the case’s body. A type OnlyThe wallet type case allows the storage of cards, cash, and name cards inside, all at the same time. Its size is compact and slim enough to fit in your pockets. You can attach and remove it to and from any area made of metal by using the magnet embedded in the phone case. For example, you can attach the phone to a fridge while washing dishes at home and playing music or videos, or do the housework while talking on your phone. You can also do simple repetitive work like packaging or storage while making work-related calls at the same time. The case also features a slider. So you can shoot photos and videos, even while the mobile phone stays in the case, by pushing up the slider with one hand.   “NEWMIRE DUO PHONECASE” comes in 7 colors and 2 different types. Between the 2 types, the A type is a wallet-type product featuring 8 card insertions and 4 cash-inserting pockets, and the B type is a product without the wallet feature.Both types are able to accommodate two phones simultaneously. You can use the slider feature for shooting photos or video, as well as utilizing the varied folding styles. Contents can be watched in comfort by laying the case at a tilted angle.   The sliders are set up on the right-front side and left-back side of the body, while card insertions, cash slots, and suction cups are in the center body.folding one body right will put the case in a two-phone active status. As magnets are embedded in the upper and lower body, the neighboring bodies stick to each other once the case is folded.The suction cups located in the middle maintain a closed fastened status while the case is not being used, preventing the body from moving by sticking close to the mobile phone screen. Open the case body, remove the tape cover on the slider.Put the jelly case to the center based on the outer line.Push the jelly case and slider up to check if the camera lens can be exposed outwardly.Check if the camera lens is exposed outwardly and if it is, press the attaching side firmly. If the camera lens isn’t exposed, adjust the location of the jelly case.Do the same for the other side’s slider surface, in the above order.    Aside from those already mentioned, the case accommodates most HTC, Sony, Huawei, OnePlus, and Motorola cellphones. Please check that your mobile phone size (including the jelly case) is within 3.26 inch(8.3 cm) width * 6.69 inch(17 cm) height (the size of one attaching side when folding the case).Please check if the back of your phone (the adhesion side) is flat      Existing two-phone cases are bulky like bags and only play a simple storage function. A compact and smart case aiding a more convenient use of two phones beyond mere storage was needed.To create a product with a high level of completion, we modified the design dozens of times and underwent numerous tests to enable an application to all models. Through the “NEWMIRE DUO PHONECASE,” we hope more people to use their two phones with utmost comfort and will continue to strive to showcase even more original and groundbreaking products to our customers with ceaseless research and development. We often had to use two phones due to work reasons, but two-phone cases that were sold in the current market were closer to bags than cases. After struggling to find a desirable product, we decided to make a two-phone case ourselves.We attached a slider for convenience and designed the case as a wallet type to offer storage for cards and cash as well. The various folding styles, including one phone, two phone, and inactive status, allow the case to be used as each individual wants.“NewmireTech” is a company specializing in mobile phone accessories with the pursuit of novel, revolutionary, and person-centered products. We wish many people to use their two smartphones without any discomfort through “NewmireTech.” Please first send the payment confirmation sheet, quality assurance, and product photo via e-mail within 14 days of receiving the product.Exchange for a new product will be available once you send the product as instructed after the above has been checked.Exchange is unavailable for product damages attributable to the user, and free exchange is available for 1 year for malfunctions due to the defects in the product itself. (The shipping fee should be paid by the customer.) [When an exchange is unavailable]Cancellation after the completion of the funding is unavailable, and cancellation is possible until the funding closes.
Scratches or damages caused by the customer
When the tag and label have been removed by the customer
When the refund schedule is not complied with (within 14 days after the product arrives)
[Management & Maintenance Guide]
Please set up the phone case before fastening the device.
Directly attaching the case to the phone may cause damages.
Dry cleaning is recommended for maintaining the original color and shape.
Do not to wash the case to prevent damages.
The leather case must be protected from water.
For occurrences of deformation, clean and dry with a soft and dry fabric.
Avoid frequent use of leather cleaner and avoid all contact with solvents, products containing alcohol, or oily products to prevent leather damages.
As leather products are extremely sensitive to light, take caution to not expose them to light or artificial light for long hours.
Do not expose the product to bright light for long hours.

story:
Modmount is the world's first smartphone mounting system that integrates accessorized smartphones into an active lifestyle.

 

  • Works with all the world's best selling smartphone accessories

  • By far the most affordable all-in-one solution on the market

  • Made in The USA!

 

At the heart of Modmount is our patent pending, Friction Fit locking connection, which allows you to use, carry, and charge your smartphone — with your favorite accessories, hands-free and on-the-go like never before!

Everything is available in BLACK and WHITE.​

 

Compatible Accessories

If you own a Popsocket, Loopy Case, or Finger Ring, there has been no way to fully integrate it into your active lifestyle. Until now.

Our ultra-slim (2.1mm) Universal Adapter attaches to the back of most smartphones and cases with industrial strength 3M adhesive and is wide enough for your favorite accessory.

Gone are the days of choosing between either your favorite accessory or a mounting system. With Modmount, you can have it all! 

 

MagSafe

...has a problem: the magnets aren’t strong enough to endure the rigors of an active lifestyle. Enter Modmount!

The MagSafe charging puck fits seamlessly in to each mount, allowing you to wirelessly charge any phone, not just the iPhone 12, on the go with your new Apple MagSafe charger. 

Further, Apple throttles third party wireless charging accessories from 15 watts down to 7.5 watts (for safety reasons). That makes Modmount the world’s only mounting system capable of wirelessly charging the iPhone 12 at 15 watts. So if you just purchased the iPhone 12, you’re in luck! With Modmount you can charge your smartphone twice as fast as you can with any other system.

 

The Mounts

 

Shoot portrait or landscape, interchangeably — with the Tripod Mount.

 

Carry your phone on any backpack strap, belt, sling, or fanny pack — with the Strap Mount.

 

FaceTime hands-free — with the Wall Mount.

 

Track your ride — with the Bike Mount.

 

Navigate at a glance — with the Vent Mount.

 

Keep your phone handy while exercising — with the Armband Mount.

 

Modmount is for you if...

  • You love one or more of the following: MagSafe, Popsockets, Loopy cases, finger rings, etc.
  • You value ultra-portability and elegant design
  • You want less but better stuff
  • You lead an active lifestyle
  • You want to get the most out of your smartphone
  • You want high quality products that don't break the bank
  • You want to support companies that manufacture their products in the USA

 

 

Why Order Now?

By backing now, you’ll be getting one of the very first products off the line, at exclusive introductory prices (50% off retail), plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 

30 Day Money-Back Guarantee

We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you are not happy with what the Modmount Smartphone Mounting System can do for you, then you can return your purchase within 30 days for a full refund or exchange less the return shipping.

 

 

Please Spread The Word!

Like what you're seeing? Want to help? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Click on one of the buttons below and tag your family, friends, or coworkers who needs this! The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we will be able to make the product!

We can't do this without you.

Instagram

Facebook

Twitter

YouTube

 

Become an Affiliate!

At Modmount, we strongly believe that our success is tied to the success of our affiliates. Because of this belief, we treat our affiliates with as much care as we treat our customers. Highlights of our affiliate program are:

  • An unbeatable 50% commission on all direct sales and  a 20% commission on all sales from affiliates you recruit
  • 30 day cookie—You get credit for any orders within 30 days of the original click placed by the customer
  • Exclusive monthly newsletters with special promotions, content, and codes that you can adapt for your own marketing efforts

For more info on how to join our program, click here.
