story:
SUPER" is the epic all-in-one powerbank for all your charging needs. It is the king of instant power!

It has two of the highest 100W & 65W Input / Output USB-C PD ports for starters. Then, in spite of being super compact and lightweight, it also has two 22W & 18W USB-A QC 3.0 ports and one 10W built-in wireless charging pad. So it can charge 5 devices at the same time with universal compatibility.

 

Review Video by OSReviews

 

 

SUPER has world's highest 100W  & 65W USB-C PD 3.0 output. Those unrivaled PD ports make SUPER has highest PD output among powerbanks while most of the competition struggles to even reach single 60W. 

With the 100W USB-C PD port, SUPER can charge your devices that require a high input, such as MacBook Pro 16" or Wacom MobileStudio Pro 16", all at (100W) top speed.  SUPER charge MacBook Pro 16" (100Wh total) from 0% to 80% in 1 hour only.

SUPER has more of everything! It has not only 1 but 2 USB-C PD ports.  The 100W and 65W USB-C PD ports of SUPER enable it to charge 2 MacBook Pro 13" (61W) at top speed（65W each). These PD ports make SUPER the highest PD output in the world of powerbanks, given that most of the competition struggle to provide even a single 60W port.

 SUPER has 2 industry-leading powerful 22W & 18W USB-A Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 ports that support all major fast charge protocols including Apple, Samsung, HUAWEI, Vivo, Oppo and OnePlus.

SUPER charges your smart devices 4 times faster than others.

But what if you forget your cable?

Don’t worry! SUPER’s 10 W wireless charging pad charges all compatible devices quickly and cable-free! 

SUPER's 10W no-mess, no-fuss wireless charging output has a greater capacity than most smartphones require, e.g., 7.5W of iPhone 11, and it charges 1.5 times faster than most wireless charging pads, which is way faster than you could expect! 

To recap some of SUPER’s outstanding features: it has not only has 2 USB-C Power Delivery 3.0 ports but also 2 USB-A ports and even a wireless charging pad. SUPER can charge up to 5 devices at the same time!

If you’re wondering what kinds of devices SUPER can charge – the only limit is your imagination! Devices include smartphones, laptops, cameras, Nintendo switch, AirPods Pro, Tablet, Bluetooth Speaker and Wireless Mouse and the list goes on . 

SUPER puts an end to family arguments and workplace stress because there is no need to argue over who gets to charge their device first, with SUPER you can charge them all.

Being the world's fastest charging powerbank would mean nothing if the capacity was tiny. With SUPER we are proud to say that as well as being the world's fastest powerbank, SUPER also has a huge 26,800mAh(99Wh) capacity.

So, how many times can SUPER fully charge all these popular devices. 

With SUPER's 26,800mAh huge capacity, your devices can be fully charged in multiple times. 

But what if you still want to know the exact running time you can expect from SUPER for your devices?​

 

The mega 26,800 mAh capacity means SUPER can fully charge your iPhone 11 up to 8 times for close to one week of usage, or enable MacBook Pro 13"(58wh) to run for an extra 18 hours approximately. 

So when you’re out and about you don’t need to panic about finding available outlets at a café or restaurant anymore! SUPER keeps your device working.

Nobody cares about a powerbank with a huge capacity if it takes forever to recharge. 

Above all else SUPER saves you time. It can fully recharge in only 1.7 hours by using the 100W compatible cable and charger. It saves you 4.8 hours compared to the usual mainstream 18W input. And you can recharge SUPER using its 65W PD port while still actively charging a device via its 100W PD port. 

But what about smartphones?

Rush hour for most people is the start of the day when you need all your devices ready to use. And not everyone has the 1.5-hour recharge of their laptop during rush hour. But the 10 minutes recharging time SUPER requires to top up your smartphone – that’s do-able! 

You can get full power on your iPhone 11 (3,110mAh) by recharging with SUPER in just 10 minutes! That’s your busy day covered!

To save your even more time, SUPER’s unbeatable combination of a 100W & a 65W USB-C PD port support pass through charging so you can charge your devices AND SUPER at the same time, through a single power outlet.  

It’s worth mentioning again - With the world's fastest charging & recharging speed, SUPER is the world's fastest powerbank.

Nobody wants to carry a monster size powerbank around all day. Amazingly, SUPER is pocket size. 

 To To give you some perception of SUPER’s compact size, it measures 184.5mm in length x 85mm in width x 25 mm in thickness（7.26“x 3.35"x 1"), which is about two-thirds of the Nintendo Switch. That means it’s sufficiently compact for you to put it in your pocket or bag. 

And being neatly pocket sized, with a huge recharging capacity, does not mean it’s a heavyweight. SUPER weighs a mere 580g (1.28 lbs) only, which means it is genuinely portable for everyone!

The top-class quality of SUPER extends all the way to the high-quality Panasonic™ batteries that are incorporated in SUPER. These batteries are widely used in Tesla™ electric vehicles.

Known for being safety-oriented, these batteries not only extend battery life, they maintain a far higher durability than conventional powerbanks, which equates to far less power loss over a long period of use, i.e., 80% capacity remains even after 1,000 battery cycles.

Your safety is more than everything. So we use high quality material for both interior and exterior part with multiple protection. 

We proudly offer a multi-protection guarantee for the safety of you, your devices and SUPER. 

And all electronic products should be subjected to rigorous industrial testing quality products in order to achieve international certification, however many are not or do not pass. SUPER, however, has been quality tested for safety and reliability.

SUPER is made of aircraft grade aluminum which you will only see in the construction of aeroplanes and some select high-end luggage. This commitment to quality is what makes SUPER a stand-out in the market, for its incredible lightweight and intensely durable construction. 

 

So how does SUPER blow the competition out of the water? Check this out.

Even the most valiant of Knights needs to have the best horse! Now introducing SUPER’s faithful side-kick, the ultra-compact 100W GaN charger for recharging SUPER.

SUPER 100W GaN charger has not only 1 but 2 USB-C PD 3.0 ports. It can charge 1 device by 100W output or 2 devices 45W output each. 

The credit card size 100W GaN charger is 50% lighter compared to the MacBook 96W charger – it doesn’t get more portable than that!

 

You can charge the MacBook Pro 16"(96W) at top speed just like using the Apple's charger which makes GaN a rare and much appreciated compatible tool! 

SUPER GaN charger is clever in its own right – with two USB-C PD ports - so you can charge your laptop or smartphone with 45W output while recharging the SUPER with 45W speed.

 

 

Here's how the math works. This chart shows SUPER's total output when charging multiple devices simultaneously.

We designed SUPER, knowing full well the needs of our users because they are exactly the same as our needs! Like everyone, we also rely on communicating via our devices to stay in touch with colleagues, friends and family every day. Like you, we use Facebook, Whats App and watch YouTube videos when commuting.

We share the same frustration, of using our laptops in cafes, without being able to plug in anywhere. We don't want to wait for recharging, we want a reliable power bank that has unlimited power. 

Probably like you, we have purchased multiple power banks over time – some too heavy to be portable, some too lightweight to meet our power needs and every single one lacking the fundamentals of power, capacity and speed. 

So, to solve your problems we solved our problems and created SUPER – the world's fastest charger that is portable with longevity that only Tesla batteries can provide. It only takes 10 minutes to recharge so you can go out with enough spare power to fill an iPhone. SUPER ensures your MacBook can run for an additional 15 hours, and that your friends, colleagues, and family always have power. 

Over 30,000 Harbor Dynamics lovers gave a thumbs up.

SUPER weighs a mere 580g (1.28 lbs) only, which means it is genuinely portable for everyone!The top-class quality of SUPER extends all the way to the high-quality Panasonic™ batteries that are incorporated in SUPER. These batteries are widely used in Tesla™ electric vehicles.Known for being safety-oriented, these batteries not only extend battery life, they maintain a far higher durability than conventional powerbanks, which equates to far less power loss over a long period of use, i.e., 80% capacity remains even after 1,000 battery cycles.Your safety is more than everything. So we use high quality material for both interior and exterior part with multiple protection. We proudly offer a multi-protection guarantee for the safety of you, your devices and SUPER. And all electronic products should be subjected to rigorous industrial testing quality products in order to achieve international certification, however many are not or do not pass. SUPER, however, has been quality tested for safety and reliability.SUPER is made of aircraft grade aluminum which you will only see in the construction of aeroplanes and some select high-end luggage. This commitment to quality is what makes SUPER a stand-out in the market, for its incredible lightweight and intensely durable construction.  So how does SUPER blow the competition out of the water? Check this out.Even the most valiant of Knights needs to have the best horse! Now introducing SUPER’s faithful side-kick, the ultra-compact 100W GaN charger for recharging SUPER.SUPER 100W GaN charger has not only 1 but 2 USB-C PD 3.0 ports. It can charge 1 device by 100W output or 2 devices 45W output each. The credit card size 100W GaN charger is 50% lighter compared to the MacBook 96W charger – it doesn’t get more portable than that! You can charge the MacBook Pro 16"(96W) at top speed just like using the Apple's charger which makes GaN a rare and much appreciated compatible tool! SUPER GaN charger is clever in its own right – with two USB-C PD ports - so you can charge your laptop or smartphone with 45W output while recharging the SUPER with 45W speed.  Here's how the math works. This chart shows SUPER's total output when charging multiple devices simultaneously.We designed SUPER, knowing full well the needs of our users because they are exactly the same as our needs! Like everyone, we also rely on communicating via our devices to stay in touch with colleagues, friends and family every day. Like you, we use Facebook, Whats App and watch YouTube videos when commuting.We share the same frustration, of using our laptops in cafes, without being able to plug in anywhere. We don't want to wait for recharging, we want a reliable power bank that has unlimited power. Probably like you, we have purchased multiple power banks over time – some too heavy to be portable, some too lightweight to meet our power needs and every single one lacking the fundamentals of power, capacity and speed. So, to solve your problems we solved our problems and created SUPER – the world's fastest charger that is portable with longevity that only Tesla batteries can provide. It only takes 10 minutes to recharge so you can go out with enough spare power to fill an iPhone. SUPER ensures your MacBook can run for an additional 15 hours, and that your friends, colleagues, and family always have power. Over 30,000 Harbor Dynamics lovers gave a thumbs up.

story:
"The Mako portable monitor not only has a really solid look and feel but is also super responsive...a great addition to your home office set up, with the added bonus that you could take it anywhere." - Eileen Brown, ZDNet

With more people working from home, remotely or in offices, we know that having dual-screens can help boost productivity, for a whole range of people:

Whatever you do on the computer, having the 2nd screen is a game-changer. 

 

Now, you can quickly and easily expand your viewing pleasure with the Mako monitor for a bigger screen or simply to view two things at once. 

 

 

Forgo the mouse, and level up your workstation so that you can multi-task like a pro - pinch to zoom in, flick to move things, or scroll up and down pages with your finger.

In a meeting or presentation and need to share something with the rest of the team? No sweat, simply connect your device to the Mako, and away you go. 

Over the past year, we have worked with some of the greatest product-design studios to push the edges of innovations.

Since September 2020, the Mako has already entered mass production. As of now, more than 1000 units are ready to ship out!

   

The project is currently in the mass-production phase. This means that we’ve worked out the major kinks of the product, tested them thoroughly with a number of sample devices which you can see in the images above from the production line.

 

Next up is suppliers & fulfillment services, i.e shipping. We’ve got this worked out already and have key partners ready and waiting to provide expert services to ensure that you receive not only the very best product but the product before Christmas.

 

We will strive to do our best to ensure a smooth production run and in return for your support, and appreciate you being an early supporter and with that, we will work hard to maintain your trust through transparent communication and fulfill our promise to deliver the product to you.

story:
Expected Delivery: December 2021

 

 

Say Hello to the D5.

THE 4-IN-1 FAST WIRELESS CHARGING DOCKING STATION AND BLUETOOTH SPEAKER

 

 

 

 

 

What is the Dockall D5?

The Dockall D5 is a 4-in-1 sound system, fast wireless charger, docking station, and speakerphone. Created as the ultimate companion for all of your devices. Designed with an eye on the future with industrial grade durable materials.

 

 

 

 

Why We Are Making the D5?

Declutter:

We wanted our device to cut down on desk clutter by providing a central point where all devices could be charged. So we added the vertical wireless charging coils and a charging pad so that wireless enabled devices could be charged with ease. We added two USB ports to the back of the device to make it easier to charge multiple devices at once.

 

 

 

 

Create the perfect companion for remote Work:

With the modern popularity of virtual meeting applications like Zoom and Microsoft Teams, we knew our device had to offer a solution that could accommodate these types of communication platforms. That’s why the DockAll D5 has an upgraded Near Field Microphone with Active Noise Cancelation to make virtual conferencing easy and efficient.  The D5’s two 8 Watt Bluetooth speakers ensure that any audio coming from a connected device is clear and high in fidelity.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Designed With the Future in Mind:

As we move towards the future we wanted to create something that would stand the test of time not only in terms of durability but in terms of design as well. This desire made us seek out space age materials to use in the design and production of the D5. The D5 is made out of a durable industrial strength plastic with rubberized texturing on the charging pad and brushed metal accenting the control panel.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

An Enhanced User Experience:

From our previous endeavors we knew that one of the most important aspects of any consumer solution is the user’s experience, that’s why we added an LED light strip outlining the front of the D5, which illuminates when a user’s device is being charged. Not only does this feature ensure that anyone using the D5 knows when their device is charging, but we also think it just looks really cool. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Who We Are and Why We Are Here?

2020 was an unexpected year that saw a massive increase in individuals working from home. This trend doesn’t appear to be decreasing as we move forward. According to Forbes “By 2025, an estimated 70% of the workforce will be working remotely at least five days a month.” This massive shift in work from home caused many professionals to have to scramble to find the right equipment necessary to set up a suitable home office. Many needed to have a set up that enabled them to participate in Zoom and Teams conferences in order to stay in touch with their coworkers. These hardships inspired us to start designing a device that could provide anyone with the tools necessary to work from home successfully.

We set out to make a device that could acts as a hub for all devices while providing the tools necessary to communicate virtually with coworkers. A device we affectionately call the

DockAll D5.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to bring this dream to life, we need your help! We are currently working on a production ready prototype but need a little help for the final push. We are asking for help to raise the funds necessary to put the first few hundred units into production. 

Once production begins the D5 will retail at $99.99

For our supporters we will be offering the D5 at the Early-Bird Cost of $79.99

 

Each DockAll D5 Includes:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

With the creation of any new device or solution there will always be challenges. As a small and innovative Consumer Electronics company we have previous experience in creating devices that provided creative solutions to consumer problems. We have faced production challenges and set backs in the past and have always been able to overcome them with smart creative solutions. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share with your friends and family.

  • Tweet, Insta, Snap, or share in whichever way you prefer.

  • Help us get the word out.

Risks & Challenges
With the creation of any new device or solution there will always be challenges. As a small and innovative Consumer Electronics company we have previous experience in creating devices that provided creative solutions to consumer problems. We have faced production challenges and set backs in the past and have always been able to overcome them with smart creative solutions.

Tweet, Insta, Snap, or share in whichever way you prefer.

story: Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.

story:
“What is done on the table is done in the head” – This is how successful people describe clutter in the workplace, sometimes a simple search for a charger can turn into a headache for many. How do we solve this problem? Easy, just say ...

 

Bye-Bye Chaos

 

 

Hi LeMat

 

Here we introduce a Genuine Leather mat that will suit every person’s needs, LeMat. We have done our best to make your online work easier and we have found the best solution on how to organize your workspace so that you can work as effectively as possible.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We add new colors 

 

 

 

 

LeMat Comparison with other desk mats - We Recommend You Read!

 

 

 

 LeMat allow you to reduce clutter in order to organize your workspace. By doing this, it will enable you to focus on your tasks without any forms of distraction. Also the mat is aesthetically pleasing!

 

 

 

 LeMat has a Built-in Wireless Charger and uses the Qi charging standard which is compatible with almost all devices including phones, AirPods which have wireless charging enabled.

 

 

 

 

 A lot of people have issues with being unable to locate their pen and USB cable at the time, as a result of this, we made a mount for these things. You’ll always have quick access to your work essentials, whenever you need them.

 

 

 

 LeMat can transform any desk into a comfortable workspace as it provides your device with a smooth hard surface which is excellent for both writing and computer use when using a mouse. The mat is steady and does not slip around the table. It is evenly smooth and is very pleasant to the touch.

 

 

 

 The mat is very functional as it can fit in a bag when easily rolled up which makes it portable. Roll and place or stack and go.

 

 

 

 LeMat offers protection to your desk and prevents any scratching, staining and spills. The natural leather is durable and water-repellent and can easily be cleaned with a cloth.

 

 

 

 

 This product is created from premium natural leather from Italy. It retains the marks of hide and the mat is kept unpolished. This is to make sure that with age, it develops a rich and natural patina. Each mat is manually verified which enables us to create a high-quality product, avoiding any defects. Beauty and quality are as important as functionality.

 

 

 

 

Here is a special offer for you! We can engrave and personalize your mat with a name or other text!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 Compare LeMat and other desk pads  

 

 

 

 

 

 Thank you very much for your "LeMat overview", it is awesome! 

 

 

Our testers Feedbacks

 

--- Well, I received the prototype of the desk pad and I tested it. First off all, I want to note the idea of creating a built-in wireless charger, because this is a very useful thing. Well done for doing it. But put charger on the left side, as it is more convenient. There are now far fewer cables on my desk, which has a positive effect on the usability of the desk pad. It is a very nice size pad and it provides great protection and it’s very easy to write on. I Recommend it! (Kevin)

 

--- This natural leather office desk pad is really nice and has no smell, unlike PU or vegan leather. It covers a generous area under my keyboard and doubles as a mouse pad. It looks expensive but can be purchased for a nominal price. It is easy to clean or roll up and take with me for travel. I like it a lot! (Tom)

 

--- This is a very nice waterproof desk pad. I am on the internet frequently and so I bring my food and drinks with me. The desk I place my computer on is nice and I needed some type of waterproof pad that would protect the desk. I simply wipe it down with a damp cloth to keep it clean. It comes with a built-in wireless charger which is very convenient and useful! (John)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Hello everyone. We are a small young team that loves to make leather goods. We have a lot of cool and innovative ideas therefore we are launching on a Kickstarter. This is an excellent opportunity to implement our products on here. We are launching ambitious products so please join us on this venture. Welcome to the team! We look forward to your ideas!

 

Design process and rug prototype

 

 

 

Our manufacturing

 

We are confident that we can deliver your goods on time (and perhaps even before the given delivery date) since we produce everything ourselves. As soon as Kickstarter ends, we will be ready to launch. The production time is from 1-2 months – which is always dependent on the amount of orders we receive. Delivery time is usually expected to take around 2 weeks.

 

https://crossprom.com/campaigns/fGmPJy69jzGv6EMrqUwz?utm_source=banner&utm_medium=&utm_campaign=prm

 

https://www.kicktraq.com/projects/vor-is/lemat-wireless-charging-leahter-desk-pad-just-put-on-table/

 

https://www.backerland.com/

 

 

https://lemat-wireless-charging.kickbooster.me/boost

 

 

 This project is promoted by GREENWEB - digital marketing agency. 

https://greenweb.ua/ks?utm_source=promo_lemat

 

https://www.facebook.com/LeMatbyVoRis

 

Thank's to Dmitry Gryadunov

 

We humbly ask for your help in creating this ambitious new product, so, fasten your seat belts, and let's start our newest Kickstarter adventure!

 

Risks and challenges

We are confident that we can deliver your mats on time (and perhaps even before the given delivery date) since we produce everything ourselves. As soon as Kickstarter ends, we will be ready to launch. The production time is from 1-2 months – which is always dependent on the amount of orders we receive. Delivery time is usually expected to take around 2 weeks. Work has already been done to source materials, and as the project goes on and the scale can be determined, we’ll begin finalizing that and placing preliminary orders as we’re able. We have planned for success, and do not anticipate any issues sourcing hardware, leather, packaging or any other materials. Shipping stop only depends from COVID19 situation and lockdown. But we hope, that everything will be fine. The LeMat team will update you regularly on progress. If there are any issues, we promise to communicate with you every step of the way!

story:
Stretch goal #1

 

Overview

SlimQ F100 is the by the far the world's smallest 100W GaN charger with a complete PFC function for true global use. Using next-generation GaNFast (gallium nitride) technology for small size and high power, it can charge up to 4 devices at the same time – from earbuds to phones, to tablets and the MacBook 16”. It is nicely designed and supports most of the fast-charging protocols for modern phones and laptops.
 

 

Replace Multiple Chargers with One

 

World's Smallest 100W Charger with PFC Function

With a dimension of 70 x 68 x 29mm, the SlimQ F100 is smaller than two packs of Doublemint. It is by far the world's smallest 100W charger that has a complete PFC circuit (more about PFC later).

Compared to a series of Apple's chargers, the F100 stands out with more power and more fast-charging ports.

SlimQ F100 is easy to handle and carry around, thanks to its small size and carefully applied exterior material.  

 

Works with All Devices that Use Type-C Power Port

Works with Virtually All Laptop Models

If your laptop does not have a USB Type-C power port, don’t worry! We have prepared more than 20 types of converting cables that work with virtually all laptops on the market, including Macbook Pro, Microsoft Surface, Lenovo, Dell, HP, Acer, ASUS, etc. (A list of the cables is in "specification" section)

 

Fast Charging All Your Phones


Charge Your Macbook Pro

SlimQ F100 works well with Macbook Pro, including the Macbook Pro 15" and 16" that consumes max power of 87W and 96W, respectively.

 

Intelligent Power Distribution

 

Safety Features


 

GaN Technology

A new power semiconductor material - gallium nitride (GaN) - runs up to 20x faster than old, slow silicon (Si) chips, delivering up to 3x more power conversion and half the size and weight. GaNFast power ICs from Navitas Semiconductor enables the SlimQ F100 fast charger to reach world-class 94% efficiency, which means a cool operation in a small size. For more information on GaN, see www.GaNFast.com.

 

Complete PFC Circuit

SlimQ F100 includes a Power factor correction (PFC) circuit. The purpose of PFC is to improve the power factor which means power quality. Although the PFC circuit increases the charger size significantly, it increases energy efficiency, reduces electricity costs, and reduces the load on the electricity system. For adapters that have higher than 75W capacity, the PFC function is necessarily required by government regulations all over the world. With the PFC circuit, SlimQ F100 has a PF value of >0.95 compare to ~0.45 for chargers without PFC.

 


The presence of PFC also makes our charger more environment friendly compared to one without it. Assume the charger is used 10 hours a day and 300 days a year, compared to one without PFC, our charger can save 230KWHr electricity, which is equivalent to 227 pounds of carbon emission. It takes ten trees to offset that amount of carbon emission.

 

When Design Meets Engineering

We believe design is essential and even the center of a product. We designed the SlimQ F100 with multiple use case scenarios in mind. We paid attention to subtle details that might affect the user experience. The following shows the original design sketches that have evolved into an actual product. Along the way, we have made improvements and compromises. 

 

Foldable Prongs and International Converters

With the design of foldable prongs and clip-on international converters, the SlimQ F100 is quite flexible to be used virtually anywhere in the world. Please note: we will give ONE free converter according to the country of shipping destination. For example, if ship to the UK, the F100 will have a UK converter with it. If ship to South Korea or Germany, it will come with a DE/KR converter. If you need all four converters, please choose them from the add-ons and add them to your order.

 

Extension Cords

There are situations where you will need an extension cable to reach a power outlet. For such cases, the specially designed extension cords will become handy. The cable has the clip-on plug to the F100 to make it look neat and maintain a small footprint.  

 

Perks and Add-ons


 

 

Magnetic Cable

To show a little gratitude to our backers, we offer this Magnetic tip Type C to Type C cable at a significant discount. This cable is 5A/100W rated and is suitable for USB 2.0 data transmission. It comes in 5 colors and makes an excellent companion to the SlimQ F100 charger. Please note: it is only available as an add-on when you buy a perk.

 

How to Buy Perks and Add-ons

The product or product package you want to buy is called perks, and everything else is called add-ons. You need to choose the perk first and proceed to payment before you can see the add-ons.  Then on the same page, as you see the "CHECKOUT" button, you will see the add-ons available in "Perks you may also like" section.  You can browse all the available add-ons left and right; there might be many of them. Note: The following is a screenshot from PC, and it looks different on mobile phones but supports the same idea. Note: One add-on item can only be added once. Please feel free to contact us if there is any question.

 

Stretch Goal(s)

We will continue to receive ideas for stretch goals. The first stretch goal we picked is a USB Type-A to Type-C converter. The converter has a small footprint so you can literally leave it on the charger. It supports QC3.0 for fast charging and USB2.0 for data transmission. While we will all be using Type C in the future, we are still in a world of a mix of Type A and Type C. This little converter helps us to manage the transition into the future. 

We will include ONE converter for each F100 Charger that you receive when we reach the stretch goal! 

Product Specifications

SlimQ 65W comes with a FREE anti-tangle Silicone Type-C to Type-C cable and a FREE carry case.

 

Proof of Working Prototype

The most challenging work for this product is to fit all the components into a small case and have it working at >100W. The following video shows the out of box board working at >100W consistently. The left screen shows a PF value of 0.99, which is almost perfect. The right screen shows it works at ~108W.

 
 

FAQ

My shipping address is not in the US/Japan/China. What converter do I get? Do I get all the converters?  

To avoid causing plastic waste, we do NOT send all four converters for each charger you buy. There are no converters for users in US/Japan/China etc. Otherwise, for each charger you order, we give one FREE converter according to the country of your shipping address. For example, for UK/Singapore/HongKong, we have a UK converter with it. For Korea/Germany, we have the KR/GE converter with it. If you are in EU countries, we will have the EU converter with it. If, for some reason, you do need a different converter, please order the converter package that has all four converters we have. The package is in the list of add-ons and costs $3. 

I have an old laptop that does not use Type C, how do I find the right cable for it?

If your laptop is Lenovo, Apple, Surface, etc., it's easy to tell by its tip head. The difficulty may come in if your laptop is using a round plug tip. The reliable way to find the right cable is to find the dimension of the tip and find a matching one on our list. Make sure you find the matching one for a particular brand as some laptop models share the same tip dimension even they are from different brands. To find the dimension, as shown in the following pictures, you can either use a ruler to measure the current cable tip or research it online by using data on your current power adapter (normally on the back of the power adapter). If there is any doubt, please contact info@slimq.life with your computer model and a picture of the spec on your current adapter, so we can help you to find the right cable.

How can I buy multiple cables of the same type?

It is not easy to buy an add-on item multiple times on Indiegogo. Please contact us at info@slimq.life and let us know what the items and how many are. We need to make arrangements for that.

I use the F100 charger for multiple devices, how is the power distributed among the ports?

Please check the section "Intelligent Power Distribution." where you can find a table of all combinations of use cases. Please feel free to contact us if you have any suggestions or feedback on this.

I just bought an F100 yesterday, how to add a cable to my order?

If your order is not in "locked" or "fulfillment" status, it means your order is still not processed. The easiest is to cancel the older order and make a new one and add the cable in the add-on section to your new order before making payment. If your order is already processed, there is no way to change it, please contact us at info@slimq.life, and we will help you with that.

When will you ship the products?

We plan to start shipping orders within July. For other shipping related questions, please refer to the "Shipping Policy" section down below. 

Do you have any referral program?

Yes, absolutely. We offer 10% cash reward for any referral purchases. Please use this link to sign up. Then you will have your unique referral link. Just send your referral link to friends or colleagues, when they make a contribution to our project by using your link, you get a 10% reward. It is that simple!

Shipping Policy
 

Although quite rare, international shipping may be subject to import taxes, customs duties, and fees levied by the destination country. YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE for those charges and procedures to clear custom for the shipped item. Again, it is your full responsibility to clear it by working with the shipping company or custom directly.

It is also the recipient's responsibility for charges such as change of address, parcel holding, return fees caused by the recipient. So please make sure you have the correct address information, including a phone number on file.

1) To which countries do you ship?

We ship globally, excluding those have been flagged by courier services as restricted or high risk: Belarus, Cote d'Ivoire, Cuba, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Liberia, North Korea, Sierra Leone, Sudan, Syria & Zimbabwe. If you would like a shipment to any of these countries, we will make alternative arrangements that may cost more. However, we cannot guarantee the shipment's arrival.

2) Do I have to pay European VAT / GST?

Yes, and the amount will depend on your country’s regulations. However, usually the price is not that high, and people just get it directly.

3) What if my packet gets lost?

If the packet is not marked as "delivered.", we can help to locate it and resend it when it gets lost. If the packet is marked as "delivered" in the mail system and you don't get it, it is your responsibility to contact the local post office or express company to get it resolved. For us to get involved, you need to get the post office to issue a letter stating the packet gets lost.

 

Refund Policy

 

SlimQ complies with the Indiegogo refund policy. You can cancel the backing and get fully refunded before the campaign is over. After the campaign finish date, there is no refund. 

If you bought the product by mistake, you could contact the SlimQ customer satisfaction team through info@slimq.life. You will need to ship the product back in its original condition and cover the shipping cost. When we receive it, we will issue you a refund by using PayPal. Please be aware that we will need to deduct the charges that we already paid, including Indiegogo service fee, 3rd party service fee, and shipping we already paid, from the refund. 

 

Warranty & Support

 

SlimQ hardware, including accessories, comes with a one-year limited warranty. Please contact our customer satisfaction team via info@slimq.life for any issues. It would be helpful to attach some pictures to show the problem. 

 

Timeline

 

SHARE THE LOVE

Don't keep it a secret, share the love to your friends.

 

 

Join our referral program, Earn 10% cash back, by helping us spread the world.
story_txt:
Stretch goal #1

 
Overview
SlimQ F100 is the by the far the world's smallest 100W GaN charger with a complete PFC function for true global use. Using next-generation GaNFast (gallium nitride) technology for small size and high power, it can charge up to 4 devices at the same time – from earbuds to phones, to tablets and the MacBook 16”. It is nicely designed and supports most of the fast-charging protocols for modern phones and laptops. 

 
Replace Multiple Chargers with One

 
World's Smallest 100W Charger with PFC Function
With a dimension of 70 x 68 x 29mm, the SlimQ F100 is smaller than two packs of Doublemint. It is by far the world's smallest 100W charger that has a complete PFC circuit (more about PFC later).
Compared to a series of Apple's chargers, the F100 stands out with more power and more fast-charging ports.
SlimQ F100 is easy to handle and carry around, thanks to its small size and carefully applied exterior material.  

 
Works with All Devices that Use Type-C Power Port

Works with Virtually All Laptop Models
If your laptop does not have a USB Type-C power port, don’t worry! We have prepared more than 20 types of converting cables that work with virtually all laptops on the market, including Macbook Pro, Microsoft Surface, Lenovo, Dell, HP, Acer, ASUS, etc. (A list of the cables is in "specification" section)

 
Fast Charging All Your Phones


Charge Your Macbook Pro
SlimQ F100 works well with Macbook Pro, including the Macbook Pro 15" and 16" that consumes max power of 87W and 96W, respectively.

 
Intelligent Power Distribution


 
Safety Features
 
GaN Technology
A new power semiconductor material - gallium nitride (GaN) - runs up to 20x faster than old, slow silicon (Si) chips, delivering up to 3x more power conversion and half the size and weight. GaNFast power ICs from Navitas Semiconductor enables the SlimQ F100 fast charger to reach world-class 94% efficiency, which means a cool operation in a small size. For more information on GaN, see www.GaNFast.com.
 
Complete PFC Circuit
SlimQ F100 includes a Power factor correction (PFC) circuit. The purpose of PFC is to improve the power factor which means power quality. Although the PFC circuit increases the charger size significantly, it increases energy efficiency, reduces electricity costs, and reduces the load on the electricity system. For adapters that have higher than 75W capacity, the PFC function is necessarily required by government regulations all over the world. With the PFC circuit, SlimQ F100 has a PF value of >0.95 compare to ~0.45 for chargers without PFC.
 

The presence of PFC also makes our charger more environment friendly compared to one without it. Assume the charger is used 10 hours a day and 300 days a year, compared to one without PFC, our charger can save 230KWHr electricity, which is equivalent to 227 pounds of carbon emission. It takes ten trees to offset that amount of carbon emission.
 
When Design Meets Engineering
We believe design is essential and even the center of a product. We designed the SlimQ F100 with multiple use case scenarios in mind. We paid attention to subtle details that might affect the user experience. The following shows the original design sketches that have evolved into an actual product. Along the way, we have made improvements and compromises.

story:
Welcome to Redkey USB V3 - our most advanced computer data wipe tool yet. More power & more features. Since our last campaign, we've been quietly working away on improving our product. We think you'll be pleased with the results! Check out our new V3 campaign and claim your Winter Tech. perk today.

When you delete a picture from a computer, it's still actually there. The same goes for any other type of file. This means most files & data can easily be recovered from a computer - even after deletion!   

This poses a risk to all computer users, especially when it comes time to sell or recycle used equipment.  Nobody wants someone sifting through their personal life on their old PC. 

Redkey securely wipes the "Hard Drive" inside a computer - making any data recovery impossible. The end result is a clean computer - ready for safe sale or disposal. 

Redkey is specially designed to be easy to use - its been developed with the Computer novice in mind. Just turn on your computer, hit a couple of keys, and let Redkey take care of the rest.

Once loaded, your computer will begin to wipe automatically after a 60 second countdown. There is an optional advanced menu where settings can be adjusted. Basic instructions are supplied.

Redkey is a pay-once product. It provides unlimited use. There are no recurring costs. It does not expire. There are no limits on how many computers you can wipe. Your Redkey must remain attached during use. Uniquely, Redkey is fully updatable online and free software updates are included for the life of the product. Redkey is suitable for both home and business purposes. 

New features for Redkey V3:

Our powerful new "Enhanced Secure Erase" technology acts like an electronic file shredder. Redkey V3 offers a choice of 25 genuine Data wipe standards in use by Military & Defense organizations worldwide. Redkey had been scientifically proven (Certified) to erase all user data from HDD's and SSD's.

Redkey is now faster. With our latest technology advancements, some newer computers can now be securely wiped within minutes or even seconds. Be sure to back up any data you wish to keep before using your Redkey - it's a powerful tool. 

Our new "HEX viewer" is like having your own built-in mini forensics lab. This exciting new feature allows you to visually inspect your hard drive data before & after a data wipe and compare results. It's now possible to double-check with your own eyes that a data wipe has been successful.

For home edition users, a brief on-screen data wipe report is presented at the end of the wipe process. Pro & Ultimate edition users may view an enhanced on-screen data wipe report and save this as a PDF file - known as a "certificate of data sanitization." Reports can be saved either on the Redkey or another USB drive. Your PDFs report can then of course be stored, printed, or emailed. View and download a sample Certificate of Data Erasure here. 

 

Redkey now supports many different types of hard drives including HDD, SSD, USB, NVME, M.2, PCIe & eMMC. This means Redkey V3 can wipe many of the latest personal computers on the market as well as older ones dating back for the last 15 years or so. See below for technical specifications and minimal system requirements.

Redkey is available in 3 different editions:

Redkey Home Edition

HOME: Ideal for occasional use such as when selling or recycling a computer. Provides access to all essential data wipe functions including the 25 data wipe security standards. Ideal for the novice - let Redkey take care of the data wipe process for you with our semi-automated process. Minimal interaction is required with little to no technical know-how. View a basic data wipe report on-screen and double check the results with the built-in HEX viewer. Gets the job done - to Military standards. 

Redkey Professional Edition

PROFESSIONAL: Suited for the more familiar computer user. Redkey Professional builds on the functions of the home version plus introduces several new advanced features. Customize the wipe settings to create your own tailored data wipe algorithm. View detailed system info. such as CPU & RAM information for inclusion in your reports. View detailed drive information and gain an insight into your data storage devices. Customize the wipe process by importing your own screensaver media such as JPG images and MP3 Audio. Save reports as PDF Certificates of Data Sanitization. Go the extra mile with Redkey professional. Feature loaded & great value. 

Redkey Ultimate Edition

ULTIMATE: Intended for use by computer experts, PC repair shops, and Recycling services. Redkey Ultimate provides access to a few specialist features aimed at saving time for business use. Do you have a batch of similar computers to process? Then automate your Redkey using our new programmable scripting feature. Simply edit and activate the script.txt file on each Redkey and run your customized data wipe process automatically from boot. Also allows auto report save, auto-shutdown & more. Ultimate also permits Reports to be pre-edited and for this information to be saved to the Redkey for later import. This helps makes asset tracking and processing quick & easy. Redkey Ultimate has everything you need to phase out your existing expensive pay-per-use solution while remaining compliant with North American NIST and European GDPR data destruction regulations. Forensically certified + certificates of data erasure. Add value to your customers with Redkey Ultimate.

 

Improved V3 user interface:

The Redkey V3 user interface has been substantially improved over its predecessor software. Graphics are now sharper. Several new design 'themes' may now be selected from within our new media menu.

Pleasant screensavers with a nature-theme are displayed automatically during the data wipe process. Watch as these images magically fade away in a block pattern to simulate data being wiped. A video simulation of our screensaver can be found here. Pro or Ultimate user? Import your own custom JPG images and MP3 audio to replace the default screensaver pictures & music.  

Audio effects further improve the V3 user experience. Click here to listen (soundboard) to a few of the new sound effects and extracts of the music we've incorporated. Music is active when screensaver images are displayed. 

A new Matrix-style Data Wiped screen appears when the wipe process is complete along with some cool completion music! A signal beacon sound then signals every several minutes to remind you that the data wipe is complete. All audio-visual options may be muted, volume adjusted, or even disabled permanently if required.  

Although brief user instructions are supplied, a detailed instruction manual is available for free download. Redkey also has a built in help feature for each screen. 

PRODUCT STAGE VERIFICATION:

1. A video of the final product demonstrating key features and functionality:

2. A video & photos showing preparation for shipping such as completed components being prepared for shipment and packaging. 

With the help of our very own Crowdfunding backers, we have already translated Redkey into several different languages. Shipping transit times may vary between regions. We strongly advise you to provide your address details as accurately and clearly as possible. All goods are sent fully tracked & insured.

 

Once you receive your key, you'll need to activate and update it before use. Access to an internet-enabled Windows 7 or above PC required.  Due to recent world events, most of the Redkey V3's product development cycle was completed in advance of this campaign. This means we are already holding ample stock of the finished product. Only easy tasks such as packing the product and affixing shipping labels remain to be completed. All items are sent tracked. A signature or ID in lieu may be required upon receipt. You are responsible for any import charges although typically these will not apply.

 

Redkey is not rated for certain specialist / commercial equipment such as servers/data center hardware, network disk arrays & virtual computers. Redkey works on both internally and externally connected drives including USB flash drives and external hard drives. Individual drives can be selected for a wipe from within the advanced menu. 

 

*By default, Redkey will automatically wipe all data on every drive detected. Access the advanced menu to adjust settings if required. Redkey works on most personal home computers made since 2000 with a standard USB port. Some computers may require you to adjust your system configuration before use. Minimal system requirements apply - Windows™ style Desktops & Laptops, Min 1GB RAM, X86 & above + Most Macs™ made between 2006 and 2016 (Intel™-based) that incorporate a standard USB port. Redkey also features ADISA certified data erasure status. That is to say, Redkey has been scientifically proven to erase all user data from HDDs & SSDs. 

 

When you back the Redkey project, you benefit from included software updates for life. No one can compete with our exceptional level of innovation, customer focus, dedication, and value. Which Redkey will you pre-order today? Home, Professional, or Ultimate? Choose your edition now and lock-in your winter Tech. perk today!

See below for technical specifications and minimal system requirements.Redkey is available in 3 different editions:Redkey Home EditionHOME: Ideal for occasional use such as when selling or recycling a computer. Provides access to all essential data wipe functions including the 25 data wipe security standards. Ideal for the novice - let Redkey take care of the data wipe process for you with our semi-automated process. Minimal interaction is required with little to no technical know-how. View a basic data wipe report on-screen and double check the results with the built-in HEX viewer. Gets the job done - to Military standards. Redkey Professional EditionPROFESSIONAL: Suited for the more familiar computer user. Redkey Professional builds on the functions of the home version plus introduces several new advanced features. Customize the wipe settings to create your own tailored data wipe algorithm. View detailed system info. such as CPU & RAM information for inclusion in your reports. View detailed drive information and gain an insight into your data storage devices. Customize the wipe process by importing your own screensaver media such as JPG images and MP3 Audio. Save reports as PDF Certificates of Data Sanitization. Go the extra mile with Redkey professional. Feature loaded & great value. Redkey Ultimate EditionULTIMATE: Intended for use by computer experts, PC repair shops, and Recycling services. Redkey Ultimate provides access to a few specialist features aimed at saving time for business use. Do you have a batch of similar computers to process? Then automate your Redkey using our new programmable scripting feature. Simply edit and activate the script.txt file on each Redkey and run your customized data wipe process automatically from boot. Also allows auto report save, auto-shutdown & more. Ultimate also permits Reports to be pre-edited and for this information to be saved to the Redkey for later import. This helps makes asset tracking and processing quick & easy. Redkey Ultimate has everything you need to phase out your existing expensive pay-per-use solution while remaining compliant with North American NIST and European GDPR data destruction regulations. Forensically certified + certificates of data erasure. Add value to your customers with Redkey Ultimate. Improved V3 user interface:The Redkey V3 user interface has been substantially improved over its predecessor software. Graphics are now sharper. Several new design 'themes' may now be selected from within our new media menu.Pleasant screensavers with a nature-theme are displayed automatically during the data wipe process. Watch as these images magically fade away in a block pattern to simulate data being wiped. A video simulation of our screensaver can be found here. Pro or Ultimate user? Import your own custom JPG images and MP3 audio to replace the default screensaver pictures & music.  Audio effects further improve the V3 user experience. Click here to listen (soundboard) to a few of the new sound effects and extracts of the music we've incorporated. Music is active when screensaver images are displayed. A new Matrix-style Data Wiped screen appears when the wipe process is complete along with some cool completion music! A signal beacon sound then signals every several minutes to remind you that the data wipe is complete. All audio-visual options may be muted, volume adjusted, or even disabled permanently if required.  Although brief user instructions are supplied, a detailed instruction manual is available for free download. Redkey also has a built in help feature for each screen. PRODUCT STAGE VERIFICATION:1. A video of the final product demonstrating key features and functionality:2. A video & photos showing preparation for shipping such as completed components being prepared for shipment and packaging. With the help of our very own Crowdfunding backers, we have already translated Redkey into several different languages. Shipping transit times may vary between regions. We strongly advise you to provide your address details as accurately and clearly as possible. All goods are sent fully tracked & insured. Once you receive your key, you'll need to activate and update it before use. Access to an internet-enabled Windows 7 or above PC required.  Due to recent world events, most of the Redkey V3's product development cycle was completed in advance of this campaign. This means we are already holding ample stock of the finished product. Only easy tasks such as packing the product and affixing shipping labels remain to be completed. All items are sent tracked. A signature or ID in lieu may be required upon receipt. You are responsible for any import charges although typically these will not apply. Redkey is not rated for certain specialist / commercial equipment such as servers/data center hardware, network disk arrays & virtual computers. Redkey works on both internally and externally connected drives including USB flash drives and external hard drives. Individual drives can be selected for a wipe from within the advanced menu.  *By default, Redkey will automatically wipe all data on every drive detected. Access the advanced menu to adjust settings if required. Redkey works on most personal home computers made since 2000 with a standard USB port. Some computers may require you to adjust your system configuration before use. Minimal system requirements apply - Windows™ style Desktops & Laptops, Min 1GB RAM, X86 & above + Most Macs™ made between 2006 and 2016 (Intel™-based) that incorporate a standard USB port. Redkey also features ADISA certified data erasure status. That is to say, Redkey has been scientifically proven to erase all user data from HDDs & SSDs.  When you back the Redkey project, you benefit from included software updates for life. No one can compete with our exceptional level of innovation, customer focus, dedication, and value. Which Redkey will you pre-order today? Home, Professional, or Ultimate? Choose your edition now and lock-in your winter Tech. perk today!

story:
VULCAN CABLES ARE IN STOCK AND READY TO SHIP!

ORDER Your Vulcan NOW!

-----------

VULCAN'S DELIVERY PLAN

1st Batch: 10th December 2020 WAS SHIPPED!

2nd Batch: 25th December 2020  WAS SHIPPED!

3rd Batch: 18th January 2020  WAS SHIPPED!

TIGHT FIT Magnetic Tip: 1st Nov 2021

 

 

 

------------------

 

Overview

Vulcan cable is researched and produced with Premium materials and Revolution in Design in order to be the best cable for ALL your devices. 

The existing magnetic cables on the market can only support either 100W or fast charging iPhone 12 up to 20W. If you choose 100W, you cannot fast charge your iPhone 12 up to 20W and vice versa. It means you need to buy 2 magnetic cables, one for charging up to 100W if you have devices that need to be charged up to 100W, such as Macbook Pro 87W, and another one for fast charging your iPhone up to 20W. So why do you have to pay more in order to get more inconvenient?


Buy ONE Vulcan for ALL purposes: Reversible Fast Charge your iPhone 12 up to 20W and ALL your other Devices up to 100W. 

 

Is it safe to touch the Vulcan cable head when fast charging your devices at 100W? Nice question, but No Worries, it's SAFE to TOUCH the Vulcan cable head in that case!  Watch the below video to get the answer!

 

Vulcan cable works very well with popular in-car infotainment systems such as APPLE CarPlay, ANDROID Auto, and MirrorLink.

 
 

SAVE MONEY AND GET MORE CONVENIENCE!

 

Let's see what unique features that Vulcan can bring to you:

⚡ Integrated E-Mark IC to support 100W Power Delivery 3.0 with PPS technology, QuickCharge 4.0, and VOOC fast charge.
⚡ Fast Charge ALL devices from APPLE iPhone 20W, iPad, AirPod, Macbook to Android Phones, Tablets, Computers, Gaming Controller, Earbud, and more.
⚡ 14 Pins plated by 18K Pure Gold helps increase 50% charging efficiency.
⚡ Supports Data Transfer for CarPlay, Android Auto, Mirror Link, or other similar purposes. ⚡ Reliable and Safe Reversible Fast Charging: Fast Charging on Both Sides up to 20W for APPLE iPhone and up to 100W for other devices)
⚡ Bulletproof materials and Anti-Bending design.
⚡ The strongest N52 Neodymium Magnets can hold up to 1000g.
⚡ Advanced Design to feature Short-Circuit Protection and Catching Fire Prevention with Metal Registration Mast. 
⚡ 15-Year Warranty, 30-Day One-To-One Replacement, Freeship Replacement.

 

 

Get Your Vulcan Now!

Wanna Extra Vulcan, Mangetic Tips, USB-C To USB-A Adapter, or Travel Case?
You Can Select & Add Them Into Your Order During Checkout

 

VULCAN REFERRAL PROGRAM

Let's join The Vulcan Referral Program to spread the words about the Vulcan to your friends, colleagues and friends around you, anyone you think who are interested in what Vulcan can bring to them and their devices.

Hence, every invitation you earn 2 Vulcan Bucks (~ 2 AUD) in order to purchase more awesome Add-ons and Rewards at the end of the campaign. Refer as many friends as you can! Learn more HERE.

Let get started earning awesome rewards by "Copy & Share the link of this campaign"!

E-Mark IC and Smart IC are chosen to be integrated into Vulcan in order to feature the ability to fast charge ALL devices up to 100W. Especially, it can fast charge APPLE iPhone up to 20W. It’s so cool, right?

That incredible feature comes true because Vulcan supports the most popular USB types: Apple Lightning, USB-C and Android Micro USB. Therefore, Vulcan become the world's first truly universal USB cable compatible with ALL devices: smartphones, tablets, laptops, computers, power banks, gamepad, earbuds, headphones, and more... No need to waste time wondering which cable you should bring while going out.

 

Vulcan cable is equiped Power Delivery 3.0 which increases power levels from existing USB standards up to 100W, it results charging your devices much faster than before! Furthermore, Vucal also supports Programmable Power Supple (PPS) keeping your devices from ovecharged or overheated by providing sufficient power to your battery, last the battery life longer. Great!

Vulcan support Data Transfer, easily transfer data between phones and laptops, tablets, and computers! 

 

More than that, Vulcan can be used with any infotainment systems such as CarPlay, Android Auto, MirrorLink!

 

After over 1-year R&D, Vulcan comes to life with a Revolutionary Design and is featured by Premium materials:
- E-Mark IC, Smart IC: charge ALL devices up to 100W and iPhone 12, and other iPhone series up to 20W.
- 14 pins plated by 18K Pure Gold: increase 50% charging efficiency.
- Super strong N52 Neodymium Magnets: lift your iPad up easily!
- Metal Registration Mast: prevent issues involving Short Circuit and Catching Fire that regularly happen with other cables.
- LED Indicator: its blue light is bright enough to tell you if your device is being charged.
- Aluminum Shield: cooling the smart circuit board inside and touch safe even when charging the device at 100W.

 

Vulcan features a Super Strong N52 Neodymium Magnet - the most powerful of all permanent magnets - which absorbs firmly without any dislocation or detachment, warranting a worry-free, uninterrupted fast charging experience. It has a strong magnetic force which can hold up to 1000 grams such as iPad 2019.

 

Super Strong N52 Neodymium Magnets can hold up to 1000g

With 14 Power Pins plated by 18K Pure Gold, the charging efficiency increases 50% and is more stable than any other magnetic cables. 

Vulcan is the first magnetic cable to have Metal Registration Mast which can prevent cable from Catching Fire and Short Circuit. This technology prevents damage to your phone battery, and it also means it's safe to leave your phone plugged in overnight without any negative effects.

It's Instant Reversible Charging means you never have to struggle plugging in it the right way. Not only Vulcan eliminates the struggle, you never have to carry multiple cables for various devices, as the Vulcan cable is universal.

Vulcan is The Unique Magnetic Cable can Fast Charge your APPLE iPhone 12 up to 20W and other devices up to 100W on its BOTH SIDES! No need to care which side of cable you are using, Just Plug and Fast Charging your devices!

 

 

 

With Vulcan, charging has never been easier because it always aligns on your first attempt, automatically via magnetics! Simply leave the removable plugs inserted in the charging port on your device, and the cable will effortlessly snap on as approaching and begin charging in one second.

Easy To Connect

 

Charge your devices easily with one hand​

 

 No more distraction while working

 

Receive a call easily​

 

Visible in low light conditions

 

Vulcan cable is an insanely tough product which is reinforced with Bulletproof Materials (stuff that was developed in the military to protect soldiers) and a Fire-Resistant TPE Jacket. We guarantee it is durable in long-time use.

More than that, Vulcan is made with Nylon Braided to become a Ultra High Strength Cable that is going to last you a lot longer than the cable Apple ships to you in the box. The woven exterior of the cable not only provides crucial structural integrity that will prevent tearing and fraying from everyday use, but also helps it withstand especially extreme forms of punishment as below.

 

Vulcan anti-bending design can better protect your cable. The special stress relief design can withstand more than 50,000 Times At 180° Bending Tests. Lasts 30× longer than other cables.

 

The charging port of your device is now completely protected by Vulcan Magnetic Tip which supports Water Resistant and Dust Resistant.

 

One of the greatest benefits of Vulcan is that you do not need to plug it in every time your device needs a recharge. Instead, the plug can stay on the phone, and the magnetism will gently slide the connector in place once you bring it close to the charging port. This can greatly protect your charging port from any possible damage.

After several insertion times, your phone charging port may become loose and fall out.  Your phone doesn't even hold their connector plugs firmly anymore. Let's protect your phone charging port with a magnetic connector tip, no more constant insertion.

Saving your port from repeated plugging and pulling

 

Vulcan also protects your charging ports from foreign objects such as dust, linen & much more.

 

The charging cable & adapters are also water-resistant. This allows you to safely charge your devices in areas where water may be present such as (Kitchen , Bathroom Vanities Etc).

 

Vulcan cable comes with 3 types of Vulcan Magnetic Tip: Apple Lightning, USB-C (Moderate Fit & Tight Fit) and Android Micro USB. It means, invests ONE Vulcan for ALL Your Devices from flagship phones (even iPhone 12, iPhone 12 Mini, iPhone 12 Pro, iPhone 12 Pro Max), tablets, laptops, computers to headphones, earbuds, and more.

 

Difference between USB-C Moderate Fit and USB-C Tight Fit

We have produced many samples as pre-production samples to ensure the quality of Vulcan cables. The factory is completely ready for mass production. So you will receive your order within a month after the campaign is finished.

 

We are very confident in the quality of Vulcan cable because its quality is guaranteed by 2 layers of Inspection including the Factory's Quality Control Department and a Third-Party Quality Control Service. Every process and every component will be strictly tested prior to shipping.

 

 

Every Vulcan cable comes with the followings:
- 15-Year Warranty.
- 30-Day One-To-One Replacement.
- Free Shipping For Replacement.

 

 

Vulcan is in the production phase and ready to ship this November 2020.

 

 

 

At HiQ, we do research and develop creative products that can be connected to the Internet. Established in 2016, we have been expanding rapidly after launching our AirPlus, one-of-a-kind wireless charging protective case for AirPods, AnyBackup - Offline AutoBackup & 100W FastCharge with Apple MFi Chipset, and now is Vulcan. We still have 4 products in final phase of R&D and they will be introduced in the late of this year.

Our team is a group of people who share a common goal and have a passion for creating products that can make life easier and more convenient. We are fully focused on our customer safety and satisfaction.

We have branches in Australia, Hong Kong, and Vietnam. Our Vietnam branch focuses mostly on product research and development.

We would like to send our dearest appreciation to all backers, without your support, Vulcan would not be possible.

story:
Though already scored great achievements in tripod and optical lens manufacturing, SIRUI hasn’t rested on its laurels but striven to break into new markets. DUKEN, a sub-brand of SIRUI, has long been dedicated to the development of smart products. To cater to the popularity of video clips, DUKEN launches its first product, Switch X, which is devoted to taking your mobile photography to a whole new level.

With strong research strength, SIRUI has made remarkable achievements in a number of crowdfunding projects. The launch of DUKEN Switch X gimbal is believed to help photography enthusiasts create more stunning shots.

Vlog Like a Pro!

DUKEN Switch X is a composite of the gimbal, selfie stick, and mini tripod. The powerful image stabilizing system is a guarantee for smooth motion shots.

Combo DUKEN Switch X with SIRUI smartphone Anamorphic lens

The perfect combination of the multiple shooting modes that the gimbal features with the 2.4:1 aspect ratio, lens flares, oval bokeh, etc. that the lens produces allows you to capture stunning shots with a high-quality anamorphic look at a low cost.


Smartphones generally shoot in 16:9 aspect ratio. With a SIRUI VD-01 Anamorphic smartphone Anamorphic lens attached, DUKEN APP enables the phone to directly produce a cinematic video in 2.4:1 aspect ratio.

 

A four-section telescopic stick with a maximum length of 17mm is included in the gimbal. The selfie stick gives the camera a wider view and is perfect for taking group photos.

Unfold the bottom of the handle to get a mini tripod, which facilitates your live streaming wherever you go.




Three modes, pan following mode, roll and pan following mode, locking mode, are available for your choice. These modes are simple enough to pick up quickly, making professional camera movements no longer out of reach.

Pan following mode: Smartphone pans left and right following the movement of the handle. The roll axis is locked.

Locking mode: The angle of both axes is fixed and the orientation of the smartphone remains unchanged.

​Roll and pan following mode: Roll axis and pan axis follow the movement of the handle. The current following mode is indicated by the indicators.

Controlling the native phone camera without an APP is another plus to DUKEN Switch X. In this case, software incompatibility will no longer be a problem.


Double press the M button to return to the original position and switch between landscape mode and portrait mode. Triple press the Photo/Video Button to switch between rear and front camera.



Active Track
Click on the "Active Track" icon and frame the target manually, then the moving object will always be kept in the center of the screen.

Hitchcock Zoom

This feature will give a unique effect to the scene, where the characters in this frame will remain unchanged while the background or foreground becomes enlarged or compressed.

Comprehensive Features

Mainstream features like the Sudoku mode, pano shot, countdown shooting, time-lapse and photo retouching are all included in this gadget to unleash your full potential for shooting.

 

 

 

 

 

*All the prices of each perk are not including the cost of shipping
* The shipping cost of EU orders included VAT tax. ( The VAT rate indicated below)

How to determine the VD-01 can fit on your phone lens?
Please refer to the image above to measure the distance from the edge of the phone to the center of the major lens of your smartphone. (Universal adapter can mount from the top or the side of the phone )

       

    

   

@DukenTech  

FOLLOW US @SIRUIIMAGING

The selfie stick gives the camera a wider view and is perfect for taking group photos.Unfold the bottom of the handle to get a mini tripod, which facilitates your live streaming wherever you go.Three modes, pan following mode, roll and pan following mode, locking mode, are available for your choice. These modes are simple enough to pick up quickly, making professional camera movements no longer out of reach.Pan following mode: Smartphone pans left and right following the movement of the handle. The roll axis is locked.Locking mode: The angle of both axes is fixed and the orientation of the smartphone remains unchanged.​Roll and pan following mode: Roll axis and pan axis follow the movement of the handle. The current following mode is indicated by the indicators.Controlling the native phone camera without an APP is another plus to DUKEN Switch X. In this case, software incompatibility will no longer be a problem.Double press the M button to return to the original position and switch between landscape mode and portrait mode. Triple press the Photo/Video Button to switch between rear and front camera.Active TrackClick on the "Active Track" icon and frame the target manually, then the moving object will always be kept in the center of the screen.Hitchcock ZoomThis feature will give a unique effect to the scene, where the characters in this frame will remain unchanged while the background or foreground becomes enlarged or compressed.Comprehensive FeaturesMainstream features like the Sudoku mode, pano shot, countdown shooting, time-lapse and photo retouching are all included in this gadget to unleash your full potential for shooting.     *All the prices of each perk are not including the cost of shipping* The shipping cost of EU orders included VAT tax. ( The VAT rate indicated below)How to determine the VD-01 can fit on your phone lens?Please refer to the image above to measure the distance from the edge of the phone to the center of the major lens of your smartphone. (Universal adapter can mount from the top or the side of the phone )              @DukenTech  FOLLOW US @SIRUIIMAGING

story:
___________

___________

___________

 

Current power banks on the market are heavy, slow with the wireless charging solution constantly disconnecting with the slightest movement. At EXCITRUS, we saw these problems and decided to do something about it. 

We made it our mission to fix this problem by creating ultra-slim battery packs that deliver precise alignment while charging at lightning speed.

 

 

Forgot to charge your phone? Traditional chargers take 45 minutes to charge to your phone to 50%. With NitroCharge Pro you'll only have to charge 7 minutes to store enough power to charge your phone to 50%. No more waiting by the wall, grab your NitroCharge Pro and go.

 

*A 50% recharge based on iPhone 12

 

 

The NitroCharge Pro series is the world’s first portable power bank with MagSafe, designed for the iPhone 12, but also compatible with other phones. Lighter, slimmer, and more powerful than ever, the NitroCharge Pro series is the power bank your phone has been waiting for.

 

 

 

 

No more misalignment with your iPhone when wirelessly charging. The NitroCharge Pro series is fully compatible with iPhone 12's MagSafe. With the NitroCharge Pro series, you can charge your iPhone 12 to 85% in just 1 hour.

We specifically designed the magnet in the NitroCharge Pro very strong: 

 

 

 

 

 

With NitroCharge 120 Pro you can charge your laptop or Macbook Pro with a charging power compared to its original 96W charger. Charge your laptop / Macbook to 75% in just 1 hour. 

 

 

The NitroCharge Pro is also suitable for Android devices. We supply a metal ring that you can apply to your phone to ensure your phone and NitroCharge’s charging coils stay perfectly aligned to maximize the wireless charging speed. 

 

 

 

 

The NitroCharge Pro Series comes in two versions, NitroCharge 30 Pro which carries 10,000mAh capacity and 30W output, and NitroCharge 120 Pro which packs 26,800mAh of power and 120W output.

NitroCharge 120 Pro​ comparison:

 

NitroCharge 30 Pro​ comparison:

 

 

 

Most of us have more than one device with us at all times. With NitroCharge Pro you can charge up to 4 devices simultaneously. Charge literally anything - from your phones, laptops, MacBooks, AirPods Pro, speakers, cameras and more.

 

 

NitroCharge Pro not only charges devices fast. But it also recharges itself fast. Recharge NitroCharge 30 Pro to 70% in just one hour. And NitroCharge 120 Pro 75% in one hour. 

 

 

Transform your NitroCharge Pro into a wireless charging hub for up to 4 devices, while also recharging your NitroCharge Pro at the same time through a single power outlet.

 

 

 

 

 

For an additional $19, this 65W GaN charger is compatible to charge NitroCharge Pro. This 3-Port Fast Charger has 2x USB-A and 1x USB-C ports, charging 3 devices simultaneously. Easy to carry, fast charging and high safety. 

*Shipped out with your regional plug.

 

 

 

Our mission at EXCITRUS is to create high-quality products that bring ease and convenience to our user’s lives. Our power banks have been embraced by some of the largest US and Canadian retailers, such as Microsoft, Best Buy, Office Depot, Canada Computers, and The Exchange. We plan to continue to bring new and exciting innovations to the tech industry in the coming future.
