story:
Snoppa has raised over $3000k over the last few crowdfunding campaigns. Now, we are glad to introduce our next-gen phone gimbal - ATOM 2, the world's first auto-foldable 3-axis phone gimbal!

 

 

Thanks for the great support that made us $200k funded! Now, all the backers will get a FREE Snoppa Hand Strap along with each ATOM 2! Grab yours if you are not in!

 

 

 

 

ATOM 2 is the world’s first auto-foldable 3-axis phone gimbal that is pocket size. It senses your action for auto startup and folding, making it a hassle-free phone filming assistant. With a built-in tripod and an extendable handle, ATOM 2 is perfect for go-anywhere phone-filming, vlogging, live-streaming, and selfies!

 

 

 

 

 

 

All the 3-axis foldable gimbals on the market require manual operation which is a little bit troublesome and adds a time-consuming extra step that might make you miss the shot.

One Step VS Four Steps

ATOM 2 can instantly sense your opening & closing actions to automatically control the gimbal arm's movements, giving you a more convenient grab-and-shoot experience. 

 

 

 

 

Carrying the ATOM 2 around is as easy as placing it in a pocket or bag. Thanks to the ingenious hybrid 3-axis structural design, ATOM 2 breaks free from bulky conventional designs and significantly reduces the gimbal size to an incredible degree.

 

 

 

 

Compared with 1 or 2 axes selfie-stick style gimbals, a 3-axis gimbal can best eliminate shakes and jitters in all 3 axes of roll, tilt and pan, balancing the phone camera in real-time which results in smooth and steady videos.

 

Hybrid-3-axis Anti-Shake Tech

ATOM 2 utilizes Snoppa’s latest patented design—the hybrid 3-axis anti-shake structure which is the soul of ATOM 2.

The roll and pan axes both use a direct-drive brushless motor while the tilt axis uses a special hybrid brushless motor self-developed by Snoppa. It has a much higher torsion and excellent stabilizing performance, which cannot be found in any other gimbal.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Carrying accessories is always cumbersome so ATOM 2 eliminates the need for additional gear, it has an extendable handle, allowing you to take better selfie shots with a wider field of view. With the integrated tripod, you can stand it directly on any flat surface for hands-free filming techniques such as time-lapse, auto-tracking, etc. Get the shot every time and everywhere!

 

 

 

 

ATOM 2 is currently the only gimbal that supports fast charging. It takes only 1 hour to charge from empty to full, or 40 minutes charging to reach 80%. Inside there’s a built-in temperature sensor that can detect the battery status in real-time to ensure safety.

 

 

 

 

 

One Key Orientation Switch

 

 

 

 

ATOM 2 has an embedded infrared sensor in the gimbal phone holder, which can actively sense the phone mounting status to prevent the motor from starting before the phone is mounted – helping to avoid motor damage.

 

 

 

 

 

The ATOM 2 also includes a dedicated filming app that offers powerful functions for users to enhance their shooting experience like AI recognition and tracking, time-lapse, slow motion, panorama, beauty mode, gesture control, and more.

Beauty Mode

Not looking your best? Want to add a little personality to your beauty? ATOM 2's beauty mode helps you edit images and video to bring out your best features in both your selfie pictures and vlogs.

 

Faceover & Facemasking

Through AI face detection, the Faceover Mode enables users to automatically cover their faces with either pixels or a selected cartoon sticker during face tracking.

 

AI Gesture Controls

Control the gimbal hands-free or remotely, it’s all up to you! Now snapping a photo or recording a video is as easy as a simple gesture. And more customized gestures can be set for start/stop shooting, shot clock, inception mode, and more.

 

 

 

 

Features & Specs of Add-ons

20W Fast Charger: Type-C + USB Ports

ATOM 2 Case: Drop-anti Material. Pocket size

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

About the Team

We are a team of experienced engineers, product designers, and video fans, who all share a common passion for what we do. Our team members have strong R&D background in automation control as well as extensive filming experience. Most importantly, we work hard to put imaginative innovation into the market of filming products. These innovations are dedicated to solving the existing filming problems and improving users’ overall video shooting experience.

As a team that aims for a revolution in the world of filming, we know that unlike photos and selfies, videos help people to tell a better story and capture and preserve our best memories, allowing us to play them back over and over again.

Our mission is to create highly innovative and intelligent gimbals that simplify the way you stabilize your video recordings and further, to give everyone across the world an opportunity to enjoy a comprehensive and robust filming experience.

Our special approach & innovative design have ultimately won us renowned global design awards and widespread acknowledgment of our achievements.

Filming is our passion. And we never stop bringing innovations into the culture of filming!

 

 

Risks And Challenges

With our team’s years of experience with 3-axis gimbal R&D technology and the successful production of previous products, we have reliable suppliers and excellent manufacturing partners, making us confident in our production schedule for ATOM 2. However, we understand that challenges often occur with shipping and logistics. To avoid potential delays, we have already confirmed with our suppliers that production is ready and that shipping can begin on time. Our most important task is to satisfy the promises we make to our backers. If any unexpected problems arise we will keep our backers updated and informed about how we are solving the issue. We are excited to bring ATOM 2 to the world and thank you for your support.

story:
RaVolt = Mobile power  for your MacBook and all your devices.

Mobile Power : Did you ever have a problem with your laptop or smartphone running out of battery during an urgent work? Did you ever want a powerful and reliable power source with you? Did you ever think how would it be to have a wall outlet in your pocket? We did, too. So we designed a powerful, affordable and portable USB electricity supply for all of us. Now you have RaVolt. You just need to take out the your AC outlet from your pocket or your bag to continue to your life. RaVolt is a powerful small USB device that generates constant electricity supply for your MacBook, plasma TVs, Smartphone's, Cameras, MP3 Players and more?


What Makes RaVolt So Useful?

RaVolt is the only recharging product on the market that does not require a cable, and in fact does not even need to plug into your normal charging port. Other types of external batteries must be rated for the correct voltage to match your device. On top of that, they must fit the size and style of your charging port, which varies drastically from device to device, even within the same brand. Because RaVolt works through the USB port, it is more compact and easy to use with almost any device.

The best thing about RaVolt is that you don’t even need to worry about recharging it through a wall outlet. You can recharge RaVolt in exactly the same way you use it to charge your other devices: by plugging it into the USB port of your laptop. This, combine with its automatic ability to adapt to the correct voltage makes it by far the most convenient, useful, and affordable external battery device on the market. On a full charge, RaVolt can charge a Macbook Pro multiple times, and an iPhone 6 over mulipletimes. Imagine the difference that can make to the way you travel, work, and socialize online.



•Power: USB port/250mA

•Operating System: Windows Vista/XP/Server 2003/2000, Mac OS-X/OS-9, Linux

•LED indicators:

                                Tx: green

                                Rx: yellow

                                Power Presence: red

•Max baud rate: 9.6 kbit/s

•USB standard: USB1.1/USB 2.0

•CS standard: IEC 62056-21

•Working temperature: -40 °C do 85 °C

•Galvanic isolation: 4 kV

•Size(L x H x W): 72x22x15 mm

•Mass: 20 g


                                                          

                   


Master - meaning it sources current required for communication with the CS slave devices.

USB Powered - USB is powered directly from the USB port so there is no need for an external power.

Reliable - USB contains reliable chips from Texas Instruments and Silicon Labs ensuring high performance.

Secured -  4kV Galvanic isolation between USB and CS terminal, keeping peripheral devices secured.

Provides feedback - using LED indicators USB provides additional data to the user about power supply and data traffic, thus simplifying the use of RaVolt.

Platform independent - Windows XP-2k3-Vista-7 / MacOS / Linux / Android 


                                   




                    

                          

           

       


Why We Need Your Help

Although RaVolt is designed and ready for distribution, we still need funds to put into promotion and marketing so we can build an audience. We’d like to offer as many incentives as possible for those who are able to donate the money we will need to make this happen. The funds gathered from this campaign will allow us to produce our first run, and go towards letting the world know that this solution exists. The more we can produce in a single run, the cheaper the price per unit will be! Take advantage of the special low prices we are offering during this campaign, because you won’t always be able to get RaVolt this cheap.


Tell Your Friends

If you’ve ever wished it was easier to keep your devices charged on the go, then you should already see the enormous value of RaVolt We’d like to serve as an inspiration for other entrepreneurs and startup enterprises to get out there and release their innovations to the world through the crowdfunding model. We know a lot of people who need a solution like this, so tell your friends to contribute so we can promote it to the world. Sharing this campaign on your social media profile is just as valuable to us as an actual financial pledge.

RaVolt
= Mobile power  for
your MacBook and all your devices.Mobile
Power : Did you ever have a problem with your laptop or smartphone running out of battery during an urgent work? Did you ever want a powerful and reliable power source with you? Did you ever think how would it be to have a wall outlet in your pocket? We did, too. So we designed a powerful, affordable and portable USB electricity supply for all of us. Now you have RaVolt. You just need to take out the your AC outlet from your pocket or your bag to continue to your life. RaVolt is a powerful small USB device that
generates constant electricity supply for your MacBook, plasma
TVs, Smartphone's, Cameras, MP3 Players and
more?What Makes RaVolt So Useful?
RaVolt is the only recharging
product on the market that does not require a cable, and in fact does not even
need to plug into your normal charging port. Other types of external batteries
must be rated for the correct voltage to match your device. On top of that,
they must fit the size and style of your charging port, which varies
drastically from device to device, even within the same brand. Because RaVolt
works through the USB port, it is more compact and easy to use with almost any
device. 
The best thing about RaVolt is that
you don’t even need to worry about recharging it through a wall outlet. You can
recharge RaVolt in exactly the same way you use it to charge your other
devices: by plugging it into the USB port of your laptop. This, combine with
its automatic ability to adapt to the correct voltage makes it by far the most
convenient, useful, and affordable external battery device on the market. On a
full charge, RaVolt can charge a Macbook Pro multiple times, and an iPhone 6
over mulipletimes. Imagine the difference that can make to the way you travel,
work, and socialize online.•Power:

story:
HAEMERIS: The perfect bracelet to make women safe.
 
Do you live in fear to be victim of a sexual assault? Maybe have you, a family member or a friend already been a victim... Sexual aggressions are too common to be taken lightly.   
It is time to empower women who live in fear. Do not search anymore because HAEMERIS is the perfect solution giving women safety and peace of mind. No more fear of walking down the street to visit a friend, to go to work or just to take a stroll around your home.




HOW HAEMERIS IS DIFFERENT?

So many devices available on the market have indeed nice functions which are however offered individually. For instance, even though a message is sent to the police the aggressor as still the time to do his horrendous deed and run away before the police turns up. HAEMERIS is the combination of all functions one can think of in one device (with tiny accessories). Let's review the functions which make HAEMERIS so unique and so safe.



The HAEMERIS Wings
Before going through the comprehensive functions of the HAEMERIS, it is important to introduce this mini-tiny device called the HAEMERIS Wings attached the shirt behind the buttons or on an underwear will have one of its wings ripped if the aggresor tears or pulled violently the woman's colthes (which is always the case). This will activate the bracelet and a series of actions (see below) will take place. The wings has double-face stickers on them to hold well on the clothes. If (or when) the stickers do not stick anymore, they can be replaced with new stickers.




  • An very loud and irritable alarm will ring just like car's alarms. This will get the attention of people nearby and surely will prevent the aggressor to continue.
  • A strong light will temporarily blind the bad guy.
  • SMS messages will be sent to the police and family and friends to inform them that a sexual assault is taking place. The message will contain the geolocation thanks to the GPS of the device.
  • Picture and video will be taken so that the victim can help the police identify the author of the crime. It will act also as a proof of the assault.
  • Taking the HAEMERIS bracelet off from someone's wrist is not easy. So the aggressor is very unlikely to remove it.


HAEMERIS a beautiful smartphone

  • In fact, this bracelet is before all a smartphone. Equipped with Android Lollipop, it has most top-notch functionalities of the latest mobile phones in the market.
  • This beautiful designed bracelet looking like a jewlery is very fashionable and comes in 2 sizes (2.5 and 3.5 inches screen).
  • The Hook part is removable and can be replaced with one of another material (metal, stone, plastic, wood). 

Patents:
Two patents are currently being filed:
To enable a 20% reduction of heat of the CPU.
To prevent the HAEMERIS Wings to have its wings detached too easily while allowing them to be ripped when an aggression occurs.

Technical Description





STRETCH GOALS

Participate to a good cause:
Not only this project this amazing HAEMERIS bracelet serves a good cause by itself by protecting the one who wears it, but if we reach $2,000,000, we are committed to give 20% of this sum to non-profit associations and centers dedicated to fight against sexual aggressions and to support the victims.



Design concept and Prototype

    Prototypes:

Currently we have a fully working prototype, the photos in campaign are computer renderings of what we have so far. But as every prototype is very ugly. Our watches are based on a new projection technology that has proven itself. Our task is to bring our model the closest to the technical ideal. We will do our best to achieve this. You will be able to monitor and even control all production stages and give your suggestions to the first working prototypes.




No worries for the size of the watch. Actually the screen part still fix.
It's the Hook size will be different. From XS -> 3.5 inch to XL-> 8 Inch





ABOUT US:

We are a brand new start up. We are located in WE+ Co-Working space in Beijing China. We worked on this project since November 2013.

We are brand new in this industry but we have a lot of supporters and many professionals works already with us. We like hard-working. Challenge and Innovation are our hobbyhorse.

We have more projects and ideas.

Support us and you will see what we can bring to you.

THANK YOU UNDERLIGHTGAMES & Innovations Team!!!!



Where your funds will go :





Estimate development time

    We need your help to develop HAEMERIS and start mass production. Then HAEMERIS will come to reality. You'll be the first to receive HAEMERIS at a price significantly less than future retail price. We hope that you like the HAEMERIS and will be happy to answer your questions and suggestions.

Production: 

We use advanced technology of high quality that has already been tested and developed by many other companies. The whole production process is monitored at the highest level by well-known professionals in their field.


Delivery time:

We understand the whole seriousness of our work, and we understand that our terms of production and date of perk delivery may change. We will cover all stages of production, so you will be informed of the course of work and the date of delivery. Please support us and make these watches a reality. Thank you!

FAQ:

I can't get my payment to work in Paypal, what should I do?

Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.

What countries and mobile networks will support the HAEMERIS?

HAEMERIS is an open device, not locked to any particular network. It works in all countries that provide GSM/3G/LTE-based network services. It will also support the two LTE standards to provide 4G mobile broadband connectivity around the world (subject to network availability and data fees). Before launch we will conduct interoperability testing with networks in Europe, the US, South America, China, India, the Middle East and Africa. This is a normal step in the process of developing a mobile device.

Why set such a high funding goal?

It’s all about scale. To offer the final product at a competitive price we need to produce enough volume to bring the unit costs down. At the same time, we want to be selecting parts that are not yet proven for multi-million-unit production. This is the balance we found. A lower funding target might seem more likely to succeed, but the individual perk amounts would have to be significantly higher. We believe this funding target and these perk levels give us the best chance of success.

What if you fail to reach the funding target?

We appreciate every bit of support we receive during the 30 days, and every backer will be welcomed into the HAEMERIS community. If we don’t reach our target then the funds will go for non-profit organisations which works to fight against assault on women.

What warranties apply to HAEMERIS and HAEMERIS wings?

A standard manufacturer warranty will apply. If you are not happy with the product, you may return it within 28 days of receiving it for a full refund. Please note, UNDERLIGHTGAMES & INNOVATIONS can not cover the cost of the return postage and packaging.

I made a contribution, but now I've changed my mind. How do I get my contribution back?

Contributions on Indiegogo are nonrefundable according to the Indiegogo Terms of Use. A contribution is a transaction that takes place purely between the contributor, campaign owner and payment processor. HAEMERIS not refund any contributions made. However, if you are not happy with the product we deliver, you may return the HAEMERIS phone watch or the HAEMERIS wings within 14 days of receiving it. Read more in the Indiegogo Helpcenter.

Why you don't have a web site?

Actually we are working on. Our website will open soon. But you can learn more about us here: http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzA5ODAzMTg0MQ==&mid=207617344&idx=1&sn=ae2d588a0b030ccce429d2b0319d5ebe&scene=1&from=singlemessage&isappinstalled=0#rd

(Only in chinese for the moment)

story:
Powerful Communication App!

Coming this Summer to iOS!

Are you tired of having all of your friends spread throughout many social media and communication apps? Having to change between apps just to see their profile and then having to switch back to message them.

We and the 600 people we surveyed think its ridiculous. Why not make it simple by unifying the experience?

Beepur has done just that. We decided to create a feature rich all-in-one communication app in your pocket. Beepur delivers a seamless experience to connect with your loved ones in a myriad of ways.

Beepur will allow users to create their own profile where they can share pictures and videos with loved ones. Share content in chat, including videos audio notes, and choose how long they will be accessible. Have a lot of friends you would like to video chat with? Feel free to video chat with multiple users in one screen (future release).

Use powerful filters and editing tools using texts, filters, shapes, drawing tool, meme, stickers, and more! Once done, share it with your loved ones anywhere:

Beepur will be initially released on iOS followed by Android and Windows Phone.

With our backers support, we will pay the development fees and hire two more developers to help us release the app in a timely manner. We will add planned features such as in-app voice calls, group video chat, in-app community and more; to share content and meet other users with similar interests.

Risks and challenges

Apps are not easy to create. They require vigorous testing and coding. There may be delays in delivering the Beepur and in programming; their are always challenges to be faced. There may be a lot of crashes at the beginning stages of the app that will need to be fixed. Android, iOS, and Windows phone all use a different programming language for apps and Beepur will need to be optimized for all. However, our founders have the technical and business experience to get this done efficiently. We have a team of testers and developers that are all successful app publishers. Our programmers are informed and skilled in various programming languages. Beepur is the future of communication and with the support of our team and backers it will launch successfully.

story:
Short Summary


What is Bablr? A Revolution born out of Evolution!
Bablr is international mobile platform being developed by USA and China partners simultaneously for release in English and Chinese language markets.


Bablr:是一款帮助你管理所有社交媒体的手机APP

Bablr-管理你的数字生活！用这一个APP管理你所有的社交媒体。



Bablr is a content managing software for your smartphone and/or tablet that enables you to integrate ,interact  and communicate  with  Facebook,Twitter and  all of your favorite social media  friends and contacts on multiple social networks simultaneously while  on your device in one app, Bablr!


Bablr是一款手机或平板电脑上使用的内容管理软件，只需Bablr这一个APP就可以实时地同时地与你的Facebook、Twitter等所有社交媒体上的朋友们保持联系、互动、分享。



On the Go power users of smartphones and tablets interact, communicate and share content across multiple social networks...its the trend that's pushing the global growth of the smartphone socialmedia market,
Bablr is here now for you the mobile power user, to set you free to do more!


很多智能手机和平板电脑用户常常通过多个社交媒体分享内容并与朋友们保持联系，这是推动社交媒体市场发展的动力。

现在有了Bablr，让低头族们能更高效的应用好移动社交媒体！



Bablr, be a part of the  mobile networking Evolution Revolution!


                                   Bablr, 是移动社交的一场革命性的创新！








                       Be the First To Get Yours,Bablr! "Rule Your World" T-Shirt                                                                                (available as a perk)

     第一时间得到你的Bablr！“管理你的世界”短袖衫（额外送给投资者的小礼物）


 


The first mobile social networking apps were from established socialmedia sites like Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. These apps are just simple mobile expressions of their websites. These 1st generation apps  (mobile networking 1.0)  are quite old and offer nothing new, They are towers of isolated functions and processes with limited integration among the various social network mobile apps .(Facebook,Twitter,Instagram,LinkedIn,Google+,WhatsApp).



第一批社交网络APP来自Facebook, Twitter和Instagram. 这些APP只是简单的对其网站再呈现。第一代APP（社交网络1.0版）非常陈旧没有新意。他们是各种社交网络移动应用程序在有限的集成功能和过程的分离塔。(Facebook,Twitter,Instagram,LinkedIn,Google+,WhatsApp). 





These 1st generation mobile socialmedia apps (mobile networking 1.0) from Facebook and others were built with the idea of keeping you the user exclusively on their sites, but that is not the usage TREND of mobile consumers. Mobile consumers typically interact with Facebook then move on to multiple sources of social media, liking, friend-finding, posting and messaging along the way. In addition,  there are now over 1 million apps for your smartphone, which has lead to app and social media overload. Consumers are becoming overwhelmed by app overload and are tired of wasting time and energy  on their smartphone or tablet going from one app to another just trying to keep up!



第一代来自Fackbook和其它移动社交媒体的APP（移动社交1.0版）建立在把用户留住在自己的网站上的理念，但这不符合手机用户的使用习惯。手机用户经常在Facebook和多个社交媒体上发表喜好、寻找朋友、分享图片文字、留言发表评论，等等。此外，现在有超过一百万的手机APP，这导致了应用程序和社交媒体过载。APP过载使用户浪费时间和精力而不堪重负，他们忙碌繁琐的使用智能手机或平板电脑从一个APP切换到另外一个APP！



Save Time

   

 省时

 



Bablr was designed as an evolution of how people actually use their smartphones, socialmedia and apps, Bablr moves the user from away from wasting time opening and closing 1st generation socialmedia apps to having all social networking available universally  at the same timein one app which is the way people actually want to use their smartphones to social network!

Bablr被设计为人们如何使用他们的智能手机、社交媒体和APP的演变。Bablr让用户可以轻松的在一个应用程序中使用各种社交媒体APP，不再浪费时间打开和关闭各个APP，这才是人们想要的智能生活！



Bablr's platform integrates Facebook,Twitter,Instagram with messaging and sharing across platforms, turning isolated standalone socialmedia streams into an   easily accessible social networking management application all in one app.

Bablr集成了facebook，Twitter，Instagram,可以在Bablr一个平台上面实现跨平台的交流分享。使各自独立的平台更加容易管理。



Bablr is the evolution of mobile networking to mobile 2.0 Technology. It makes life simpler not harder.  Bablr, a Revolution born out of Evolution!

bablr是移动网络技术向2.0版的演变。它使生活更简单，不难。bablr出世，革命的演变！








Take control of your Digital Life... 
The Revolution is here now!  

控制你的数字生活…

变革就从这里开始！
Bablr! One App to Rule them all!  
Upgrade Yourself to Mobile Social Networking 2.0!

bablr！一个应用程序来管理其它全部！

升级你的手机社交网络到2.0版！



.Bablr will let you monitor and interact with up to 10 socialmedia sites like Facebook, message and communicate with any or all contacts wherever they might be and will let you post, organize and share your multimedia, including pictures, videos and music to anyone anywhere!

bablr让你查看并与高达10个社会媒体网站如facebook的保持互动和交流。无论任何联系人在任何社交媒体APP上发布消息、分享照片文字，等等，你都可以通过Bablr查看，并及时回复。你也可以在Bablr上分享消息同步到你的所有其它社交媒体上。



Multiple Social Networks On One Platform 
多个社交媒体集成在一个平台上

Market Research From Pew and industry experts show that smartphone and tablet   consumers spend at least 30 minutes each day on mobile social networking, visiting sites like Facebook, Twitter and Instagram, opening and closing as many as 9 separate apps each session.


Pew的市场研究表明，智能手机和平板电脑的消费者每天花至少30分钟在移动社交网络上，访问网站如facebook，Twitter和Instagram，打开和关闭多达9个不同的APP。




 CrowdFunding: Why We Love IndieGoGo! 众筹：我们为什么喜欢Indiegogo


We have  researched the smartphone/socialmedia market extensively,what we found  out is that there are some integrating  solutions for socialmedia and communications on the PC Desktop,but there no solutions built and designed specifically to integrate the consumer's digital Life on mobile devices

We want Bablr to become platform of choice for the global smartphone/social-networking market.In order to achieve our goal we must fund Bablr and get it to market Now!

研究了智能手机/社交媒体市场，我们发现有一些基于电脑桌面的社交媒体解决方案，但没有专为移动APP社交媒体集成的数字生活解决方案。

我们希望bablr成为全球智能手机/社交网络市场的首选平台。为了实现我们的目标，我们必须为bablr融资！


This has led us to Indiegogo!
We chose IndieGoGo because we feel it will give us the best chance to complete Bablr and make it a reality. We love IndieGoGo because it is an universal community that helps entrepreneurs  to realize their dreams by allowing interested parties to help make their dreams, ventures and projects come true! CrowdFunding and BrandBuilding all on www.Indiegogo.com. Gotta Love it!


我们选择Indiegogo是因为我们觉得它会给我们完成bablr机会并最终实现它。我们的爱它,因为Indiegogo是一个很大的帮助企业家和梦想家实现他们想法的社区！融资和品牌都在www.indiegogo.com上能实现，不得不爱它！






                                 通过众筹赚钱：众筹可以是一起赚钱！




Earn Some Money From Crowdfunding: CrowdFunding can be CrowdEarning!

We are seeking Help from the Crowdfunding Community to make our fundraising a success. We believe in teamwork and sharing. We will share in our success with You!



We're now offering a 10% commission on every pledge you bring in. The baseline for this program starts at $250. Once you've referred $250 worth of pledges via your IGG unique URL, you’ll automatically be eligible for participation and be set to receive your payout at the end of the campaign.


分享你的专属URL链接，获取10%的投资佣金回报。你可以得到一个专有的URL链接，分享这个链接给朋友。当你的朋友打开这个链接并成功投资单笔不低于250美金，你将在本次众筹结束后自动获得10%的佣金作为回报。





For example: Say you bring in $10,000 in referrals that's $1000 in your pocket and all you had to do was get people to click your link and pick a donation Perk for Bablr


例如：假设你为我们带来了一万美金的投资，其中一千美金是你自己的投资。你要做的是让人们点击你的这个链接。

.



How it works: Simply log in to IndieGoGo to get your  personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or share your unique URL (below the main video at the top of the page). Spread the word about us with your friends all over the Internet and you'll earn refunds quickly! You can even track your own progress by visiting your IndieGoGo "My Profile" page and clicking on "Referrals."


如何操作：在www.Indiegogo.com注册并登录获取自己的追踪URL，然后点击分享（页面顶部的视频），在网络上传播URL给你的朋友圈，你将很快得到佣金！你可以通过访问Indiegogo “My Profile”页面来追踪自己的进展情况。





Bablr Features       

的特征




 1.  Universal Socialmedia Management: Real Time Integration, Interaction and Monitoring of Multiple Socialmedia Streams.
Bablr can  load up to 10 socialmedia  streams  simultaneously, including Facebook, Google Plus, Twitter, Instagram and LinkedIn.  

无限社交平台管理：实时集成，互动和多个社会媒体流监测。

Bablr可以同时装载10个社交媒体包括Facebook, Google Plus, Twitter, Instagram and LinkedIn.  





Bablr consumers can see their Timelines and Updates from all of their social media streams at once on the Bablr Homescreen.  This eliminates the need to close one app to see whats going on in another app.

Bablr用户可以在Bablr主屏幕上查看时间轴和所有来自其它社交媒体上的实时更新，这样就无需关闭打开不同的APP去查看更新。



Bablr does what Facebook, Twitter, Path, and WhatsApp  cannot  do, and will never do! which is offer integration and management of multiple socialmedia streams all at once in one place!

Bablr做了Facebook, Twitter, Path, and WhatsApp 不能并且永远也不会做的事，那就是把所有的社交媒体APP集成在同一个APP中。



Several Social Networks Streaming On One Platform, Bablr:


                                    在Bablr上集成的几个社交媒体



Open any Timeline to view any particular posting in detail, and once opened you may Like, Comment, Tweet, or Share It. 


在Bablr上打开Facebook等任意一个社交媒体的时间轴，可以如同你在Fackbook一样打开你喜欢的链接，评论，点赞，分享。





2.  Universal Contacts: Groups and Cliques   无限联系：建群和团体



Universal Contacts: Bablr allows the user to import contacts from socialmedia platforms - Facebook, and Twitter and their internal device contacts and make a universal contact list.



无限联系：允许用户直接导入Facebook, and Twitter等各种社交媒体联系人和手机联系人到Bablr联系人列表中便于统一管理。




Contacts can then be formed into specific Social Groups:



      可以方便的建群，把这些联系人分到不同的群里：



3.  Universal Messaging, Sharing, and Communication: 

                           无限消息、共享、交流：



Bablr enables you to pick from your contact list or group list and/or find anyone on any one of your social networks and send them a message. If both Parties have Bablr then they can exchange two way multimedia messaging including short videos, audio, images and music.

可以在Bablr联系人列表或你的某个社交媒体中选择联系人给他们发送消息。如果双方都使用Bablr，那你们可以通过Bablr来沟通，包括文字、声音、图片、视频、音乐。



4.   Universal Posting and Sharing of Content

在各社交媒体上同步分享消息和内容



Pick Content from your Device, Online, or from any of your Socialmedia Platforms and instantly share it in private messages to groups or post it universally to all your social networks simultaneously.

在手机上、网络上或者你的任何社交媒体上选择分享内容到某个群或你其它所有的社交媒体上，做到所有社交媒体同步分享。比如你可以选择在微信朋友圈的内容同时也分享到你的QQ空间里。



Universal Posting Never Got So Easy!


                                       同步分享从来没有如此简单！


5. Customization: Bablr will become the leader in personalizing the user's Profile, Homescreen and Greeting Wall.  Bablr will allow its users to add color backgrounds, pictures and images as well as customize how icons are arranged on their Homescreens.


可以设置用户资料，自由选择设置个性化的主屏幕和问候墙。bablr将允许用户添加彩色背景，图片和图像以及自定义图标。



Customizing Foreground and Backgrounds in seconds: Pick a picture and color background and walla! In 2 steps instantly change the entire look and feel of your Homescreen or Greeting Wall.


1.


瞬间定制背景和背景图片：通过两个步骤立即改变主屏幕或问候墙整个外观。


2.


 
Your Own Personal and Customized Look and Feel!

The Future        不久的将来


Bablr will be designed to accommodate Free Internet Calling when and where it is applicable.

可以用Bablr打免费网络电话。


                                                              现在开始捐款

                                                             选择你的捐款报酬 

                                                 

                                     不需要额外收入，我只想贡献自己的一份力量。

 




Advertisement,Business Partnerships and Sponsorship
Bablr has an advertisement space built into its homescreeen.The advertisement  space can be programmed for advertisement,announcements and or public safety notices.We are offering  placements  opportunities now to collaborators,marketers and partners.


Where We Are Now
We are about 75% finished development of an Android only version.  We have a test version available for the the public at www.bablr.mobi.  Funding  from IndieGoGo will enable us to complete Bablr and release it commercially. We expect to release the first commercial ready Android beta version no later than March 2015

Where will the Money go?
The money will go to finish the development of a  commercial ready Android version of Bablr, and then a follow-up IOS version.

Timelines
We expect to release the first commercial release, Android version of Bablr in March 2015. We will follow with an IOS version by July 2015.



Who are we?

BlackStar Technologies is a loose-knit group of serial entrepreneurs,computer programmers and Tech Geeks from around the world whom sit up 24 hours a day seeking ideas and solutions to make great technology.We work as a team and seek interaction with any interested contributors.



Other Ways You Can Help
We want YOU to download and test Bablr at www.bablr.mobi.
We seek your feedback and suggestions, We Want You To Be A Part Of Our Team!
We will acknowledge any suggestions we receive from you that we act on by recognition being given to you on our website as a contributor.

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the IndieGoGo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

Help Us make Bablr a Reality,please Donate Contribute,Referr or Gives us your Feedback

Its all Welcome


现在开始捐款   

你想要什么样的额外收入?


Thank You

Short Summary 


What is Bablr? A Revolution born out of Evolution!
Bablr is international mobile platform being developed by USA and China partners simultaneously for release in English and Chinese language markets.



Bablr:是一款帮助你管理所有社交媒体的手机APP

Bablr-管理你的数字生活！用这一个APP管理你所有的社交媒体。




Bablr is a content managing software for your smartphone and/or tablet that enables you to integrate ,interact  and communicate  with  Facebook,Twitter and  all of your favorite social media  friends and contacts on multiple social networks simultaneously while  on your device in one app, Bablr!




Bablr是一款手机或平板电脑上使用的内容管理软件，只需Bablr这一个APP就可以实时地同时地与你的Facebook、Twitter等所有社交媒体上的朋友们保持联系、互动、分享。




On the Go power users of smartphones and tablets interact, communicate and share content across multiple social networks...its the trend that's pushing the global growth of the smartphone socialmedia market,

Bablr is here now for you the mobile power user, to set you free to do more!




很多智能手机和平板电脑用户常常通过多个社交媒体分享内容并与朋友们保持联系，这是推动社交媒体市场发展的动力。
现在有了Bablr，让低头族们能更高效的应用好移动社交媒体！




Bablr, be a part of the  mobile networking Evolution Revolution!




                                   Bablr, 是移动社交的一场革命性的创新！














                       Be the First To Get Yours,Bablr! "Rule Your World" T-Shirt                                                                                (available as a perk)


     第一时间得到你的Bablr！“管理你的世界”短袖衫（额外送给投资者的小礼物）


 




The first mobile social networking apps were from established socialmedia sites like Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. These apps are just simple mobile expressions of their websites. These 1st generation apps  (mobile networking 1.0)  are quite old and offer nothing new, They are towers of isolated functions and processes with limited integration among the various social network mobile apps .(Facebook,Twitter,Instagram,LinkedIn,Google+,WhatsApp).




第一批社交网络APP来自Facebook, Twitter和Instagram. 这些APP只是简单的对其网站再呈现。第一代APP（社交网络1.0版）非常陈旧没有新意。他们是各种社交网络移动应用程序在有限的集成功能和过程的分离塔。(Facebook,Twitter,Instagram,LinkedIn,Google+,WhatsApp). 





These 1st generation mobile socialmedia apps (mobile networking 1.0) from Facebook and others were built with the idea of keeping you the user exclusively on their sites, but that is not the usage TREND of mobile consumers. Mobile consumers typically interact with Facebook then move on to multiple sources of social media, liking, friend-finding, posting and messaging along the way. In addition,  there are now over 1 million apps for your smartphone, which has lead to app and social media overload. Consumers are becoming overwhelmed by app overload and are tired of wasting time and energy  on their smartphone or tablet going from one app to another just trying to keep up!

在Bablr上打开Facebook等任意一个社交媒体的时间轴，可以如同你在Fackbook一样打开你喜欢的链接，评论，点赞，分享。




2.  Universal Contacts: Groups and Cliques   无限联系：建群和团体







Universal Contacts: Bablr allows the user to import contacts from socialmedia platforms - Facebook, and Twitter and their internal device contacts and make a universal contact list.





无限联系：允许用户直接导入Facebook,
and Twitter等各种社交媒体联系人和手机联系人到Bablr联系人列表中便于统一管理。


Contacts can then be formed into specific Social Groups:






      可以方便的建群，把这些联系人分到不同的群里：




3.  Universal Messaging, Sharing, and Communication:                            无限消息、共享、交流：




Bablr enables you to pick from your contact list or group list and/or find anyone on any one of your social networks and send them a message. If both Parties have Bablr then they can exchange two way multimedia messaging including short videos, audio, images and music.







可以在Bablr联系人列表或你的某个社交媒体中选择联系人给他们发送消息。如果双方都使用Bablr，那你们可以通过Bablr来沟通，包括文字、声音、图片、视频、音乐。



4.   Universal Posting and Sharing of Content

在各社交媒体上同步分享消息和内容






Pick Content from your Device, Online, or from any of your Socialmedia Platforms and instantly share it in private messages to groups or post it universally to all your social networks simultaneously.


在手机上、网络上或者你的任何社交媒体上选择分享内容到某个群或你其它所有的社交媒体上，做到所有社交媒体同步分享。比如你可以选择在微信朋友圈的内容同时也分享到你的QQ空间里。



Universal Posting Never Got So Easy!



                                       同步分享从来没有如此简单！



5. Customization: Bablr will become the leader in personalizing the user's Profile, Homescreen and Greeting Wall.  Bablr will allow its users to add color backgrounds, pictures and images as well as customize how icons are arranged on their Homescreens.

可以设置用户资料，自由选择设置个性化的主屏幕和问候墙。bablr将允许用户添加彩色背景，图片和图像以及自定义图标。


Customizing Foreground and Backgrounds in seconds: Pick a picture and color background and walla! In 2 steps instantly change the entire look and feel of your Homescreen or Greeting Wall.

1.



瞬间定制背景和背景图片：通过两个步骤立即改变主屏幕或问候墙整个外观。
2.



 


Your Own Personal and Customized Look and Feel!

The Future        不久的将来






Bablr will be designed to accommodate Free Internet Calling when and where it is applicable.


可以用Bablr打免费网络电话。


                                                              现在开始捐款
                                                             选择你的捐款报酬 
                                                  
                                     不需要额外收入，我只想贡献自己的一份力量。 










Advertisement,Business Partnerships and Sponsorship

Bablr has an advertisement space built into its homescreeen.The advertisement  space can be programmed for advertisement,announcements and or public safety notices.We are offering  placements  opportunities now to collaborators,marketers and partners.





Where We Are Now

We are about 75% finished development of an Android only version.  We have a test version available for the the public at www.bablr.mobi.  Funding  from IndieGoGo will enable us to complete Bablr and release it commercially. We expect to release the first commercial ready Android beta version no later than March 2015

Where will the Money go?
The money will go to finish the development of a  commercial ready Android version of Bablr, and then a follow-up IOS version.

Timelines
We expect to release the first commercial release, Android version of Bablr in March 2015. We will follow with an IOS version by July 2015.






Who are we?


BlackStar Technologies is a loose-knit group of serial entrepreneurs,computer programmers and Tech Geeks from around the world whom sit up 24 hours a day seeking ideas and solutions to make great technology.We work as a team and seek interaction with any interested contributors.







Other Ways You Can Help


We want YOU to download and test Bablr at www.bablr.mobi.
We seek your feedback and suggestions, We Want You To Be A Part Of Our Team!
We will acknowledge any suggestions we receive from you that we act on by recognition being given to you on our website as a contributor. Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Remind them to use the IndieGoGo share tools!   And that's all there is to it.Help Us make Bablr a Reality,please Donate Contribute,Referr or Gives us your FeedbackIts all Welcome现在开始捐款   你想要什么样的额外收入?Thank You

story:
Noisebud who?

Me, Sol Andersson, and Johannes Ahlberg started the gritty club-music project Noisebud in 2008, we produced music, played live and participated in different art projects. At the time we had no idea we'd develop a bunch of very popular VST plugins but we decided early on not to limit the project. I think we realized that this thing, this Noisebud, might grow into something much bigger and limits felt like a bad idea.

As we evolved our projects got bigger and more technical, we had a growing need to create our own custom tools to be able to realize our ideas, both live, in the studio and with our sound and art installations. We started to experiment with MAX/MSP, Pure Data, Supercollider and Synthedit. Synthedit had the ability to export its patches as VST plugins which come very handy when you quickly want to combine different patches for a new live set or recreate something you did on stage in the studio without having to connect your whole live setup, we just saved the patch as an VST and stored it for later use.

When we released our first plugin to the public we didn’t expect much. We had made the plugin for a specific task, it worked as expected and released it because we'd been fighting with it for a while and thought others might find it useful. It might even draw some new audience to our site so we thought why not!

Someone wrote about the plugin on a blog, a newspaper picked that up and someone did a positive Tweet about the article... and all of the sudden... BAAAM! The visitor stats went through the roof and instead of sporadic questions about our music or booking requests we start to get support questions, hundreds of comments, feature requests like bigger GUI, smaller GUI and business proposals from all over the world... 
Every since that very first plugin we received requests for Mac and 64bit versions and we have politely turn it down since we've been fine with 32bit versions and always used Windows and we lacked the tools and time to realize it.


Then we met Patrik Ohlson, a talented composer and computer wiz that'll solve everything you throw at him. He helped us to realize our most technical advanced project "Open Source Intelligence" last summer and we got very impressed about the way he solved complex problems in absolutely no time. We started to talk about 64bit and OSX versions but didn't go forward since we lacked both the time and necessary funds to make it come true. It was Johannes idea to check out crowd funding, he started to talk about it and slowly convinced both me and Patrik that this was the way to go... And here we are!


What We Need
We need to buy at least one Mac, the Juce library (we need the commercial license even though we're making this as donation-ware, bummer) and we need time, lots of time. 


What You Get

You'll get a bunch of unique audio plugins and you'll be able to influence the outcome through comments and discussions. You also get the plugins long before rest of the world. 
Our plan is to have all plugins ready at the end of August 2015!

The Plugins:


Lazy Kenneth

Simulate a sidechained compressor in EDM (or all music where you mark every 4th with a bass drum).

Planned updates:
  •  A real sidechain input that'll duck as nicely as a compressor but in a very much simpler way.
  • Apple AU and VST, Windows x64 and updated 32bit versions
  • New GUI
  • Improved volume curves for better feeling

Midsider

Will give any plugin mid/side capabilities
Planned updates:
  • Compatible with all DAWs!!!
  • Apple AU and VST, Windows x64 and updated 32bit versions

Smile

De-harsh your audio with a Fletcher-Munson curve

Planned updates: 
  • We'll rework the transient recovery to sound excellent
  • Apple AU and VST, Windows x64 and updated 32bit versions

Evouyn

Will help you to get that perfect balanced low-end.

Planned updates:

  • We'll rework the math for a more accurate measurement
  • Apple AU and VST, Windows x64 and updated 32bit versions
  • Improved GUI


Fletchy-Muncher

Reveal harsh elements in your mix with a little help from Fletcher-Munson

Planned updates:

  • Apple AU and VST, Windows x64 and updated 32bit versions


Fantalilstic Pluggelino, the $500 Perk

Will warp your audio through spacetime and come back all nice and sticky Fantalistic! Or not... You'll be with us with this one... It might just be a volume knob that goes to 11... Or maybe 12...


Other Ways You Can Help
We know, your monthly plugin developer budget might already be empty, it happen to us all the time. You can still help us a lot by sharing this campaign to everyone you know.. And don't know... Friends, foes, mom, dad, teacher, twitter, facebook, linkedin, G+, tsü... we'll even be forever grateful for a post on Myspace!


Follow the Development

We'll post videos and news about progress and breakthroughs here, on Facebook, Twitter and our site, Links below!

And join the Facebook event too!!!

story:
Our Story and What We are Looking to Accomplish

Blueprints of our prototype:

Limitless Peak was founded by Joshua Neuhart, Dylan Pietrs and Obed Munoz, three entrepreneurs from Denver, Colorado who all mutually experienced a problem while skiing at Keystone Ski Resort; that problem being the irritation of ears when listening to music with traditional ear-buds.  How did we solve it?  By visualizing and drawing out multiple unique features that would provide a safe and enjoyable skiing experience.  These features all came together to create the unique Limitless Peak Bluetooth Enabled Ski/Snowboard Helmet.  However, the helmet is just the starting point to the limitless possibilities that are in store.

We plan to raise $250,000 towards building the one of a kind Bluetooth Enabled Ski and Snowboard Helmet that combines comfort, entertainment, and safety into one unique masterpiece.  The helmet consists of high quality built in speakers that allow the user to listen to their favorite music in style without even using their hands!  The unique memory foam padding encased by the durable, hard plastic outer shell of the helmet provides comfort and safety to all who wear.  With multiple designs, the Limitless Peak Bluetooth Enabled Ski and Snowboard Helmet will fit the personalities of all customers.  The built in microphone provides the user with the ability to talk on the phone, as well as control the music content and volume. The adjustable strap on the back of the helmet ensures a proper fit for each customer, providing a safe and comfortable experience for every user.  After using the Limitless Peak Bluetooth Enabled Ski and Snowboard Helmet, you’ll never use a different helmet again.

Upon completion of our campaign, funds will be used to cover manufacturing costs, as well as monthly costs of renting out warehouse space to store our product.  We plan to manufacture our products through partnering with an established manufacturer out of Shanghai.  Additionally we will utilize the funds to develop the Limitless Peak brand through our merchandise line, which will consist of t-shirts, water bottles, sweaters, and many other outdoor products.  

Unique Perks (all perks are named after popular ski resorts in Colorado):

Contribution Amount 

Perks

$5

Receive a personal ‘Thank You’ From Limitless Peak

$35

Receive a Limitless Peak T-Shirt and a personal ‘Thank You’ From Limitless Peak

$50

Receive a Limitless Peak T-Shirt, a Limitless Peak Stainless Steel Water Bottle and a personal ‘Thank You’ From Limitless

$100

Receive a Limitless Peak T-Shirt, a Limitless Peak Stainless Steel Water Bottle, Stickers, Key Chain and a personal ‘Thank You’ From Limitless Peak

$150

Receive a Limitless Peak T-Shirt, a Limitless Peak Stainless Steel Water Bottle, Stickers, Key Chain, Drink Koozie, and a personal ‘Thank You’ From Limitless Peak

$200

Receive a Limitless Peak T-Shirt, a Limitless Peak Stainless Steel Water Bottle, Stickers, Key Chain, Drink Koozie, Limitless Peak Lanyard and a personal ‘Thank You’ From Limitless Peak

$350

Receive a Limitless Peak T-Shirt, a Limitless Peak Stainless Steel Water Bottle, Stickers, Key Chain, Drink Koozie, Limitless Peak Hoodie, Limitless Peak Lanyard and a personal ‘Thank You’ From Limitless Peak

$1000

Receive everything, plus the prototype and a personal ‘Thank You’ From Limitless Peak

Some risks that Limitless Peak may encounter include competition, disputes with our manufacturer, inventory management and the language barrier.  We plan to overcome these obstacles in many different fashions.  First, by enforcing our competition with a differentiation strategy, in the sense that our helmet has both the Bluetooth capability of using both the music and phone functions on smart devices, as well as Bluetooth hands free headset incorporated into the helmet.  Additionally as part of our differentiation strategy we are incorporating a social entrepreneurship aspect, in giving a percentage of our profits back to our community.  On the basis of disputes and language barriers with our manufacturer, we have already set in place to hire a translator to help minimize language barriers between the Limitless Peak corporate staff and our manufacturer.  Finally, when it comes to inventory management; we have set in place to hire multiple independent contractors to work within the warehouse, as well as an Information Technology Manager to manage inventory going in and out of the warehouse.  Together lets Peak to success.  Together we are Limitless.

**Can’t contribute today! Support our dream by following us on Twitter @LimitlessPeak and by using the hashtag, #LimitlessPeak

story:
Koala Wallets - SUV of Wallets.

Modular System Fits Any Use  (Free Tool Card)

Fire Starter + Survival Tool Card  

Upgrade from 16 in 1 Tool Card for $5, or FREE just for sharing our campaign with your friends - leave a PUBLIC comment after you share (no screenshot needed).

The Koala was designed with feedback from backers of our first Wallgers Kickstarter campaign, which was more than 233% funded, and the follow up Indiegogo campaign, which was 128% funded. 

This Indiegogo campaign was started to enable Indiegogo members to pre-order the Koala wallets, and also with a shorter than usual duration so we can get them to you before the holidays.

It's the most useful designer leather RFID wallet with built-in lithium battery and cable to charge BOTH Apple + Android phones and tablets. 

The modular system is centered around the unique expandable accessories pocket - hence the name Koala.  

All Wallgers wallets are high quality handcrafted leather wallets that combine fashion and function:

  • Handcrafted full grain leather (brown or black)
  • RFID shielding protects credit cards
  • Full size, fold flat design
  • 2,500 mAh rechargeable lithium battery mobile charger*
  • Fit up to 15 credit cards throughout the wallet
  • 2 cash compartments
  • 2 hidden slots hold important things and Tool Cards*
  • Expandable accessories pocket holds mobile charger*, business cards, Bluetooth tracker 

* Included at no charge for this Indiegogo campaign's backers

Accessories:

Lithium Battery Mobile Charger ($20 value)

  • One cable for BOTH micro USB and Lightning devices
  • 2,500 mAh adds hours of battery life to phones and tablets
  • Recharges while inside the Koala accessories pocket
  • Swaps out in seconds

16 in 1 Wallet Tool Card ($10 value) 

    • Screwdrivers
    • Bottle, can ,letter, box opener
    • Can opener
    • Nut drivers
    • Cell phone stand

This campaign includes 1 of each above (battery and tool card) FREE but you are welcome to add additional pieces to your Perk.

Fire Starter + Survival Tool Card ($15)

Upgrade from 16 in 1 Tool Card for $5, or FREE just for sharing our campaign with your friends - leave a PUBLIC comment after you share (no screenshot needed).

  • Screwdrivers 
  • Bottle opener 
  • Nut drivers
  • Can opener
  • Saw
  • Knife (firestarter scraper)

Bluetooth Tracker ($25)

This is a full power Bluetooth tracker to prevent your wallet from getting lost or stolen.

  • Rechargeable lithium battery (not small button one)
  • Full power for extended 120 feet range
  • Android and iOS apps

As it is USA is focused on handcrafted fashion accessories with the best materials and craftsmanship. Our lines of designer fashion bags can be found in premier boutiques in Asia, Europe, USA; even the Hong Kong Airport! They are also online at opensky.com and our own website. 

Wallgers is our new line of fashionable and functional wallets and will have the same detail and focus on craftsmanship, design, and quality materials. Each will be handcrafted for us by small shops so we can keep tight quality control. That’s what makes Wallgers look and perform better than other “RFID wallets with phone chargers”. We designed the wallet with the battery pack at the same time so they fit without looking like they were thrown together by a charger manufacturer. 

We are not in the business of making cheaper products with lower quality materials just for the sake of volume sales. Our philosophy is to use the best materials and hire the best shops to produce (not manufacture) accessories that look good, perform better, and last longer. 

For quality assurance, all Wallgers will be inspected, tested, and hand assembled in the USA. 

Should your Wallger need repair or replacement within the first year, it will be taken care of at no charge. Lifetime Free Battery Replacement Labor If the lithium ion batteries ever need replacement, we will replace it without any labor charge. 

Perks for your support 

We expect to ship to all backers in late November, early December 2015. 

Single Pack ($98 Retail)

  • Early Bird $38
  • Indiegogo Price $48

2 Koala Pack

  • Early Bird $68
  • Indiegogo Price $88

5 Koala Pack

  • Early Bird $178
  • Indiegogo Price $208

Don't forget 2 FREE Gifts just for sharing our campaign with your friends - leave a PUBLIC comment after you share (no screenshot needed): 


A. Fire Starter + Survival Tool Card ($15 value) FREE Upgrade from 16 in 1 Tool Card . 


B. Extra Tool Card (Ninja or Survival)

What we will use the funds for

The leather wallets will be handcrafted for us by a small shop in Asia. The battery packs will be sourced from a trusted factory and will be inspected in the USA. We have already completed the design and testing process so the funds raised here will go straight into materials and production costs, along with the shipping to backers. 

Please spread the word about Wallgers to your friends and family. 

Risks and challenges

As it is USA is focused on handcrafted fashion accessories with the best materials and craftsmanship. Our lines of designer fashion bags can be found in premier boutiques in Asia, Europe, USA; even the Hong Kong Airport! They are also online at opensky.com and our own website.

Wallgers is our new line of fashionable and functional wallets and will have the same detail and focus on craftsmanship, design, and quality materials.

Having worked with artisans in Asia to make the eco-friendly bags, we have no problems sourcing and delivering the Wallgers. The goal is $500 because we believe in quality over quantity. Of course, should you Indiegogo members want more, we are capable of making as many is needed without sacrificing quality control.

The modular system is centered around the unique expandable accessories pocket - hence the name Koala.  
All Wallgers wallets are high quality handcrafted leather wallets that combine fashion and function:



Handcrafted full grain leather (brown or black)

RFID shielding protects credit cards
Full size, fold flat design
2,500 mAh rechargeable lithium battery mobile charger*
Fit up to 15 credit cards throughout the wallet
2 cash compartments
2 hidden slots hold important things and Tool Cards*
Expandable accessories pocket holds mobile charger*, business cards, Bluetooth tracker 

* Included at no charge for this Indiegogo campaign's backers
Accessories:
Lithium Battery Mobile Charger ($20 value)

One cable for BOTH micro USB and Lightning devices
2,500 mAh adds hours of battery life to phones and tablets
Recharges while inside the Koala accessories pocket
Swaps out in seconds

16 in 1 Wallet Tool Card ($10 value) 


Screwdrivers
Bottle, can ,letter, box opener
Can opener
Nut drivers
Cell phone stand

This campaign includes 1 of each above (battery and tool card) FREE but you are welcome to add additional pieces to your Perk.
Fire Starter + Survival Tool Card ($15)
Upgrade from 16 in 1 Tool Card for $5, or FREE just for sharing our campaign with your friends - leave a PUBLIC comment after you share (no screenshot needed).



Screwdrivers 
Bottle opener 
Nut drivers
Can opener
Saw
Knife (firestarter scraper)


Bluetooth Tracker ($25)


This is a full power Bluetooth tracker to prevent your wallet from getting lost or stolen.

Rechargeable lithium battery (not small button one)
Full power for extended 120 feet range
Android and iOS apps

As it is USA is focused on handcrafted fashion accessories with the best materials and craftsmanship. Our lines of designer fashion bags can be found in premier boutiques in Asia, Europe, USA; even the Hong Kong Airport! They are also online at opensky.com and our own website. 

These are some of our designer handcrafted bags
Wallgers is our new line of fashionable and functional wallets and will have the same detail and focus on craftsmanship, design, and quality materials. Each will be handcrafted for us by small shops so we can keep tight quality control. That’s what makes Wallgers look and perform better than other “RFID wallets with phone chargers”. We designed the wallet with the battery pack at the same time so they fit without looking like they were thrown together by a charger manufacturer. 

Brown or Black Full Grain Leather
We are not in the business of making cheaper products with lower quality materials just for the sake of volume sales. Our philosophy is to use the best materials and hire the best shops to produce (not manufacture) accessories that look good, perform better, and last longer. 
For quality assurance, all Wallgers will be inspected, tested, and hand assembled in the USA. 
Should your Wallger need repair or replacement within the first year, it will be taken care of at no charge. Lifetime Free Battery Replacement Labor If the lithium ion batteries ever need replacement, we will replace it without any labor charge. 
Perks for your support 
We expect to ship to all backers in late November, early December 2015. 

Koala wallet + mobile charger + Tool Card
Single Pack ($98 Retail)

Early Bird $38
Indiegogo Price $48

2 Koala Pack

Early Bird $68
Indiegogo Price $88

5 Koala Pack

Early Bird $178
Indiegogo Price $208



Don't forget 2 FREE Gifts just for sharing our campaign with your friends - leave a PUBLIC comment after you share (no screenshot needed): 


A.  Fire Starter + Survival Tool Card ($15 value) FREE Upgrade from 16 in 1 Tool Card . 


B.  Extra Tool Card (Ninja or Survival)






What we will use the funds for
The leather wallets will be handcrafted for us by a small shop in Asia. The battery packs will be sourced from a trusted factory and will be inspected in the USA. We have already completed the design and testing process so the funds raised here will go straight into materials and production costs, along with the shipping to backers. 
Please spread the word about Wallgers to your friends and family. 
Risks and challengesAs it is USA is focused on handcrafted fashion accessories with the best materials and craftsmanship. Our lines of designer fashion bags can be found in premier boutiques in Asia, Europe, USA; even the Hong Kong Airport! They are also online at opensky.com and our own website.Wallgers is our new line of fashionable and functional wallets and will have the same detail and focus on craftsmanship, design, and quality materials.Having worked with artisans in Asia to make the eco-friendly bags, we have no problems sourcing and delivering the Wallgers. The goal is $500 because we believe in quality over quantity. Of course, should you Indiegogo members want more, we are capable of making as many is needed without sacrificing quality control.

story:
Introducing the ExtraVerso Cover



ExtraVerso is the revolutionary smartphone case with an extraordinary grip. Stick it to any glassy surface - take a selfie, record a video, or follow your GPS hands-free.


ExtraVerso in the news

Take your phone to new heights. ExtraVerso is the best thing to happen to the smartphone since the front-facing camera. 





How does the ExtraVerso cover work?

The innovative material has the suction effect on flat and glassy surfaces, but isn’t sticky at all to hands or pockets, and doesn’t attract dust.

The resin reproduces the effect of thousands of mini-suction cups that grip on tight to all non-porous surfaces.



Technical Specs

The cover is made of 2 parts:

   - A 3M® adhesive that has been developed for being repositionable, meaning you can place it on the phone and remove it many times, without leaving any sort of residue on your beloved phone

   - A lateral bumper that protects the edges of your phone.

The design-extremists that don’t want to alter the original (and wonderful) design of their smartphone, can choose to only place the back cover, without the bumper. They will therefore get all the grip, but a bit less of protection.

The more cautious will also place the lateral bumper, in order to get total protection for the smartphone. 

We hate bulkiness

We believe that the beauty of your phone shouldn’t be tarnished by a thick case. For this reason, the cover + the lateral bumper only add 1.5mm of thickness to the phone.

To clean it, just wipe it with a dry cloth. 


ExtraVerso Perks

All the Covers + Bumpers are available for: iPhone 5/5S, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, Samsung Galaxy S5, Samsung Galaxy S6. You will choose the device at the end of the campaign.

Trusted by the Best

We’ve already worked with some of the coolest companies and brands out there to create fully customized and limited editions of ExtraVerso. With our Extra-Unique perk, you can design an ExtraVerso of your very own.

"The UBER Edition of the ExtraVerso cover has been companion for several months now, and I enjoy it every day a little more!" Elena Lavezzi, Marketing Manager UBER Italy


Where we are and why we need you

Today, we secured contracts with all our suppliers, we made several product improvements, and we are already able to produce small batches of products. 

But now your support can make the difference.

We don’t want to keep our products available only for a small niche of people. We want the ExtraVerso cover to be available online and offline, to the entire world. And that’s why we need you. Increasing the production capacity, setting-up a reliable logistics structure, and dealing with increasing volumes need funding, that only you can provide us.


The team behind ExtraVerso

The ExtraVerso cover was developed by Flavio and Benedetto, two young entrepreneurs coming from two different parts of Italy: Naples and Turin.

During their journey, they’ve connected for a team of other passionate and creative people to make the ExtraVerso Smart Cover a reality.


Production timeline


Risks and challenges

In the past months, we put a lot of work into designing, prototyping and testing our products. We established strong partnerships with all the suppliers involved in the manufacturing of our products, and we improved all the production and logistics processes.

For these reasons, we believe that the risks associated with the manufacturing and shipping are very low.

We are committed to keeping you informed of every step of manufacturing and shipping at the end of the campaign.

We can’t wait to get the ExtraVerso cover in your hands!


FAQs

 - The features -

How long does the ExtraVerso cover stick to the surface?

It can stick for several hours depending on the kind of surface. If the surface is flat and clean, it can stick to it for several hours (or days!). The more smooth, flat and clean the surface, the longer the cover will stick to it. We suggest that you apply some pressure while sticking the phone to the surface, and you will notice whether the grip on that surface is very strong or not.

On which surfaces does the cover stick?

The ExtraVerso cover stick to all flat and non-porous surfaces. These are for example glass, mirrors, tiles, computer screens, whiteboards, polished plastic and steel...

Does the ExtraVerso cover loose its suction effect over time?

After more than a year of testing, the ExtraVerso covers haven't lost any of their suction effect.


 - The product -

Does the ExtraVerso cover affect the ability to slide in and out of pockets?

Of course not. The material is very smooth, and will easily slide in and out of your pockets. 

Is it possible to remove the cover form the smartphone and then re-use it?

Obviously, the cover has been developed to be repositionable. It means that you can place it on the smartphone and remove it several times. 


Does the ExtraVerso cover leave residues on my smartphone once I remove it?

The adhesive is 100% residue free. This means that once you remove the cover from your smartphone, it won't leave any sort of residue on it. 


Does the ExtraVerso cover accumulate dust or lint?

Not at all. If some dust should go on it, you can just wipe it and it will shine as if it was new.


Does the ExtraVerso cover protect my smartphone?

The back cover protects your smartphone from shocks and scratches. For a full protection, you can also apply the lateral bumper that we provide for free with all of our covers.


 - The perks -

I want a customised case. What shoud I do?

At the end of the campaign, we will send you an email containing all the information in order to get your customised cover.


Will you ship the products worldwide?

Sure. We will ship the products all around the world. Please make sure the provide us with all the relevant shipping and address details.

Other Ways You Can Help

You are an inventor, a designer, a reseller, a distributor, a journalist or an architect and you thought of some partnership we could put in place?
Please send us an email to info@extraverso.com. We will be glad to imagine what crazy things we can do togheter.

story:
Remember when flashlights were hand-held only? Now can you imagine a camping trip without your trusty headlamp?


Life Mounts is a small company with a BIG, yet simple, idea.  We want to shake up the outdoor adventure community with a totally new perspective on hands-free lighting.


The Life Mounts LED Pack Light attaches to the shoulder strap of any sized pack and provides forward facing light.  The powerful LED flashlight has 3 modes, operates on one AA battery and can be seen for over 1,000 feet. The patented universal mount is made of durable silicone rubber and attaches with secure velcro straps meaning your light will fit and stay exactly where you put it but can also be easily removed for hand-held use.

Features:

• Bright, Water Resistant, and Shockproof 300 Lumen LED Light with 3 Modes: High, Low, and Safety Strobe
• Durable, Weatherproof Silicone Rubber Mount with Easy-to-Use Velcro Attachment Straps
• Dimensions: 3.5"L x 1.5"W x 1.25"H and 3.4oz (w/ battery)
• Burn time of 2.5hrs on high and 20+hrs on low

It's All About The Mount!

Every backpack strap is different and having a mount that adapts to every pack on the market is essential.  The Life Mounts strap mount was specifically designed to adapt to day packs, backpacking packs, kid carriers, camel backs, and school packs.  The attachment straps that secure the mount and light to your pack provide a comfortable and secure fit.  The silicone rubber mount raises the light up off the shoulder strap to allow for optimal positioning and unobstructed shine. In addition, it flexes to adapt to any sized flashlight you may put in it.


The first LED Pack Light and Mount was born from a need for hands-free light underwater.  Life Mounts founder, Christoph Pierre, designed the custom mount to attach to his BCD for use doing marine science research projects.  He quickly saw the use on his day pack and backpacking pack.

The prototypes of the first LED Pack Lights are currently on the packs of gear editors and testers at Outside and Backpacker magazines.  We  need your support to get them on the packs of everyone else.

Since Life Mounts is a small company, we are able to maintain control over every aspect of the design, testing, and production process.  We take extreme pride in everything we build knowing that each and every light and mount will help someone lead a safer and healthier life.

We would love for you to become one of the very first people to experience the LED Pack Light first hand.

Donate Now!!

What We Need & What You Get


We want to be as transparent as a glass of water.  Here is exactly how your contributions will be spent:

Custom Injection Mould to Mass Produce Silicone Rubber Pieces

Silicone Rubber Pieces for Initial Mass Production

Velcro Straps for Initial Mass Production

Flashlights for Initial Mass Production

Retail Packaging


You can rest assured that every dollar donated will be utilized to the fullest to officially bring this product to market.



Other Ways You Can Help


A donation to finance the LED Pack Light is just one way that you can help us bring this idea to life.  We understand that money is tight, heck, that's exactly why we put this campaign together. 


Can't donate? Not a problem.  Help us out by telling your friends and family about our idea and encourage them to check out this campaign as well as our website: www.lifemounts.com . Don't forget to like us on facebook, tweet about us on twitter, email it to your best buds, and leave us a comment.


Thanks for checking out Life Mounts and the LED Pack Light.

Together we'll light up your life.

story:
Short Summary

I work in the Internet security team, focused on ethical hacking - deliberately and purposefully challenging the IT security assumptions, strategies, and methods of protecting vital assets and information by emulating an adversary. I have over 8 years of experience  in the IT field, both theoretically and practically. I teach a vast portfolio of courses: Cisco CCNA, Cisco CCNA Security, NDG Linux Basics by Cisco,  Custom-made Security Training. I have several IT certifications and trainings, such as OSCP, ISO 27001 Lead Auditor, CEH (Certified Ethical Hacker), CCNA, CCNA Security, CCNP Routing and Switching, Advanced Linux&InfoSEC, VMWare vSphere Install, Configure, Manage , (MCTS/MCP 70-642): Microsoft Windows Server 2008 Network Infrastructure, etc. 
I love IT Security. However learning about it wasn't always affordable from both financial and the access to information points of view. Nowadays, you can find plenty of information and software online, but this course is intended to go further than teaching you just to use some tools. I want to give the students a good understanding of what penetration testing methodologies are and how to think as a hacker. In hacking, tools are not enough!

What We Need & What You Get

This training is based on a practical approach of day-by-day situations and it contain labs based on real hacking environments. For the labs, target virtual machines are provided. There are over 17 exercises within the labs. Furthermore, there are over 5 hours of video content.

The course objective is to help you learn to master the hacking techniques and methodology that are used in penetration systems. The course is designed for IT passionate, network and system engineers, security officers.

Below are the main topics, both theoretical and practical, of this course:

Chapter 1: Introduction to Ethical Hacking, Footprinting and Reconnaissance

Chapter 2: Scanning Networks, Enumeration and Vulnerabilities

Chapter 3: System Hacking

Chapter 4: Sniffing

Chapter 5: Metasploit

Chapter 6: Trojans, Backdoors, Viruses and Worms

Chapter 7: Cryptography

Chapter 8: Penetration testing on Wireless Networks

Chapter 9: Penetration Testing

This course is intended for Network and System administrators, Students and IT passionate  and even IT Security Managers. Some basic understanding of computer networking it's required.

The Impact

The course is already out there, I just want to get as many people as possible to know it.

As I said, I want this course to be accessible. Also, I want to be easy to understand. It is said that an image value more than 1000 words, but I think a video containing pictures, words and detailed explications of the labs are even more valuable. So I started this rising campaign in order to bring my knowledge closer to people. I'm starting this rising campaign in order to promote my course and in the same time you can obtain a good price for it.

Risks & Challenges

I wanted to make this course to reach as many people as possible. To be accessible, to be easy to understand, also not to be just theoretical but rather to give the student's a change to practice in real-life like environments. I hope I can help others with my experience. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
