story:
This LED table lamp enables wireless charging with a magic charging dock. Minimally designed and made of magaluma, the lamp with a super-bright 6w led light and a touch switch will certainly be a best companion for your work,reading and life.

SIZE: Length 420mm Height 310mm

WEIGHT: 1.5KG

INPUT: 100-240V

OUTPUT: 12V

WIRELESS CHARGING CURRENT: 800mha

LED POWER: 6W

COLOR TEMP: 6000-6500K

LAMP COLOR: Black 

The 6W super-bright LED chip helps to save energy most, making the lamp a best choice for your work, study and reading.

Made of magaluma, the lamp’s arc frame is processed with polishing, anodizing, sand blasting and dyeing. Our strict requirement for high quality makes a great increase in the cost.

Of course, the most important feature of the lamp is to charge your smart phones wirelessly. Put your phone on the lamp dock with a QI compatible wireless charging receiver, and your phone will be charged automatically, a really cool and convenient function.

Note: Even when the lamp is off, its wireless charging is still available.

No matter what model your phone is of, the lamp is able to charge it wirelessly with a compatible receiver.

Note: At present, we provide receivers compatible to all phone models except MOTOROLA and SONY.

The lamp is controlled by touch keypresses. Press + or - key to adjust the lamp to the most comfortable brightness.

Touch the power key in the middle to turn on or off the lamp.

Note: The lamp control and the wireless charging work independently without mutual interference. When the lamp is off, you can still use its wireless charging. In addition, the lamp has a caring function of brightness memory. As long as you do not cut off the power supply, the brightness, when you turn on the lamp again, will stay the same as you use it last time. In this way, you do not need to adjust the brightness every time you use the lamp.

The wireless charging module of ACCOONA Table Lamp adopts a design conforming with Wireless Power Consortium’s QI standards. It outputs a 1000mha charging current with protections against over temperature, over voltage, over current and short circuit. 

In your daily life, you are using many digital gadgets with a lot of incompatible chargers, which makes great inconveniences. With an ACCOONA Lamp, you can charge your phone easily and conveniently in a cool way. If you keep ACCOONA lamps both at home and in your office, you can even throw away your charger.

 When you support the project, please send your phone's specific model to the mailbox          hsx@accoona.hk
to inform us, so that we can choose the appropriate adapter for your mobile phone



                               

About us:

Accoona, an innovative brand of electronic technology, created by Wenzhou Shengyi Electronic Techonology Ltd. and Hongkong Shengyang International Trade Ltd., is devoted to wireless recharging. The brand features an innovative, mould-breaking, simplified and practical design and it is always in the pursuit of perfection in its production. We currently have a group of energetic and creative product designers and technical engineers, all of whom place high value in the quality of products as well as in the promotion of the concept. With the greatest expectations and boundless imagination for a better life, we look forward to tomorrow as young people like us always have dreams for the future.

Our vision:

To become a world-leading innovative technological corporation.

Perk:


Risks & Challenges

When the lamp comes into massive production, there is no doubt that we want to make a perfect processing on every detail, especially the metal part, to whose quality we pay the most attention. Our great efforts on perfecting details increase the rate of unqualified products and slow down the production as well, driving up the final cost. Therefore, we have to make a better control over the production.



THANKS！
story_txt:
This LED table lamp enables wireless charging with a
magic charging dock. Minimally designed and made of magaluma, the lamp with a
super-bright 6w led light and a touch switch will certainly be a best companion
for your work,reading and life.

SIZE: Length 420mm Height
310mm

WEIGHT: 1.5KG
INPUT: 100-240V
OUTPUT: 12V
WIRELESS CHARGING CURRENT:
800mha
LED POWER: 6W
COLOR TEMP: 6000-6500K
LAMP COLOR: Black 

The 6W super-bright LED chip helps to save
energy most, making the lamp a best choice for your work, study and reading.

Made of magaluma, the lamp’s arc frame is
processed with polishing, anodizing, sand blasting and dyeing. Our strict requirement
for high quality makes a great increase in the cost.



Of course, the most important feature of the lamp is
to charge your smart phones wirelessly. Put your phone on the lamp dock with a
QI compatible wireless charging receiver, and your phone will be charged
automatically, a really cool and convenient function. 
Note:
Even when the lamp is off, its wireless charging is still available.




No matter what model your phone is of, the lamp is
able to charge it wirelessly with a compatible receiver. 
Note:
At present, we provide receivers compatible to all phone models except MOTOROLA
and SONY.

The lamp is controlled by touch keypresses. Press + or
- key to adjust the lamp to the most comfortable brightness. 
Touch the power key in the middle to turn on or off
the lamp. 
Note:
The lamp control and the wireless charging work independently without mutual
interference. When the lamp is off, you can still use its wireless charging. In
addition, the lamp has a caring function of brightness memory. As long as you
do not cut off the power supply, the brightness, when you turn on the lamp
again, will stay the same as you use it last time. In this way, you do not need
to adjust the brightness every time you use the lamp.

The wireless charging module of ACCOONA Table Lamp
adopts a design conforming with Wireless Power Consortium’s QI standards. It
outputs a 1000mha charging current with protections against over temperature,
over voltage, over current and short circuit.

gadgets with a lot of incompatible chargers, which makes great inconveniences. With

story:
Technology is always constantly evolving. Unfortunately, the latest hardware and innovations always comes with a price not everyone is able to afford. Our mission is to create the best portable PC system for the people, while keeping it affordable. We refused to compromise on the quality of the hardware even at a very low price. This mission is what led us to create GOSTICK.

This prototype is featured with Atom X7 Z8700 with 4GB ram and 64GB eMMC.
All models of GOSTICK will be featured with the latest updated processor Atom X7 Z8750.

The video shows various software that can be run with ease.
1. Microsoft Office.
2. Adobe Photoshop CS6.
3. Blender - 3D graphics and animation software.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_db5URr_EEA


"Tiny but powerful”, that is exactly what our product is all about. GOSTICK fits into the palm, is as powerful as your desktop computer yet lighter than your smartphone. Despite its small size, it is packed with the latest hardware making it one of the smallest yet powerful PCs in its category. We are the first to offer a small, lightweight computer that integrates all of the latest technology in a little package. This allows GOSTICK to perform any computing task with the highest efficiency and speed.

We are particular about the quality of the hardware but we are just as passionate about good design. We want GOSTICK to look stunning. At  first glance, you will feel that the design capture your attention.


GOSTICK is a revolutionary portable PC which is designed to be used for a multitude of tasks whether for work or for play.
GOSTICK is the best portable ‘PC in a stick’ for everyone, across any age group or profession. There is just an endless possibilities as to what it could do for me and you.

All models (Standard, Enhanced and Extreme) of GOSTICK features with the following :

  1. Latest Intel Cherry Trail Atom X7 Z8750 2.57GHz Quad Core Processor.
  2. 2 X USB 3.0
  3. 1 X USB 3.1 Type C
  4. 1 X Mirco USB
  5. 1 X MicroSD Card Reader
  6. Wireless AC
  7. Bluetooth 4.0
  8. Gigabit Ethernet Port
  9. 3.5mm Audio Jack
  10. Power Adapter
The differences in models is the Ram & eMMC Internal Storage

With 25 years of repairing PC, laptop and tablet motherboard under our belt, we’ve learned a great deal from design mistakes and flaws from existing computers. Our expertise is up to components level on motherboards. Tapping into our years of experiences and with the assistance of Intel Embedded Technology Department, we are able put our knowledge to work for the good of the public in designing a revolutionary PC that is a quantum leap forward in terms of design, hardware and usage.

story:
We have made a demonstration video to see MACNETO in action, the following video demonstrates a fully functional MACNETO Prototype Alpha & Beta that solved charging bug with iPhone. Due to time-consuming prototype Beta (without LED indicator) only with iOS & USB Micro Tips as you can see from the video we are using Micro female adapter to connect to the USB power supply. Further improvement by implementing Beta circuitry to Alpha will make MACNETO to almost perfect.

Please don't mind the MACNETO "Ugly prototype", enjoy the video:

story:
What is the B.L.A.D.E.?

  • The B.L.A.D.E. is the worlds first smart phone to offer up to 1.2 Terabytes of storage in the palm of your hand!
  • The 720p DLP projector is great for meetings and for displaying any media from your handset!
  • Featuring a 6" touchscreen capable of 4k UltraHD output, this cellular phone has some amazing features.
For example, this device comes with a
  • built-in laser pointer,
  • dual 18 MP cameras,
  • and starts with 128 GB of solid state storage, (upgradable to 1.2 TB)! Thats an amazing amount of storage and power right in the palm of your hand. This device will run on either our own Linux based OS, or Android and is powered by the nVidia Tegra K1 Processor!


More Specificiations:

  • 8 GB RAM
  • Quad Core nVidia Tegra Processor
  • Timberwolf Audio with Noise Reduction and Beam Forming Capabilities
  • 18 MP Front and Rear Cameras
  • Dual MicroSD Slots
  • 720p DLP Projector
  • RFI Stylus with Built in Laser Pointer
  • Top Facing LED (Flashlight)
  • Dual LED Flash LEDS (For enhanced Camera Imaging)
  • USB C-type Connector for Data Transfers and Charging
  • 6" 4k UltraHD Touchscreen
  • OS (Will Run Linux or Android 4.4 KitKat *or higher)
  • 6500 mAH Battery
  • Network Unlocked

After years of improvements, cellular phones have come quite a long way, however during the upgrade process, quite a few features were left out or forgotten all together. With the B.L.A.D.E. we are bringing back some of these awesome features as well as pushing the envelope on others.

We are currently in the process of having the mainboard developed and with the help of our contributors will be able to have this product to market sooner than later. We have been working with quite a few major corporations to help bring this project from concept to reality.

The B.L.A.D.E. is also the handheld control center for the PiNAPoL Computing System , and is fully compatible with "The Slice" Mini-PC.

All funds received will go to the cost of manufacturing to get this product to market which we are preparing for  Late 2016.

Together we can make a change and put a more powerful device in the palm of your hands that can be easily upgraded as the need arises. Lightweight and extremely powerful, are YOU ready for the B.L.A.D.E. ?

**Fully Patented and Trademarked!

story:
Mailtrain

I want to build the best email marketing application that runs on your own server and is completely open source. I'm almost there with Mailtrain (www.mailtrain.org) but I still need your help to take the alpha-grade proof of concept software to the next level. Especially I plan to concentrate my time on the highly requested feature of automation and autoresponders.

Backers extra!

All backers get access to secret development version of Mailtrain. All regular users get to see the periodic stable release which should happen in 3 - 6 month cycles. So to access the future features early on you should either be a backer or get a paid subscription once the campaign is over.

Preface

After years of developing high performance software libraries to allow other applications send email messages, for example Nodemailer that powers the sending of millions of messages every day, I ended up in a situation where I needed to send some newsletters of my own. Unfortunately there didn't seem to be a solid open source self hosted solution available.

Sure, there are tons of services providing this for free or for a small fee as long as the subscriber list is not too large, but there's this special feeling of actually owning your own data that these services can't provide. You never know what kind of monkey business your service provider might decide to do. Anyone remembers that monkey-themed transactional email service and what happened to it? If you do, then you might appreciate not having such surprises on short notice that came with it.

So, I ended up creating my own solution to this problem, a newsletter application called Mailtrain, available at www.mailtrain.org. The work is huge though and I need your help to keep building it.

What I plan to do

Depending on the amount of funds I'm able to raise I'm going to devote my time into developing  Mailtrain further. A lot has happened since the initial launch, I've added many features like RSS campaigns, GPG encryption, click statistics, scheduling, etc., but there is still much left to do. Most requested feature so far has been autoresponders/drip campaigns and I would like to spend some time on adding first class automation into Mailtrain. I also plan to set up a to-do list and all backers can vote the most important features that should be implemented next.

story:
What is 12@12NOON?  It's an app that delivers 12-line dramatic scenes to your mobile phone or tablet every weekday at 12 noon.  It creates a viable digital link between the world of the play and you!

12@12NOON is user friendly.  At noon, one, self-contained scene appears on your cell phone, one line at a time.  You just swipe your screen to get to the next line.  You can comment on the scene, share with friends, or write your own 12-line scene, and who knows, you might get published!


12@12NOON, developed as part of  the Black Women Playwrights' Group Cyber Narrative Project, is important to the world of theater.  For playwrights, and we'll start with playwrights because they're the center of our mission, 12@12NOON gives them an opportunity to expand the world of the play that begins on stage and also share the story with those who might not be able to attend the theater.

For theaters, it allows their patrons to experience the play before they walk through the doors.  For parents bringing a new generation of theater goers with them, 12@12NOON allows them to introduce the world of the play, its characters and story, to new eyes and ears through social media.

And for that new generation of theater goers, 12@12NOON allows them to experience theater much the same way they share the rest of their lives with their peers, by commenting, sharing links, and writing their own ideas about what they've read or seen on stage. 

Please Give!  You are at an exciting moment when theater steps into the 21st century, its integrity and electricity intact, to tell new stories and revisit the classics!

HOW YOUR CONTRIBUTION WILL HELP!

 We're raising $30,000 to develop a final version of  the 12@12NOON  prototype, With the help of the Ford and Joyce Foundations, we've developed the prototype you see here and now we're ready to expand the app and make it ready to broadcast scenes for the general public. 

  1. Your funding will buy additional programming, including the clock that makes sure everyone gets their scene at 12 noon, no matter where they are in the world!
  2. Workshops across the country for playwrights and theaters to learn how to use this dynamic new tool to expand the world of the play and the theater-going experience.
  3. A few bells and whistles, new graphic design, theme music,  and expanded audio and video capabilities!

CAMPAIGN PERKS!

Our Perks are Really Special and Tax Deductible!

  1.  Everyone can enjoy the month-long subscription to 12@12NOON, with scenes from the Oregon Shakespeare Festival production of Marisela Trevino Orta's The River Bride,  Regina Taylor's stop. reset, and other award-winning playwrights.
  2. And we've got t-shirts!
  3. And theater tickets!    Our sponsor theaters, Oregon Shakespeare Festival, Ashland, OR, BAM, New York, NY,  and Studio Theater, Washington, DC are offering tickets to The River Bride, BAM's 2016 Next Wave Festival, and a show of your choice in the Studio Theatre 2016-17 season!

The Black Women Playwrights' Group is a non-profit organization duly recognized under the Internal Revenue Service Code, section 501 (c)3.  A portion of your contribution may be tax deductible, please consult your tax preparer.

 THE FUTURE IS NOW! 

 12@12NOON is the first app in our Cyber Narrative Project that can be used by playwrights and theaters across the country.  Until now, our online projects have focused on a particular play, playwright, and university technology department.  We've worked with MIT, Carnegie Mellon University Entertainment Technology Center, and George Mason University to create online content for plays by Lynn Nottage, Kris Diaz, and Chinaka Hodge.  With our developer, Appstute Technologies, we are stepping up our game to the national stage, and we're sure that what we've learned along the way will help us succeed!

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP!

If you can't donate, please share the news of this exciting new app with all of your friends, not just those who attend the theater.  Please use the Indiegogo share tools to help us spread the word about this exciting new app!

story:
Here is a pre-launch review by a well known head-fi.org contributor 

Here is the active head-fi.org forum discussion thread + Previews.

Latest Update - Production commenced.

The New 3 in 1 Benchmark:

We are very excited to introduce the third generation of Burson Audio Conductor.  We named it Conductor V2.

The Conductor V2 is a major update from the previous Conductor.  It is a headphone amplifier, DAC and preamp, 3 in 1 unit.  Like the previous Conductors, we are here to re-define reference class and establish a new performance, functionality and value ratio.


Design / Feature

Just like its predecessors the Conductor V2 circuitry is fully discrete in design.  i.e. no harsh, thin sounding IC chips on the signal path.  We believe that a well-designed discrete circuitry is the only way to achieve reference class sound.  

The Conductor V2 headphone amp and pre-amp section are powered by a dedicated 70W transformer.  Tuned to operate in pure Class A, it outputs over 8 Watt per channel into 16ohm, making the Conductor V2 one of the most powerful headphone amplifier in the world, capable of driving any headphone.

High power + class A operation = a lot of heat.  To effectively regulate all that heat, the Conductor V2 relies on its unique 6mm thick aluminum enclosure.   The geometry of the case and the precision of the enclosure’s build allows the entire case to disperse heat very evenly so it acts like a large heat sink.  

On the digital front the Conductor V2 features the flagship ESS Sabre DAC which is the most expensive and highest performing DAC chip in the world.  The V2 pushed this amazing chip to a new high using a completely new supporting circuitry and an independent power transformer.

The new USB module features the best digital interface from XMOS with their 8 core U6 chip supporting native DSD256 playback and up to 32bit depth.  The XMOS interface offers the highest level of connectivity from desktop Windows based system and Apple’s OSX to major mobile platforms such as Applie’s IOS and Androids.  The Conductor V2 will allow you to playback your digital content with the highest level of quality regardless of the operating platforms.

Regardless of what headphone is connected to the Conductor V2, be it the most power hungry to the most efficient and sensitive, be it big over the head type or small in-ear-types,  you will immediately hear detailed and dynamic music materializing from a peach black background.  With the Conductor V2, you will be placed even closer to the musicians and connect with them emotionally.  

The Offer

The Conductor V2 comes in two different model. The basic V2 is a headphone amp and preamp only unit with no digital inputs. While the V2+ features the full set of digital input including the Xmos USB module and the SABRE32 ESS9018 DAC board.

So the design is done and the Conductor V2 is production ready.  Then why Indiegogo it?  We need your help to set a lower price tag for it.     The previous Conductor is priced at $1,999USD and with all the added performance and features, the V2 costs even more to build.  However, we want it to have a lower price so more audiophiles can own this truly amazing machine.  

We want to set the V2 at $999USD and the fully equipped V2+ at just $1,499USD.   That’s over 25% more affordable than the previous Conductors.  For that to happen, we need to acquire components and raw material at much larger quantities and hence we need your help to make this happen. So, please support us on Indiegogo and make the Conductor V2 at this price levels possible for you and fellow audio enthusiasts.
story_txt:
Here is a pre-launch review by a well known head-fi.org contributor 
Here is the active head-fi.org forum discussion thread + Previews.
Latest Update - Production commenced.


The New 3 in 1 Benchmark:We are very excited to introduce the third generation of Burson Audio Conductor.  We named it Conductor V2.The Conductor V2 is a major update from the previous Conductor.  It is a headphone amplifier, DAC and preamp, 3 in 1 unit.  Like the previous Conductors, we are here to re-define reference class and establish a new performance, functionality and value ratio.Design / FeatureJust like its predecessors the Conductor V2 circuitry is fully discrete in design.  i.e. no harsh, thin sounding IC chips on the signal path.  We believe that a well-designed discrete circuitry is the only way to achieve reference class sound.  The Conductor V2 headphone amp and pre-amp section are powered by a dedicated 70W transformer.  Tuned to operate in pure Class A, it outputs over 8 Watt per channel into 16ohm, making the Conductor V2 one of the most powerful headphone amplifier in the world, capable of driving any headphone.High power + class A operation = a lot of heat.  To effectively regulate all that heat, the Conductor V2 relies on its unique 6mm thick aluminum enclosure.   The geometry of the case and the precision of the enclosure’s build allows the entire case to disperse heat very evenly so it acts like a large heat sink.  On the digital front the Conductor V2 features the flagship ESS Sabre DAC which is the most expensive and highest performing DAC chip in the world.  The V2 pushed this amazing chip to a new high using a completely new supporting circuitry and an independent power transformer.The new USB module features the best digital interface from XMOS with their 8 core U6 chip supporting native DSD256 playback and up to 32bit depth.  The XMOS interface offers the highest level of connectivity from desktop Windows based system and Apple’s OSX to major mobile platforms such as Applie’s IOS and Androids.  The Conductor V2 will allow you to playback your digital content with the highest level of quality regardless of the operating platforms.Regardless of what headphone is connected to the Conductor V2, be it the most power hungry to the most efficient and sensitive, be it big over the head type or small in-ear-types,  you will immediately hear detailed and dynamic music materializing from a peach black background.  With the Conductor V2, you will be placed even closer to the musicians and connect with them emotionally.  The OfferThe Conductor V2 comes in two different model. The basic V2 is a headphone amp and preamp only unit with no digital inputs. While the V2+ features the full set of digital input including the Xmos USB module and the SABRE32 ESS9018 DAC board.So the design is done and the Conductor V2 is production ready.  Then why Indiegogo it?  We need your help to set a lower price tag for it.     The previous Conductor is priced at $1,999USD and with all the added performance and features, the V2 costs even more to build.  However, we want it to have a lower price so more audiophiles can own this truly amazing machine.  We want to set the V2 at $999USD and the fully equipped V2+ at just $1,499USD.   That’s over 25% more affordable than the previous Conductors.  For that to happen, we need to acquire components and raw material at much larger quantities and hence we need your help to make this happen. So, please support us on Indiegogo and make the Conductor V2 at this price levels possible for you and fellow audio enthusiasts.

story:
We’ve designed an app that provides great benefits to every level in the sporting ecosystem. ITeamSport is available for both smartphones (iOS & Android) and desktops, offering different user experiences and linking everyone together (club/league/school, coaches and support team, players/athletes and parents/guardians).

We believe you deserve a free tool to facilitate your sport’s management tasks and also increase the excitement of sports participation.

Our campaign goal will allow us to meet user requests for app improvements (details described at the bottom of the page) and provide everyone with a better product. The campaign will also help spread the word about ITeamSport, so more groups can benefit from our free service.


Key features for ITeamSport:

Coaches (team-administrators, assistant coaches and other support staff)

  • COORDINATE. Easily create, notify and respond to events. Set attendance. View and download stats, reports and membership list. + 
  • EVALUATE. Create your own customized exercises and activities (e.g. agility, attack, defend and goal keeping), and evaluate your team’s athletic development individually, -or as a group. +

  • COMMUNICATE. Keep all communications in one place. Free internal messaging service (group and individual), as well as readily available player profiles with contact info, SMS and email.

Athletes 




  • Receive guidance and overview of your own sport-specific development, directly to your mobile
  • Easily respond to events. Let your coach know if you are coming or not
  • Free internal messaging. Receive and reply to key messages regarding your club and team activities

Parents (Guardians) 

  • Be notified about practices, matches and other events –and last minute changes
  • Google location mapReceive key message
  • Receive key messages regarding club and team activities

Club-managers




  • Create revenue and attract new sponsorships
  • Reduce club cost with free internal messaging

Not just another app! ITeamSport helps tie everyone together. Participants becomes more organized, motivated and feel equally appreciated by their coaches. Ultimately, we hope ITeamSport can contribute to greater athletic performance and fewer dropouts through closer follow-ups and guidance. 

Your support is needed to make ITeamSport the tool of choice within the grassroots sports and available to everyone. We’ll need your support, thoughts and ideas. Together we can truly make a difference for your sports organization. 

Best of all, unlike other products ITeamSport will always be free. 


To-do-list 

Main feature updates requested by users 

  1. Calendar sync. Making the calendar sync with handsets and computers integrated calendars such as iCal, Outlook etc.
  2. Multiple role function. Allow users to have multiple roles and link to multiple “clubs” simultaneously in one and the same profile.
  3. Match lineup. Enable the coach to “lend” players from other teams for match lineup. 

100+ features and functions is waiting for implementation including “mixed sex teams”, “snack features” (who brings what on match day), “image sharing” etc. 

If we achieve our campaign goal, we’ll have all the major features implemented. We’ll develop and implement the most requested features first and work our way down the to-do-list. If our campaign goal is not met, we’ll still start working on the most requested features within the budget framework. 

Please write to us at contact@ITeamSport.com. Your thoughts, ideas and suggestions for improvements are needed to build the best possible product.


When is what done?

Timeline (main activities)

Each new feature will be published and available immediately after its developed. 



How the funds will be used

Campaign goal

Our campaign goal is to raise $150.000. This will allow us to completely develop the newly proposed app features. $25.000 will still allow us to significantly push the project forward. The more funds we raise, the larger the tasks will be able to accomplish. 

Also, the better we do on this campaign, the greater possibilities we will have to raise money trough other sources (such as grants, sponsorships and from investors).


Other ways to help us:

  • Tell your fellow coaches, athletes, parents and sports enthusiast about our campaign
  • Share this campaign among your friends and followers on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and Instagram
  • Like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter


Common FAQs

Will I have to pay for the app at one point? No. ITeamSport is and will always be a free tool and a contribution to the grassroots sports.

Will ITeamSport become available for Windows phones? Yes. We will be developing ITeamSport for Windows at one point, but there are significantly more Android and iOS users and we’ll need to focus on them first. 

Will ITeamSport become available on tablets? Yes. We will be developing tablet versions but our main focus has been developing very well smartphone and desktop versions. At this moment, the smartphone versions of the app work quite well for tablets.


Please feel free to reach out to us at contact@ITeamSport.com with any questions and we’ll get back to you as soon as we can.


Our team

Our mission is to significantly contribute to sports organizations that deliver valuable well being services to children and youth. 


The ITeamSport contributors include:

Vidar Lien > concept development, content editor & front end development
Brian Power > developer, front & back end development
Edwin Merced > web development & content editor 
Anders Helling > content editor & support 
Jade Fulford > marketing coordinator 
Mark Robinson > strategic advisor 

We’ll also like to thank every sports organization, sports clubs, teams and individuals that have helped bring ITeamSport into life. 

Thank you for your time. 
Let’s make a more powerful product together.

story:
Meet Nold Open

Nold Open is a smartphone-controlled gate opener device, which is compatible with all electric gates, garage doors, barriers and other entry systems.

Recent press

Features

Turn any garage into a smart garage. Here are the features.

How does it work

You only have to follow 3 simple steps to install and setup your own Nold Open device.

Mobile application

Integrate all your existing remote controls into one app!

Access sharing

Grant or revoke access from your family and friends with the Nold application or on our cloud platform!

Hardware

We have created a high-tech solution which suits for private and business purposes. 

Nold Open will be available in 2 versions: wether controlled by our application or the Apple HomeKit system. Add Nold Open to the list of home automation products and make your home smarter.

  • Central control system for all Smart Home devices (such as locks, lights, camera, thermostats, plugs, switches…)
  • Siri integration (voice-control)
  • Secure pairing
  • Control individual devices or group into scenes

Various field of application

Nold Open is ideal for residential as well as business uses.

Technology

We are integrating Bluetooth Smart technology in our development. 
But what is it exactly?

Bluetooth is a wireless technology standard for exchanging data over short distances from fixed and mobile devices. The technology was invented by Ericsson in 1994. Since then several specification of Bluetooth were issued, lately the Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE).

BLE (also called Bluetooth 4.0 or BSmart) is the power- and application-friendly version of Bluetooth that was built for the Internet of Things (IoT). 

We are member of the Bluetooth Special Interest Group (Bluetooth SIG).

We are using Bluetooth Smart, because:

  • Available in most smartphones
  • Easy to setup
  • Provides secure and reliable connection
  • Has hardly any effect of the battery capacity of your phone

Technical parameters

Bringing Nold Open to life

We got in touch with first class electronics suppliers such as Nordic and Würth Elektronik who provided the Bluetooth chip and other electronic components for our development.

We wanted to make sure that the product is future-proof therefore the user can upgrade the firmware individually for free via the application. 

Based on the different use case scenarios we equipped the device with 2 relays therefore it can control up to 2 garage doors or gates.

By now we managed to fix all issues mentioned by our Beta-testers. So we are ready to move forward.

Project timeline

Below you can find the most important milestones in our company's past and future.

The Team

The key elements describing our company are the longterm experience of our developers in high technology, product design and reliable partnership with manufacturing companies. 

Our vision is to bring closer the smart technology to people and upgrade their life through our developments.  

We are looking for challenges because we believe that improvement is possible. Our team members are striving for excellence and are not satisfied with half solutions. We are fast-developing, professional and agile.  

  • Ervin Barna - CEO
  • László Babály - CTO
  • Csaba Kovács - Hardware developer
  • Gergely Bozsó - iOS developer 
  • Balázs Katzler - Android developer
  • András Sütő - Product designer
  • Péter Viszt - UX & UI designer
  • Judit Hári - Marketing manager

Our Goal

We currently have several working prototypes, but the support from the Indiegogo community would provide much needed funding for tooling as well as our first production run.

To achieve our goals and start the massproduction, we need to raise $30,000.

Besides the unique perks there are additional benefits of contribution.
If you support our project you have the chance to make your home smarter and simplify your life. The Nold team has a longterm plan to develop a full range of easily connectable, cost and energy-efficient smart home devices which ensure maximum compatibility. 

Other way to help

We do appreciate any kind of support, regardless it's financial or not.

Please share our campaign with your friends via the social media logos below. If you have any questions, feel free to drop us a message via Facebook, Twitter, YouTube or our website. 
We are more than happy to talk about our developments and discuss your questions.

FAQ

All Nold Open devices will be compatible with HomeKit?

Nold Open will be available in two versions. One of them works with Android and iOS using a custom app called Nold and lets you manage & share access for your garage, even in the cloud. This will be available in 2016 december. The other version, which is only compatible with Apple HomeKit is coming in 2017 february/march. You can see this as a separate perk. 

How does the Nold Open work?

Nold Open lets you control your garage door or gate with your smartphone instead of your traditional remote control.
Due to the built-in Bluetooth the device will detect that you are nearby and allow you to open the garage door or gate without a traditional key. Therefore you can use your smartphone as your key.

How many gates can I control with Nold Open?

Due to the 2 built-in relays you can connect your Nold Open device up to 2 electric gates or doors. However, the Nold application can handle unlimited number of gates. 

What kind of gates will Nold Open work with?

Our device is compatible with almost any kind of electric garage doors, gates or barriers, regardless the brand.

If I'm not in the near of my garage door, can I still open it with Nold Open?

At the moment no, but we are working on the solution.

Do I need a Wi-Fi network?

For the first time you need internet access to complete the configuration process. After that you can use your Nold Open device offline. Please note that your phone connects your Nold device with Bluetooth, so you don’t need mobile internet to control it.

Does Nold Open have a mobile app?

Yes, it can be downloaded from AppStore for iOS and Google Play for Android operating systems.

What requirements does my smartphone have to meet to successfully run the Nold Open app?

The Nold Open device is compatible with all mobile phones using iOS™ 9.0 (or newer), Android™ OS 5.0 (or newer) operating systems and having Bluetooth® 4.0 wireless technology.

How secure is Nold Open? Can someone hack my garage door?

Nold Open uses end-to-end encryption to secure the connection between your phone and the gate opener.
We use state-of-the-art technology and follow numerous security procedures to help protect your accounts from unauthorized access.

Will Nold be an open platform? How do I develop for Nold?

Currently there is an API available for managing invited users and inviting new ones. Furthermore we are working on an open API for developers, where you will be able to develop various applications and services for Nold platform and device. We plan to release more information on this at the beginning of 2017 . For related inquiries please send an email to help@nold.io.

What do I do if my phone runs out of battery?

No worries, in emergency you can control your gates with your traditional remote control as well.

What if my phone is stolen?

There are 2 solutions for this problem.
You can login to your profile in the cloud and logout from your Nold devices. After that the stolen phone won't show your virtual keys.
The second option is that you login to your account with another phone and re-configure your devices. 

Is there a Monthly fee?

No, there is no monthly charge to use Nold Open and its key sharing features. Moreover we provide a free cloud service as well. Please note later it will be a paid subscription service for managing large number of users and devices.  

How much does it cost?

The retail price of Nold Open will be 99EUR. However, you can take advantage of our special offers if you support our crowdfunding campaign.

What is included in the package?

It includes the Nold Open device, a connector and a Quick start guide.
Please note you will need a screwdriver, cables and screws (optional) for the installation.

Can I purchase the Nold Open in retail stores?

Not yet. Only during the Indiegogo campaign you have the chance to preorder Nold Open with special discount.

When & where is Nold Open expected to ship? 

We expect our first production run to ship in November 2016, with all backer orders fulfilled by the end of December 2016.
Early birds will receive their shipments first. We vow to keep all backers regularly up-to-date with shipping information and order status. Please reach out to help@nold.io with any questions.
We currently ship worldwide from Europe. This means if your shipping address is outside of the EU, you might need to pay additional import duties and taxes based on local regulations. Shipping cost inside the European Union is 10EUR, rest of the world is 20EUR. 

Can I get a refund?

Pre-orders are non-refundable. By making a contribution to this campaign, you acknowledge that you understand that you are contributing to a work-in-progress and not making a direct purchase. For more details please see Indiegogo's Terms of Use. 

What is the warranty for the product?

All product specifications, illustrations, drawings, particulars, dimensions and other information on the Site or made available by us are intended to represent no more than a general illustration of the Product and its features and do not constitute a warranty or representation by us that the Product will conform with the same. When the final product ships, it will come with a 12 month manufacturers warranty.

How do I become a distributor of Nold Open?

Please contact us at sales@nold.io for further information. 

I'm a member of the press. How do I get more information?

Please visit our website to download our Press kit. If you have any question, direct your mail to press@nold.io

I have questions, how can I reach the team?

We’d be happy to answer any questions. We are receiving a lot of support requests and are working to respond as fast we can! For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign or the product itself, you can email help@nold.io

Social contacts

If you want to know more about Nold, follow us on social media and visit our website.

FACEBOOK TWITTER NOLD.IO

At last, we must say a “thank you” for getting to know Nold; we can't wait for you to experience our achievement.

Media support

We vow to keep all backers regularly up-to-date with shipping information and order status. Please reach out to help@nold.io with any questions.We currently ship worldwide from Europe. This means if your shipping address is outside of the EU, you might need to pay additional import duties and taxes based on local regulations. Shipping cost inside the European Union is 10EUR, rest of the world is 20EUR. Can I get a refund?Pre-orders are non-refundable. By making a contribution to this campaign, you acknowledge that you understand that you are contributing to a work-in-progress and not making a direct purchase. For more details please see Indiegogo's Terms of Use. What is the warranty for the product?All product specifications, illustrations, drawings, particulars, dimensions and other information on the Site or made available by us are intended to represent no more than a general illustration of the Product and its features and do not constitute a warranty or representation by us that the Product will conform with the same. When the final product ships, it will come with a 12 month manufacturers warranty.How do I become a distributor of Nold Open?Please contact us at sales@nold.io for further information. I'm a member of the press. How do I get more information?Please visit our website to download our Press kit. If you have any question, direct your mail to press@nold.ioI have questions, how can I reach the team?We’d be happy to answer any questions. We are receiving a lot of support requests and are working to respond as fast we can! For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign or the product itself, you can email help@nold.ioSocial contactsIf you want to know more about Nold, follow us on social media and visit our website.FACEBOOK TWITTER NOLD.IOAt last, we must say a “thank you” for getting to know Nold; we can't wait for you to experience our achievement.Media support

story:
This is where we come in...

 

The Team

This startup was incubated at MIT by us, high school entrepreneurs. We are all experienced software programmers, hardware developers, and entrepreneurs who have a passion for making this vision a reality!  

Why We Need Your Help

As a budding startup with a prototype, we need your help in getting Tether V1.0 off the ground so that we can continue working towards our mission. Your donations matter and they are going to directly impact Tether's success!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign with all of your family and friends, we really appreciate your help!

story:
iPhone 6s or 7 comes with ion-strengthened Gorilla Glass, which is to say that it is scratch-resistant. Therefore, in most cases, you’ll be just fine without a screen protector.

However, for the scratch test for the iPhone, we realize that the screen does scratch from a razor blade. And if you constantly expose your iPhone to your keys and other sharper objects, you will most likely end up with a scratched display eventually. Moreover, for the worst-case scenario, the screen will crack if it is dropped accidentally.

This is why screen protector can actually be useful.

Screen protectors can actually save the day, protecting your iPhone from scratches, puncture, etc. However, it is not easy for the screen protector installation by most of us. The installation errors including air bubbles, dust or dirt caught underneath the screen protector, and improper alignment of the film on your device. Therefore, our ideas come out to deal with the installation problems.

We would like to introduce our 3 products in the below.

  1. Memo Magic Screen Protector Installation Tool
  2. Memo 2.5D Curved Edge Tempered Glass Screen Protector
  3. Memo 3D Curved Edge Tempered Glass Screen Protector

1. Memo Magic Screen Protector Installation Tool

​Installing a screen protector can be a daunting task for many. But it can be as easy as ABC by using Memo magic screen installation tool for your iPhone. 

Memo magic tool makes it far easier to achieve a perfectly aligned, bubble-free installation.​​

For the installation, simply clean the device screen, place the Memo magic tool on it, align the protector to the device, and gently place the screen protector onto the device. The screen protector only requires one touch application without any sprays, adhesives and leaves no residue.

2. Memo 2.5D Curved Edge Tempered Glass Screen Protector

Memo 2.5D Curved Edge Tempered Glass Screen Protectors has a 9H hardness rating which gives maximum anti-shatter and scratch protection. It is made of tempered glass and can dissipate the force of impact and save your iPhone screen from shattering if dropped.

Memo screen protector has an oleophobic coating which is designed to minimize the appearance of unsightly fingerprints and smudges.

It is available for iPhone 6s, 6s Plus, 7 and 7 Plus.

 

3. Memo 3D Curved Edge Tempered Glass Screen Protector

Memo 3D Curved Edge Tempered Glass Screen Protector has an edge-to-edge protection, which means even the slightest edge of your screen is protected with our protector. It can withstand not just accidental scuffs from sharp objects but handle shatter-level accidents too. 

Memo screen protector has an oleophobic coating which is designed to minimize the appearance of unsightly fingerprints and smudges.

It is available for iPhone 6s, 6s Plus, 7 and 7 Plus. You can choose from two different colors to match your screen: Black and white.

Who Are We

We are a team of local Hong Kongers. We believe ideas can change our life. Creation can be something that can simplify our work and entertain our lives. This campaign is the baby steps for our team and we will put more effort into creative development in the future.

Thanks for supporting Memo!

FAQ

Shipping

Memo ships to all countries. 

Stage of Manufacture

We have already completed the tooling for Memo. In order to start manufacturing, we must reach the factory minimum for our initial mass order. Once the Indiegogo campaign is over, we will be able to begin manufacturing.

Delivery Time

All Indiegogo orders will be dispatched late-January.

Screen Responsiveness

Memo tempered glass screen protector is crafted to be ultra-thin providing original touch sensitivity with oleophobic coating to repel fingerprints and smudges. It also perfectly works with 3D touch function in iPhone.

Other questions or inquiries​

Contact: union.invention@gmail.com

Our website is coming soon.

Thanks for supporting Memo!

story:
Short Summary

Combining my passion for music and entrepreneurial spirit, I founded SubwayTalent after moving to NYC when I couldn’t find a talented opera singer I witnessed in a subway station and wanted to create a better way for people to discover local artists. After having my cards declined on a date, I decided to pursue the SubwayTalent idea to avoid depression.

This campaign is extremely important because there are a lot of amazing undiscovered talents that are having trouble making money off their passion and a lot of event planners that are having trouble finding & booking quality talents. The funds from this campaign will strictly go towards hiring team members to help build SubwayTalent to eventually change people's lives.

 

The purpose of Campaign?

Your contribution will go towards hiring a backend web developer to help maintain and update the app, so the app can continue to improve and function properly for our users. At the moment, the SubwayTalent app is available to download on the App Store.

Press

Technical.ly

 

CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD SUBWAYTALENT

Other Ways You Can Help

We completely understand life happens, bills need to be paid, family needs to be taken care of, so you may not be able to contribute at this time, and that's totally understandable.

However, here's how you can still help us:

1. Share this campaign with your friends, family, coworkers, and all the followers on your social media platforms.

2. Share the SubwayTalent App to Musicians and Event Planners you know. Tell them to download and use the SubwayTalent app from the App Store.

"Yes, only two steps. It's that simple."

Also, by using hashtag #subwaygogo we will track the most active promoter and reward her/him for their amazing job. 

If you bring more donors than anyone else, we will reward you with one of two prizes of your choice: 

  • Monthly MetroCard if you live in NYC 

OR

  • We'll fly you out to New York to attend our first SubwayTalent Music Festival 2018 event. (Must be US based. Only covering the flight ticket purchase.)

Make sure you use "Indiegogo's sharing tools" so we can track your awesome friends that donate due to your recommendation. 

Words can't explain how grateful we are for your support!

Thank You!

Bens Hilaire

SubwayTalent

story:
Purchase more than 1 Palmzi and save on shipping!

WARNING: Prolonged use of mobile devices can be harmful to your health.

If you think this is just a scary tag line, you're partially correct. The truth is no one fully knows the long-term effects of using mobile devices because they didn't exist even 30 years ago.  What medical professionals do know is that staring down at a mobile device for extended periods of time leads to a condition that has come to be known as "text neck."  Chiropractors the world over recognize it as an epidemic of our modern culture. There hasn't been a cure or method to reduce the harmful effects of long-term mobile device use, until now:

Say Hello to PALMZI.

The Palmzi is the world's first ergonomic palm support for mobile devices in a stable, lightweight, foldable design. Here are just a few of the benefits of using the Palmzi:

  • Raises your mobile device to a safe, comfortable, eye-level distance.
  • Instantly corrects poor posture.
  • Helps reduce neck pain and stiffness associated with mobile phone usage, also knows as “text neck”.
  • Lightweight and durable yet portable enough to carry in your bag.

International Patent Pending number PCT/IB2017/000956


Here's How the Palmzi Works

  • While seated, move the soft foam pad to a horizontal position.
  • Extend the aluminum pole to a comfortable viewing height.
  • The pole can rest on your seat between your legs or be extended to rest on the floor.
  • Rest your hands on the soft foam pad at eye-level and use your mobile device as you normally would.
  • The rubber foot and the weight of your hands keep Palmzi in place so you can use your device for long periods of time without neck pain and stiffness.


Some Interesting Facts

It’s clear that more people around the world are spending more time on their mobile devices.  With support from the Palmzi, they can do that in comfort.

Did you know?

  • Globally, nearly 5 billion people use mobile devices1
  • Americans spend an average of 5 hours a day on mobile devices2
  • 70% of U.K. primary and secondary schools use tablet computers3
  • One-third of U.S. students use school-issued mobile devices4
  • eBooks represent 17% of the global trade book market5

Copyright © 2017 MCD SOLUTIONS LIMITED


Here's Where You Come In

We have been working on Palmzi for more than a year, and we know that it is a useful, one-of-a-kind product that will support millions of mobile users as they go about living their digital lives.  We are looking for health-conscious, forward thinkers like you to help them do that while combatting the negative impacts of poor posture.  But working with designers, prototyping, factory chains and patent processes can be extremely expensive.  We need your support to bring the Palmzi to the marketplace so you, your loved ones and millions of others can keep streaming, texting, reading, working, and swiping in comfort.
 

So Why Should You Support Us?

  • You’ll be the first to get a Palmzi.
  • You’ll never look at your mobile device the same way again.
  • You secretly love good posture.


What You Should Know

Our goal is to raise $100,000 to fund the production, distribution, and marketing of the Palmzi. Our team consists of the Palmzi inventor, an invention and patent consultant, web and marketing team and some legal help. Every penny of the funds we collect will be used to make the best product possible while delivering a solution that is affordable for the masses.

  • Our team has taken products to market before and understands the challenges and obstacles.
  • Years of thought, research and planning have gone into the design of Palmzi.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute now, we would still like your help in the following ways:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about the Palmzi on social media.
  • Use the Indiegogo tools to help share this campaign.
  • Remind your loved ones about the dangers of poor posture when using mobile devices.
  • Recommend the Palmzi to your friends, family, colleagues and even medical professionals.

We ask that you take this epidemic seriously and help us spread awareness through this campaign.

Frequently Asked Questions

Please let us know if you have any more questions!

Copyright © 2017 MCD Solutions Limited

1 We Are Social’s Digital in 2017: Global Overview
2 TechCrunch.com
3 BBC News
4 TheJournal.com
5 Association of American Publishers annual survey

story:
WHY DO YOU NEED MIC DOPE?

You love Karaoke! You can’t get enough of Karaoke! But the traditional machines are heavy to bring about! 

Mic Dope is the solution! It’s not your Dad’s boxy machine! Its fashionable design integrating a mic and a speaker into one beautiful unit the size of a regular mic. You can bring it everywhere! Home party, backyard BBQ, outing in the park, and on the street if you dare!

Mic Dope comes with the latest technologies to ensure the best vocal and music quality! Moving-coil mic ensure to capture the best voice, 2.2 inches speaker to deliver amazing audio, large battery to give 8 hours of continue singing! 

WHAT YOU NEED NOW IS MIC DOPE!

There are more. Mic Dope works in two different mode. It connects to smart phones via bluetooth and you can sign along with your favorite tunes from your music collection! Or you can make your very own Karaoke mix tap on the USB memory stick and use the mic to pick the songs!

Usually, due to the restriction of CDs, DVDs, or a subscription model, karaoke machines are always with limited song availability. More often, the latest pop songs are not available in time. Without a karaoke system, it’s hard to truly enjoy the mode and environment of singing by lacking of technical equipment support.

Wouldn’t it be great if you could enjoy the karaoke to any song you like and whenever you feel like singing?

WHAT YOU NEED NOW IS MIC DOPE!

Different from conventional systems, Mic Dope works any file, app or online streaming site that your devices play by Bluetooth connecting. Activate your Karaoke app and play the song or music to begin your karaoke show time! That is to say, you have access to an unlimited, the latest and up to date karaoke song library of most of apps in your devices.

Unlimited Karaoke songs: Rock, Hip Hop, Pop, Jazz, Blues…The possibilities are endless. Always find a song you like.

The latest and up to date karaoke library: With Mic Dope, no more old tunes and invariability. Download it and sing it by the sound of your voice.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

story:
Just a brief history of the ePic Bionic and how it all came into play: 

 

1.Executive Summary

 

  • ePic phones is a start-up  4g Smartphone that is affordable, and we will be targeting , Europe, Asia, Africa and America.
  • ePic phones will directly be involved with the manufacturing of the phones, and will be engaged with the suppliers that will manufacture the smartphones.
  • The company is dedicated to provide the market with high-end smartphones with cost effective prices. Ensuring that ePic phones still maintain a high profit- ratio.
  • ePic phones is aware of the global markets that we are engaging with and would take the opportunity to engage with different products that is already offered on the market namely, smartphones, tablets, wifi devices, at a cost effective prices to our markets.
  • ePic Phones identify the different sales strategies and the methods to make customers aware of the brand and products on offer. Ensuring that customers trust the brand and buy the products.
  • ePic phones is proposing a low cost- high end smartphone with the same features and more than the higher priced smartphones on the market.

 

 

 

Our Keys to Success:

ePic Phones keys to success includes:

  • Providing our customers with excellent service all year round.
  • Maintaining a growing customer base.
  • Growing our customer base
  • Exceeding customer expectations by responding to queries and complains timeously.
  • Keeping up to date with the trends and different technology available. Enhancing our products with the latest features relevant to customer feedback.

Our Mission Statement:

 

Treat every customer as if it is your first interaction with them. Show true passion when interacting with customers. Create every device as if you are creating it for yourself.

Business Environment:

 

Due to the transformation of mobile phones, the smartphone industry has become increasingly competitive and aggressive. With known big brands releasing

We on a mission to design, and manufacture, high-end smartphones that the average person can afford.  By crafting high quality phones with excellent camera quality both front and rear.

Just a brief history of the ePic Bionic and how it all came into play: 

 
1.Executive Summary
 

ePic phones is a start-up  4g Smartphone that is affordable, and we will be targeting , Europe, Asia, Africa and America.
ePic phones will directly be involved with the manufacturing of the phones, and will be engaged with the suppliers that will manufacture the smartphones.
The company is dedicated to provide the market with high-end smartphones with cost effective prices. Ensuring that ePic phones still maintain a high profit- ratio.
ePic phones is aware of the global markets that we are engaging with and would take the opportunity to engage with different products that is already offered on the market namely, smartphones, tablets, wifi devices, at a cost effective prices to our markets.
ePic Phones identify the different sales strategies and the methods to make customers aware of the brand and products on offer. Ensuring that customers trust the brand and buy the products.
ePic phones is proposing a low cost- high end smartphone with the same features and more than the higher priced smartphones on the market.

 
 
 
Our Keys to Success:
ePic Phones keys to success includes:

Providing our customers with excellent service all year round.
Maintaining a growing customer base.
Growing our customer base
Exceeding customer expectations by responding to queries and complains timeously.
Keeping up to date with the trends and different technology available. Enhancing our products with the latest features relevant to customer feedback.


Our Mission Statement:
 
Treat every customer as if it is your first interaction with them. Show true passion when interacting with customers. Create every device as if you are creating it for yourself.

Due to the transformation of mobile phones, the smartphone industry has become increasingly competitive and aggressive. With known big brands releasing

story:
TAP DEVICE

  • With one tap, you can change your phone settings
  • Control your Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Data, Music, Sound, Display Brightness and even send a Text Message Hands-Free 
  • It's a small NFC chip wrapped inside an elegant tag that you can stick onto your coffee table, office desk, gym bag, car dashboard; practically any surface
  • Reusable and reconfigurable unlimited number of times


WITH JUST ONE TAP

 


FASTER & SMARTER!

Tap Device is the next step in automating smartphones with its incredible features and functionalities. It helps in automating your everyday redundant tasks and at the same time, saves battery life.  
Essentially it is the next smart step for every tech-savvy and trendy smartphone user. 

SPECIFICATIONS

YOUR WELCOME KIT

You will receive little taps in your predefined colour choice. Each tap consists of a small NFC chip at the back and a mild adhesive to stick. 

  • Your welcome kit will include the taps and instructions for setup.  
  • Turn on your phone's NFC, and then tap on each chip one by one.
  • Your first tap will prompt you to go to Play Store and download the free Tap Device App. Follow the App wizard to configure each chip. 
  • It is designed to give you total control over the phone's settings and profiles.

Once the customization is complete,  you are all set. Don't worry the tags are re-configurable for unlimited number of times. Place/ Stick the taps wherever you want. The adhesive comes off easily and will not leave a mark. 


COMPATIBILITY

Tap Device works with Android phones 4.0 or above that have NFC capabilities.
In other words there are currently over 1000 devices with which the Tap Device will work and hopefully one of them is yours. See our FAQ for more details.

OUR TEAM

THE STORY BEHIND TAP DEVICE

Over a year ago, while fiddling with my phone, I realized that there is no single button to control multiple features on the phone. I shared it with my friends and realized they all wanted different tasks done with a single tap. This gave me the idea of Tap Device. Now the question was how to achieve it! 

Well one year later, here we are presenting our product that controls most of your phone features through an NFC with a single tap and we hope you love it as much as we do. 

We have tested the chips within our social circles and received excellent response. Our hardware partners are ready with the prototypes and prepared to meet the demand. 

So far we covered our expenses from our savings and some supporters were generous enough to finance a portion of it. We are grateful to everyone who believed in our idea. 

Your support will allow us to manufacture in bulk and reduce the cost of the chips significantly along with marketing it internationally. We are expecting an excellent response in achieving our funding goal and bring you these tiny chips of excitement. 

Also we would like this technology to be introduced in a commercial scenario. Therefore we are consulting companies to create something for the retail industry. 

TIMELINE

WHAT'S NEXT

Tap Device is ready to market & here's how you can support us; 
  • Buy one set for yourself
  • Gift another one to your close friend or partner
  • Spread the word and make some noise about Tap Device
  • Subscribe to our newsletter. It helps us to stay MOTIVATED!

story:
Introduction

T-PEOS carried out monitoring for i-Phone users “What is the most needed features to the iPhone?”As a result, The most wanted function among the answers is “Call Recording”. Whatever the reason, iPhone users feel some difficulties because there is no built-in call recording function, even it has very positive role in many cases during business or private conversation.

imemo® is developed by the motivation to satisfy that the most wanted needs of i-Phone users, Call Recording. T-PEOS considers the most affordable, compact and robust design with integrated multi-function which could be acceptable in this limited space adding Voice Recording, Music Amplifier and USB Memory functions.

Taking into account some potential disadvantages of wireless devices based on Bluetooth, the final product concept of development of imemo® is wired and focused on the most affordable, robust, simple, compact, long lasting and even multi-function.

In particular, Ben Hur, CEO of T-PEOS and an acoustic expert over 30 years, is proud of combining his acoustic technology adding Audio Amplifier in imemo®. We wish it could be a nice benefit for audiophiles. 


Why is imemo® unique as a Call Recorder

If the device adopts only call recording function, we do not know when to use during everyday routine life. But the problem is when you suddenly need to take notes, while driving or walking or if you do not have a pen in case of important phone call. You may face the same situation and experience once. 

It is quite different that you do not use even there is an available function from that you can not use at the critical moment because there is no available function.

We consider how to make iPhone users be familiar with imemo® as a call recorder, because it should be useful in critical situation. That is why we put the audio amplifier in  imemo®. Then users can always enjoy rich sound music through imemo® any time at any place using users' own earphone. 

If you receive a phone call and need to record the conversation while you enjoying music, just press Record button to start call recording.

Furthermore imemo® is compact enough to carry in the pouch of a laptop or tablet, just like you have one more USB memory in your bag.


imemo® Integrated Functions 

1. Call Recording

. During conversation over the phone, if you need to memorize the important messages, just plug imemo®to earphone jack of iPhone, press the Power/Record button for 3 seconds to turn on and then press Power/Record button again shortly to start recording.

. During that you are enjoying the music through imemo®, if you get a phone call, then just press the Record button.

. While using the earphones through imemo®, you can listen the recorded conversation by pressing the play button.

. You can store the conversation in  imemo® with 16 GB memory capacity. Or you can transfer the recorded files to PC as a normal USB.

2. Voice Recording


. imemo® can be used as a Voice Recorder independently, without connecting with iPhone.

. Just press the Power/Record button for 3 seconds to turn on and press Power/Record button again shortly, then voice recording starts through a built-in microphone.

. You can transfer or store voice files in the PC using a USB.

3. Audio Amplifier

. T-PEOS, as an acoustic specialist, applied unique sound technology in imemo®. We are very proud to add audio amplifier circuit in this small device. 

. Audiophiles can enjoying a majestic and rich sound music with provided bundle earphone through imemo®. It performs the almost same sound quality as Rasiel, which is newly developed and launched brand with cutting-edge technology by T-PEOS.

4. USB Memory

. A built-in 16GB memory capacity can be used as a normal USB memory even for big files.


imemo® Color Option & Outlook                   


imemo® Features 


Android smart phone users

For Android smart phone users as well,  imemo® can be also most affordable MUST HAVE item as a multi-function device.


Special Package plus "Rasiel"

In addition to compensation for special gift to donors, T-PEOS makes combined package perks with newly developed earphone “Rasiel” which has brass material body and performing impressive rich low frequency sound as shown in the frequency curve of audio amplifier. It has a nick name of Vacuum Tube Nature Sound.



Fancy Name Plate 

T-PEOS puts in an awesome gift for Early Bird Special engraving the donors’ name in  imemo® name plate by laser as elegance. You can also, if necessary, put the other's name as a gift. It could be a special gift and memory for your valuable person.


Well-made imemo®

In mid-2015 after confirming the needs for a call recording function of iPhone users, T-PEOS set out to develop the revised design and functionality. In April 2016 the prototype of its current appearance is completed. We are ready to make tools and molds for mass production and backer’s cheer up.

The mass production of  imemo® for shipment can be finished within 2 months after this campaign. So the expected shipment could be within August 2016. Of course Rasiel is already in mass production.


Risks & Challenges

Because imemo® has already proven the technical part through a complete working sample, we are confident that there is no technical risk. And also, T-PEOS, former company name SWP Shinwoo, is performing successful business in acoustic industry and verified well in the market through many reviews in Head-Fi.org and its global distribution channels.


How to use fund

Technical issues have already been solved through the R&D. The funds secured through this campaign will be used for the purchase of tooling and raw materials needed for the initial production.


Perk List


Time Schedule 


imemo® Team Members

Ben Hur, CEO of T-PEOS, is an acoustic specialist and expert in electronic engineering with over 30-year experience, such as buzzer, receiver, speaker, Bluetooth headset, voice recognition and portable stereo speaker as a developer and manufacturer by himself.

James Park, based on the job experience in LG Group as a business developer and marketer in various projects and industries such as electricity, electronics and environmental solutions, is the contact person responsible for the communications with backers in Indiegogo campaign.

Eugene Hur, studied Visual Communication at School of the Art Institute of Chicago and based on the job experience as art gallerist, is a chief designer of imemo® and brand name.

Hyung Hoon Kim, a specialist of mechanical drawing, is a chief technical engineer of imemo®.


Q&A


Expected Delivery 

Shipment shall be within 7 weeks after the closing of Indiegogo campaign. So considering air freight and your local transportation, it would take 2 more weeks enoughly. Then the expected touch-down on your hand would be around the first week of September 2016.

Transportation

According to the air cargo regulation in Korea, imemo®, the battery built-in product can not be carried by EMS (Express Mail Service) by air. So it will be carried by DHL or Fedex. But those carriers also have limitation of quantity for the battery built-in product. Only 2 products are allowed at one time. That is why we can only provide package perk in “Double”.

For Distributors, because this perk can not be transported by air at one time, it shall be by ocean freight. Please contact us for more details. 

How to turn on imemo®? 

Press the POWER/RECORD button for 3 seconds. If you press the same button shortly, the record will start.

How to record the conversation?

The counterpart's voice is recorded just like you hear through earphone and your voice is recorded by the built-in microphone in imemo® 

How to listen the recorded conversation or message from imemo®?

Just connect your earphone to imemo®, and press POWER > PLAY button and you can listen and check the recorded conversation. Of course you can transfer the recorded files to desktop or notebook and listen from them.

How to listen Rich Sound through imemo®? 

Please connect  imemo® in the middle between iPhone and your ordinary earphone, and press the POWER button for 3 seconds to turn on. Then you can enjoy the music like a vacuum tube nature sound.

How long is the running time for each function?

For Call Recording, Voice Recording and Playing, it could be operated for 8 hours and more.

Can I use "Rasiel" with imemo® together?

No. imemo® is designed for ordinary earphone to improve the sound quality same as Rasiel. So if you use them together, sound performance shall be distorted. Please do not use imemo® with Rasiel together.

How to recharge? 

Please connect imemo®using USB to your Desktop or Notebook PC.

How long it takes to be charged fully?

It would takes approx. 30 min. by AC adopter. If you connect USB to PC, it could take much longer approx. 1 hour and 30 min.

What is the memory capacity?

16 GB memory capacity is built-in.

What colors are available? 

2 options are available. iPhone White and Black. During this campaign T-PEOS will contact backers to decide the color selection.
Any questions and Request? 

Please contact me, 

James Park 

Email. jamespark100@naver.com 

-----------------------------------------------------------
Thanks for reading and reaching here end.
Sincerely Yours,
