story:
How Does Depresso work?

Users will make an anonymous account through the app then find a group to join, yes it's that simple. Each group in the app will either be a positive subject or a subject that someone is going through. For example, there is a group called "Puppies" where people would share images of puppies or just talk about puppies. Then there will be groups like "Lost loved ones," where people who have recently lost someone and would like someone to talk to about that can gather. 

One of our biggest goals is to have retired therapists or students who are currently going to school for mental health to volunteer to help our "Admin" teams, who will aid those who are truly desperate for help. We are not here to replace therapists but instead to help people who can't afford one or who feel a need for someone else to talk to. Yes, there is a Suicide hotline, which we will include inside the app, but there are many now who don't like to use these hotlines or are too shy to tell someone they need help over the phone. We discovered more and more people actually feel more comfortable reaching out for help via text. 

We implore you to never share any private information with anyone. If someone is bullying you we will have a strict policy to BAN trolls or people who are hurting others. 

What We Need 

We won't sugarcoat anything. Making an app to this degree from scratch is very expensive but very possible. Whatever funding we get will determine when this app will be released. If we reach our goal of 25,000 dollars then we have a goal release date of early to mid-2018. We will kick off the app on iOS first, then it will be available for Android later. 

The Impact

In a time where racism, sexism, fascism, and hate is all over the news we need a place to go to where we can relax or unload. We want to make a safe space for everyone and help anyone who needs help. Even if we saved just one life a year that's one life we want to save. Not everyone knows how to express their emotions or release bottled up feelings and we're hoping this app can help. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't donate? Don't worry! You can help us save lives by sharing this IndieGoGo page or just by simply using #Depressoapp on twitter or Instagram. But whats better than doing those things?Inform people of the national suicide hotline and be there for someone. Everyone's life is valuable and sometimes the smallest thing can help make someone's day. 

Q & A 

coming soon with a new trailer and how this app came to be!
story_txt: How Does Depresso work?Users will make an anonymous account through the app then find a group to join, yes it's that simple. Each group in the app will either be a positive subject or a subject that someone is going through. For example, there is a group called "Puppies" where people would share images of puppies or just talk about puppies. Then there will be groups like "Lost loved ones," where people who have recently lost someone and would like someone to talk to about that can gather. One of our biggest goals is to have retired therapists or students who are currently going to school for mental health to volunteer to help our "Admin" teams, who will aid those who are truly desperate for help. We are not here to replace therapists but instead to help people who can't afford one or who feel a need for someone else to talk to. Yes, there is a Suicide hotline, which we will include inside the app, but there are many now who don't like to use these hotlines or are too shy to tell someone they need help over the phone. We discovered more and more people actually feel more comfortable reaching out for help via text. We implore you to never share any private information with anyone. If someone is bullying you we will have a strict policy to BAN trolls or people who are hurting others. What We Need We won't sugarcoat anything. Making an app to this degree from scratch is very expensive but very possible. Whatever funding we get will determine when this app will be released. If we reach our goal of 25,000 dollars then we have a goal release date of early to mid-2018. We will kick off the app on iOS first, then it will be available for Android later. The ImpactIn a time where racism, sexism, fascism, and hate is all over the news we need a place to go to where we can relax or unload. We want to make a safe space for everyone and help anyone who needs help. Even if we saved just one life a year that's one life we want to save. Not everyone knows how to express their emotions or release bottled up feelings and we're hoping this app can help. Other Ways You Can HelpCan't donate? Don't worry! You can help us save lives by sharing this IndieGoGo page or just by simply using #Depressoapp on twitter or Instagram. But whats better than doing those things?Inform people of the national suicide hotline and be there for someone. Everyone's life is valuable and sometimes the smallest thing can help make someone's day. Q & A coming soon with a new trailer and how this app came to be!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Brian Bedeau and I am the founder of Lockabea. My Wife and I started this journey 3 ½ years ago to build a solution for child and personal safety. My Wife is a nurse here in Toronto, CA and I am an IT Professional with a Computer Engineering background. As parents of 7 children, collectively, a few things remain consistent, we want them to be safe and always have access to an emergency device. We’ve had family members with dementia and we know how difficult it can become for family members and caretakers. But, the experience that began this journey of developing Lockabea was an unfortunate event which occurred with a little boy from Toronto. He managed to leave his home in the middle of the cold winter night only wearing a T-shirt, diaper and boots. The city of Toronto looked for him together, praying that he would be found well, he wasn’t. I was broken for weeks and remember shedding tears over the freshly drawn concept drawings for what we now call Lockabea. The only thought I had was, “this technology has been around for years, it’s time to make use of it”. We realized many people from all walks of life could use a device like this, Alzheimer’s and dementia patients, autistic children, young adults, students and even adults. Help us establish useful technology that can change and save many lives across the world with the complete development and distribution of Lockabea.

Warning: This product may excite you.

What We Need & What You Get


Funding: $420K; adjusted from $300K to compensate for pre-orders.
Distribution of funds:

  • Refined design of our tamper resistant band & design of watch display
  • Detailed Engineering
  • New prototype and testing,
  • Manufacturing and setup
     

Pre-ordering:
Pre-order at a reduced price of $211CAD - 2000 devices available at this price. The price will return to the target price of $250CAD after 2000 pre-orders have been depleted.

Note: Customers pre-ordering 3-4 devices at our reduced price will receive an additional discount

Project completion and delivery (estimates):

  • 1st phase (redesign): 6-8 weeks after funding is secured
  • Project completion: 13-16 months after funding is secured
  • Shipping date: second quarter, year: 2020


The way we see it:
2000 pre-orders at a reduced price of $211 will fund the entire project at $420K, $300K for the complete development of Lockabea leaving $120K to produce orders and distribute your devices.

This campaign is not limited to pre-orders. Donations and/or private investors are more than welcome to join us in establishing useful technology. We are starting with devices for children first, ages 6 and up or at your discretion.

Donation perks:

Reduced prices and discounts on Indiegogo only:

  • Single unit: $211CAD/$159USD
  • 3 units: $600CAD/$453USD
  • 4 Units: $800CAD/$603USD
Special Donation Perks:

Will be added after we gain some momentum.

Note: All pre-orders will be refunded if we do no reach our goal on Indiegogo by Jan 28th, 2019. Donations will be used only to complete the remaining development of Lockabea.

Dreamers Wall - With any donation, your name will go up on a wall on our website with your name (with your permission), indicating you were one of the first people who were responsible for helping us save and change lives around the world. Thank you for enabling us to establish useful technology. We are proud to call you a part of the team.

Private investors please contact Brian Bedeau at bbedeau@lockabea.com

The Impact

We believe where there is a will, there is a way. From what we have seen, no one has been able to figure out a way to make personal safety a priority. We are here to show you how it's possible and unequivocally conclude it's about that time.

Our will is to safely secure children, the elderly and everyone who values their own or personal safety of others.  While drawing up this project we realized our product is scalable where many people, vulnerable or not, can benefit from immediate and secure access to an emergency device at a moment's notice, reducing the time to acquire assistance even during a struggle. Lockabea is an extension of your parenting, it's for personal safety/communication or acts as a deterrent. Whether you are a child who walks home from school,  a caregiver or a son/daughter taking care of your parents who have dementia or Alzheimer's, or you work late and travel alone, Lockabea is your backup plan.

With the full development of Lockabea, we can save and change many lives around the world with useful technology.

Risks & Challenges

Our major challenge for this project is funding. Our team, Design 1st, is ready to take on this project as we get ready to bring Lockabea to you, our customers. We spent 3 ½ years determining the best way, and different ways to build a reliable security system for any individual. Using current technology, we are able to expand Lockabea's versatility to include everyone.

Once we raise $40K in our crowdfunding we will begin the first stage of development in redesigning Lockabea's lockable, tamper resistant band, and watch display for a more conventional look. We are excited and looking forward to get your opinions on designs and colors as we tread along. This is also where we will begin to prepare for the second stage in development, engineering and testing. The first version of Lockabea will be made to hide in plain sight to look like a conventional watch. We will be submitting designs and updates on our progress to our Facebook page and Indiegogo for backers, followers and investors interested in our progress.

There are a few things to know about Lockabea (but not limited to):

SIM card required (not included) - We are looking into a managed service provider to provide you with a SIM card for Lockabea, reducing steps to activate your device and at a lower rate.

911 and SOS emergency activation / Cellular & GPS - Automatic and Manual Alerting

  •  911 emergency button activates a call and sends a message to preset contacts only after 5 minutes (security feature) *ask us why
  •  SOS emergency button gives out the location of the user to preset contacts 
  •  Gesture Activation System (GAS) - activated (not default), allows the user to rotate their wrist a specific way and a certain number of times to send alarms or alerts.
  •  2 security keys are included with each device.
  • Geo-tracking
  • GPS
  • SIM Card activated (not included, at this time)
  • Text messaging to Lockabea from parents phone via Lockabea app.
  • Cellular phone app to communicate securely with Lockabea and to change/set features
  • Voice recording
  • Distance presets
  • and many more features.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some who visit our campaign may want to help us out but cannot afford to; we understand and appreciate the gesture. If you would like to get on board with this unique project, please share Lockabea's campaign using the Indiegogo share buttons. Follow, invite and talk about Lockabea on our Facebook page with over 7K followers including parents, family members and friends who believe in our vision to develop and establish useful technology for many. Join us in providing personal safety.

Please feel free to ask us any questions you may have and thank you for your attention.

Have a great day and Bea Safe!

Inventor and Founder of Lockabea
Brian Bedeau & Family

story:
Ergonomically Designed

xTron earbuds are designed in such a way that they’ll never fall off, even during strenuous exercises. It’s very comfortable and locks the ear firmly for a long time without swelling and any pain. With a 108-degree curve, it fits the ear canal perfectly.  

Giving you a pain-free music listening experience for hours. Touch buttons allow you to control the device volume, music selection, and mode selection.

Lag-Free Music

Simply put your xTron in your ears, connect the audio, and start feeling. Vibe your way through all your normal daily activities. xTron earbuds are suitable for music lovers, gamers, video lovers, and anyone who wants to have an immersive musical experience. xTron ensures low latency which results in a music experience without any lag. It’s crafted without compromise for technophiles and connoisseurs of music. Listen and enjoy your favorite music right on with each and every beat.

3D Carbon Fiber

3D Carbon fiber makes xTron earbuds strong and lightweight. You’ll never feel the weight. It’s like a feather touch.

Double Slide Design

xTron earbuds have a stylish double slide cover. It looks stunning and keeps your earbuds intact.

Charge Your Mobile

xTron is equipped with Type-C charging port for a quick charge. It also indicates battery level for your ease. You can even charge your mobile phone through the USB port.

HD HiFi Sound Quality

xTron has been crafted with incredible Signature Sound to change the way we enjoy music. Its professionally tuned diaphragm delivers HD quality sound that elevates your music bringing you ever closer to the music.

Active Noise Cancellation

No need to hold your phone against your ear with your shoulder while taking notes on a call, the built-in microphone allows you to sit back hands-free, able to handle things at ease. Whether you are listening to music or gaming or even placing a call, xTron dual-microphone helps you get the most out of every sound that passes through your ear.

The in-built microphone is sensitive enough to pick up even the faintest sounds, allowing clear audio calls and video gameplay. Active noise cancelation technology suppresses all background noise and echoes feedback for a quieter and more superior user experience. Now you can block out the world for a noticeably superior experience.

3 Modes: Left/Right/Dual

Works in 3 different modes like Airpods.

xTron is available at such a low price with top-notch quality. We've done it by eliminating many intermediaries to bring out xTron to you at such a low price. When you buy a product, you've to pay an increased price because of the margin applied by dealers, retailers, etc. But when you buy through Indiegogo, you get xTron at an astonishing discounted rate as it helps us to manufacture in a larger quantity which substantially reduces manufacturing costs and then provides it directly to you at a low price by saving margins added by dealers and retailers at various levels.

We're technology lovers who believe that technology with quality must be affordable and available for everyone. We at, Savasis Pte. Ltd., emphasize on innovative products to make everyday life easier. Each and every product goes through a thorough test before mass production to maintain the utmost quality. We are based in Singapore and put our efforts into new technology.

story:
#Important Update: Share and Win a FREE Gift

#Update: Hello, Wireless！Meet your Woobiibox Qi

Tired of plugging in and out of your lightning cable after a while? Meet Woobiibox Qi that adds the Qi wireless charging to all functions of the original Woobiibox with only $10 more than the previous version. Not only the latest iPhone 8/X, Samsung Galaxy, but also your eariler iPhones with just an adapter away. Welcome to the future!

 

World’s 1st hybrid USB-C ports/power bank

Think about how many devices you may use, and how many times you can't find a power plug when your MacBook is dying. 

Meet Woobiibox, the world’s first hybrid USB-C ports/power bank with the latest Power Delivery technology that charges your MacBook, as well as connects and powers an incredibly wide range of devices, quickly! It is a USB-C Hub that brings back all the ports from the MacBook Pro to your MacBook and doubles as a power bank.

Power Delivery, the charging tech of tomorrow

The USB Power Delivery is the latest technology that allows for a maximum voltage of 20 V and a maximum current of 5 A, in contrast with the previous 5v*3A max. With Power Delivery, Woobiibox offers mobile professionals true freedom on the go. It can charge any of your devices that use USB-A or USB-C charger.

Data and power transfer at the same time

Equipped with the most practical ports and the fastest charging technology, Woobiibox is able to perform both tasks at the same time, boosting your efficiency to a higher level.

High-speed one hub for everything

Equipped with 1 USB-C, 2 USB-A 3.0, 1 HDMI, 1 SD card slot, Woobiibox enables data transfer from your device and the smartphone, flash drive, camera, monitor or other standard USB-A or USB-C devices. Make your MacBook "Pro". 

MacBook charging on the go

With the latest Power Delivery technology, Woobiibox can charge your MacBook as fast as the wall charger and extend your battery life by 10 hours. 30 minutes' recharge can ensure as long as 2 hours extra battery.

 

Support charging/data transfer for other USB-C laptops as well

Not only MacBook, Woobiibox supports charging and data transfer for other mainstream USB-C laptops as well, creating a brand new super convenient experience for these portable and powerful ultrabooks.

 

Charge iPhone 8/X to 50% Battery in 30 Minutes

Recently, Apple has announced that its latest iPhone 8/X will support third-party Power Delivery. This is the first time for the iPhone lineup to support third-party fast charging technology. Finally, Apple has opened its heart to futuristic technologies apart from their own ones. You can now charge your iPhone 8/X to 50 percent battery life in just 30 minutes. 

 

Smart power distribution

Each electronic device requires a different power and voltage to charge, and their battery life and efficiency are optimal only when they are charged using the designated voltage. Power Delivery helps to optimize power flow across multiple peripherals by allowing devices to draw as much power as they require and draw more power when an application demands it.

 

Rapid charging USB-A ports

Woobiibox supports up to 5V/2.4A quick charge for your other devices, taking up only 1 hour and 15 minutes for a complete full recharge for iPhone 7 plus and 3 hours for an iPad Air.

 

Charge + self-charge, in one go

Independent charging and discharging circuit modules allow you to power or charge your devices while simultaneously recharging Woobiibox. Wake up in the morning and know that all of your devices and backup power supply are ready to go. 

 

Enjoy 4K resolution anywhere

Whenever you need a presentation to gain your business or a larger screen or entertainment, Woobiibox has you back, The 4K HDMI port for TV monitor and projector display shows people the best quality of display anytime anywhere.

 

450g, 16000 mAh, powerful and compact

Woobiibox is equipped with 16000 mAh capacity, providing as many as 6 full recharge for iPhone 8 Plus, or Galaxy Note 8. It is only 450g in weight, greatly reducing your burden on the way.

 

The best in class: lightest and inexpensive

With the size of a phone, Woobiibox is lighter than any competitor on the market. It is also more cost effective with both functions. 

 

Multi-protection Safety System

With our decade's experience in the industry, Woobiibox is equipped with a safety system that provides surge protection,  short circuit protection, and more advanced safety features to keep you safe all around. We also got certified by UL.

Specs

Rewards

 

Woobiibox Qi - Wireless Charge Ver.

Due to unexpected popular demand, we created the wireless charging edition! Now you can buy Woobiibox Qi with only $10 more than the previous version with 200 units only, supported iPhone 8/X, Samsung Galaxy lineup and more. Welcome to the future!


Get one Woobiibox to provide power and ports for your USB-C laptops and latest iPhone, saving money and space. Only 200 units for this $139 early bird price, 39% off. Available in Black and White. Price will go up! 

Get two Woobiiboxes for you and your love, saving more money and space. Only 200 units for this $269 early bird price, 41% off. Available in Black and White. Price will go up! 

Get five Woobiiboxes at an incredible price of $579, 49% off. Available in Black and White. Share the news and let more people enjoy the unlimited mobile life on the go! 

To ensure the full functionality of Woobiibox, including charging (power delivery), data transfer, and 4K display, you need this all-supported super cable. Only $15 for the counterpart offered by Apple Store at $29.9.

Feel free to download our Media Kit here

About Acutech

We are a team of innovative and pragmatic engineers and entrepreneurs from Hong Kong and San Francisco Bay area. We’re passionate about bringing convenience to our lives with affordable technology. Each member of Acutech is armed with over 10 years of experiences in product development and manufacturing, ranging from medical grade products to consumer electronics.

Timeline

What's In The Box

Risks and Challenges

We have tremendous confidence in our design and manufacturing, but as with any hardware project, there are always potential risks associated with manufacturing and supply chain logistics based on the number of orders we receive. 

Our team has already successfully delivered similar products to market. We understand the unique challenges of battery hardware and are familiar with how to avoid and mitigate any issues that arise. Additionally, we have also established trusting relationships with our global logistics companies. 

We are committed to delivering Woobiibox on time with the high quality. Should there be any uncontrollable factor contributing to delays, we will keep you, our awesome backers, up to date, and you can also reach out to us anytime!

FAQ

When is Woobiibox expected to ship?
Woobiibox is expected to start shipping in January 2018.

 

Can I directly charge a Can Woobiibox charge laptops and transfer data at the same time?
Yes, Woobiibox is 2 in 1 data transfer and PD charging.

 

Can I charge MacBook through Woobiibox without a USB-C Charger?
Yes, Macbook output 26W (Max), Macbook Pro output 36W (Max)

 

How long will Woobiibox take to fully charge?
It takes 1 and half hours to fully charge by USB-C PD Charger and Micro USB charger at the same time, it takes 2 hours by USB-C charger, it takes around 6 and half hours by Micro USB charger.
 

How many times can it charge my MacBook?
It can support one time full charger for Macbook.
 

Can I take Woobiibox on an airplane to traveling or business trip?
Yes, you can carry on the plane with your hand carry luggage. The Woobiibox is 59.2Wh. For your reference: Federal Aviation Administration's (FAA) guidelines for air travel of 100Wh. Please click this link for more detailed information: https://www.faa.gov/about/initiatives/hazmat_safety/more_info/?hazmat=7
 

Does Woobiibox have PD function?
Yes, it has PD input, and PD output 36W (Max).

What is the battery lifespan of the Woobiibox?
A: It has a lifespan of 500 cycles. After 500 cycles it can hold around 80% of original capacity.
 

Does Woobiibox have any protection?
Yes, it has over voltage over current protection, over charge over discharge protection, input (Max 36V/2A) output (Max 22V/2.5A) short circuit protection.

It can charge any of your devices that use USB-A or USB-C charger.Data and power transfer at the same timeEquipped with the most practical ports and the fastest charging technology, Woobiibox is able to perform both tasks at the same time, boosting your efficiency to a higher level.High-speed one hub for everythingEquipped with 1 USB-C, 2 USB-A 3.0, 1 HDMI, 1 SD card slot, Woobiibox enables data transfer from your device and the smartphone, flash drive, camera, monitor or other standard USB-A or USB-C devices. Make your MacBook "Pro". MacBook charging on the goWith the latest Power Delivery technology, Woobiibox can charge your MacBook as fast as the wall charger and extend your battery life by 10 hours. 30 minutes' recharge can ensure as long as 2 hours extra battery. Support charging/data transfer for other USB-C laptops as wellNot only MacBook, Woobiibox supports charging and data transfer for other mainstream USB-C laptops as well, creating a brand new super convenient experience for these portable and powerful ultrabooks. Charge iPhone 8/X to 50% Battery in 30 MinutesRecently, Apple has announced that its latest iPhone 8/X will support third-party Power Delivery. This is the first time for the iPhone lineup to support third-party fast charging technology. Finally, Apple has opened its heart to futuristic technologies apart from their own ones. You can now charge your iPhone 8/X to 50 percent battery life in just 30 minutes.  Smart power distributionEach electronic device requires a different power and voltage to charge, and their battery life and efficiency are optimal only when they are charged using the designated voltage. Power Delivery helps to optimize power flow across multiple peripherals by allowing devices to draw as much power as they require and draw more power when an application demands it. Rapid charging USB-A portsWoobiibox supports up to 5V/2.4A quick charge for your other devices, taking up only 1 hour and 15 minutes for a complete full recharge for iPhone 7 plus and 3 hours for an iPad Air. Charge + self-charge, in one goIndependent charging and discharging circuit modules allow you to power or charge your devices while simultaneously recharging Woobiibox. Wake up in the morning and know that all of your devices and backup power supply are ready to go.  Enjoy 4K resolution anywhereWhenever you need a presentation to gain your business or a larger screen or entertainment, Woobiibox has you back, The 4K HDMI port for TV monitor and projector display shows people the best quality of display anytime anywhere. 450g, 16000 mAh, powerful and compactWoobiibox is equipped with 16000 mAh capacity, providing as many as 6 full recharge for iPhone 8 Plus, or Galaxy Note 8. It is only 450g in weight, greatly reducing your burden on the way. 
The best in class: lightest and inexpensive
With the size of a phone, Woobiibox is lighter than any competitor on the market. It is also more cost effective with both functions.  Multi-protection Safety SystemWith our decade's experience in the industry, Woobiibox is equipped with a safety system that provides surge protection,  short circuit protection, and more advanced safety features to keep you safe all around. We also got certified by UL.SpecsRewards Woobiibox Qi - Wireless Charge Ver.Due to unexpected popular demand, we created the wireless charging edition! Now you can buy Woobiibox Qi with only $10 more than the previous version with 200 units only, supported iPhone 8/X, Samsung Galaxy lineup and more. Welcome to the future!Get one Woobiibox to provide power and ports for your USB-C laptops and latest iPhone, saving money and space. Only 200 units for this $139 early bird price, 39% off. Available in Black and White. Price will go up! Get two Woobiiboxes for you and your love, saving more money and space. Only 200 units for this $269 early bird price, 41% off. Available in Black and White. Price will go up! Get five Woobiiboxes at an incredible price of $579, 49% off. Available in Black and White. Share the news and let more people enjoy the unlimited mobile life on the go! To ensure the full functionality of Woobiibox, including charging (power delivery), data transfer, and 4K display, you need this all-supported super cable. Only $15 for the counterpart offered by Apple Store at $29.9.Feel free to download our Media Kit hereAbout AcutechWe are a team of innovative and pragmatic engineers and entrepreneurs from Hong Kong and San Francisco Bay area. We’re passionate about bringing convenience to our lives with affordable technology. Each member of Acutech is armed with over 10 years of experiences in product development and manufacturing, ranging from medical grade products to consumer electronics.TimelineWhat's In The BoxRisks and ChallengesWe have tremendous confidence in our design and manufacturing, but as with any hardware project, there are always potential risks associated with manufacturing and supply chain logistics based on the number of orders we receive. Our team has already successfully delivered similar products to market. We understand the unique challenges of battery hardware and are familiar with how to avoid and mitigate any issues that arise. Additionally, we have also established trusting relationships with our global logistics companies. We are committed to delivering Woobiibox on time with the high quality. Should there be any uncontrollable factor contributing to delays, we will keep you, our awesome backers, up to date, and you can also reach out to us anytime!FAQWhen is Woobiibox expected to ship?Woobiibox is expected to start shipping in January 2018. Can I directly charge a Can Woobiibox charge laptops and transfer data at the same time?Yes, Woobiibox is 2 in 1 data transfer and PD charging. Can I charge MacBook through Woobiibox without a USB-C Charger?Yes, Macbook output 26W (Max), Macbook Pro output 36W (Max) How long will Woobiibox take to fully charge?It takes 1 and half hours to fully charge by USB-C PD Charger and Micro USB charger at the same time, it takes 2 hours by USB-C charger, it takes around 6 and half hours by Micro USB charger. How many times can it charge my MacBook?It can support one time full charger for Macbook. Can I take Woobiibox on an airplane to traveling or business trip?Yes, you can carry on the plane with your hand carry luggage. The Woobiibox is 59.2Wh. For your reference: Federal Aviation Administration's (FAA) guidelines for air travel of 100Wh. Please click this link for more detailed information: https://www.faa.gov/about/initiatives/hazmat_safety/more_info/?hazmat=7 Does Woobiibox have PD function?Yes, it has PD input, and PD output 36W (Max).What is the battery lifespan of the Woobiibox?A: It has a lifespan of 500 cycles. After 500 cycles it can hold around 80% of original capacity. Does Woobiibox have any protection?Yes, it has over voltage over current protection, over charge over discharge protection, input (Max 36V/2A) output (Max 22V/2.5A) short circuit protection.

story:
Experience Convenience Without the Bulk

Say hello to SleekStrip.
Sleek, simple, and smart.
It’s the grip your phone’s been waiting for.

What is SleekStrip?

SleekStrip is an innovative new phone stand and grip that makes it far more comfortable to use your smartphone—but without increasing its size or weight.


A better grip with a sleeker profile

These days, we use our smartphones for pretty much everything. But while using them is always fun, keeping a firm grip on them can sometimes be a challenge.

Whether you’re taking a selfie, watching a movie, making a video call, or using your phone on the go, it’s tricky to hold your phone exactly where you want it. Your fingers get twisted, your hands get tired, and you can easily wind up dropping your phone.

Sure, there are plenty of grips and stands that claim to help. But they’re so big and bulky that they
ruin the shape of your phone. We believe there has to be a sleeker way...

Featured on:


 

 

Grip

The SleekStrip grip ensures your phone will never slip out of your hands again.

Stand

The SleekStrip also acts as a stand with two different angles!

Thin & Sleek Design

Tremendous functionality without the bulk & design compromise.

Premium Materials, Comfort & Durability

You might think that SleekStrip’s slim design would sacrifice its durability, but that’s simply not true. Even though SleekStrip is incredibly thin, it’s built with strong, durable materials that have been tested to ensure long-lasting durability, and it has a soft rubber coating that feels smooth to the touch.  

Flexible Positioning

View your screen from multiple angles with a natural hand grip.

Wireless Charging Compatible

Want to wirelessly charge your phone? SleekStrip won't stop you.

Works on Car Mounts

SleekStrip is compatible with your car mount.

How It Works

SleekStrip Makes Your Phone Look Even Better

Today’s smartphones are so beautifully designed, there’s no reason your phone stand/grip should compromise that. SleekStrip’s sleek yet humble aesthetic is designed to complement the quality and style of your phone.

 

Colour Combinations

Designs that go well with any phone case.

Base: Black, Chrome, or Gold (Blue is sold out)

Strip: Matte Black, White Marble, or Rainbow

INTRODUCE SUMMER COLLECTION!

 

In the Package

 

What People Are Saying...

 

Meet the Team

Road Map

We Need Your Support

Do you want a better phone stand/grip as much as we do? Help us bring this much-needed product to market! The funding we receive through this campaign will help us pay for the tooling and manufacturing costs required to make SleekStrip a reality.

If you’re ready for a phone stand/grip that looks great and makes watching content on your phone and taking photos easier than ever, please make a pledge to our campaign! In addition to your pledge, you can also help us spread the word by sharing this campaign.

We appreciate your support!

Risks

At this point, production-ready samples have been built and tested to validate the design and mechanism, and our manufacturing partner has also validated the feasibility of production at a viable cost.

Please note that there could be minor changes and tweaks to the product design after the tooling is made and the product samples are tested.

We will try our absolute best to ensure everyone receives the colour of their choice. However, in the event that the colour chosen is no longer available, those who have pledged earlier will have higher priority. If your colour selection is no longer available, you will be contacted and asked to select another colour option.

Overall, if the funding goal is reached and the project can move to the next step, the risk of the SleekStrip not reaching the hands of our customers is very small. 

Disclaimer: Apple logo® and iPhone® are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.

story:
“ StaySafe BodyGuards ” is a Unique, Innovative and an unparalleled Mobile phone enabled personal protection system like never before. StaySafe BodyGuards is a complete safety solution for everyone on this planet who has a ordinary smartphone.

Our technology turns an ordinary smartphone into a “personal bodyguard” that never sleeps.

If you know someone who would be just as stoked as you are about StaySafe BodyGuards, then please share our campaign with them.

Sabre Security Equipment Corporation, (www.sabrered.com). It is world's largest and highest quality rated supplier of pepper spray. They provide us pepper canisters and are the lead marketer of our systems in USA. Founded in 1975 they are the world leader and provide professional grade products to law enforcement in over 40 countries.

Otterbox, (www.otterbox.com). They are the # 1 selling phone case manufacturer in USA.  We have signed license with Otterbox for integrating our StaySafe BodyGuards unit with their Universe Phone Case. 

 

 

 

 

Risks and Challenges:
No one wants to see a good idea wither away for want of funds, the team has worked hard to realize this 24x7 personal protection system and developed StaySafe BodyGuards mobile phone accessory. StaySafe mobile phone App development for android is completed and is under testing. StaySafe BodyGuards hardware unit design and prototype is finished along with pepper spray canister including proper pressures and spray pattern. The StaySafe BodyGuards units shown on this page and in the videos are included in the 3D images. We have done our best to exceed your expectations of what a StaySafe BodyGuards mobile phone accessory should look like. We have signed agreements with venture partners for bulk production and have several sales and marketing agreements already in place. We are not in the process of any on-going past projects and DO NOT depend upon any outside agency for rewards.

We will do our best, and hope to deliver on time, and whatever happens we will keep you updated every step along the way. We will definitely deliver a great product, and hope to do so on time!

Thanks from the whole team :)

Forecasting Risk:
We’ve done our very best to forecast demand and create a solid production plan. We’ve learned alot from the past three years, but sometimes forecasts don’t always hit the mark. Should we miss projections, we’ll let you know why and make it right as quickly as possible.

Supply Chain Risk:
We’ve built a very capable team who have worked for the past 3 years on all our products .However, component delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.

Terms and Conditions:
Backers with EU shipping addresses who elect to pre-pay their duties and taxes will have their rewards fulfilled by third party sales agents we are negotiating with.
Our detailed terms & conditions is available at http://staysafebodyguards.com/tc
Our privacy policy is available at http://staysafebodyguards.com/privacy
Our warranty policy is available at http://staysafebodyguards.com/warranty

story:
"A project that began in 2013, the Empower App was inspired by an overwhelming need to bridge the gap between those who are experiencing domestic abuse, and resources that exist within our communities." - Lindsay Redman, Provisional Registered Psychologist

Domestic abuse is a traumatic stressor that can rock a person to the core of their being. Unfortunately, the stigma, shame and social isolation associated with being a victim of domestic abuse tends to add to the trauma of the experience. Stigma and shame often lead individuals to experience deep concerns about what will happen when they reach out for help.

Ultimately, an individual must weigh the benefits of receiving support against the perceived costs, and the perceived risks currently present a significant barrier to seeking help. Feelings of shame also decrease self-worth, which further compound the difficulty of asking for help as individuals may not see themselves as worthy of help. As a result, there is currently a significant disconnect between individuals who are experiencing abuse, and the people and resources that might otherwise be of assistance to them.



"Isolation, shame and stigma go hand-in-hand with the experience of abuse, and unfortunately often deter individuals from reaching out and exploring their options for staying safe. Many victims of abuse simply don't know where to turn, and lack a safe place to talk about what they are experiencing."

The Empower App aims to increase awareness that individuals are not alone in their struggles, and that they are not to blame, such that they will feel more confident to access support services. The current disconnect between existing resources and those who are experiencing abuse, suggests a need for a discreet, highly-accessible and compassionate support system. The Empower App aims to strengthen individuals’ connections to a community of support, and challenge the perceptions of stigma and shame associated with experiencing abuse, to ultimately increase confidence in seeking help. 

The Empower App will achieve this by providing safe, discreet access to:

  • key information about abuse
  • an anonymous forum
  • an interactive relationship check-in to build insights over time
  • a connection to local resources
  • self-care and safety-planning tools
  • an opportunity to share personal stories and receive validation of these experiences.

The Empower App builds upon individuals’ inner strengths and wisdom, and enables users to communicate with each other in a mutually helpful way, in hopes that they may gain the confidence to make positive changes in their lives. These conversations and validation of abuse experiences can be powerful in ameliorating the disempowering effects of domestic violence, and may empower them to take positive action for their future safety.

The Empower App provides a discrete access-point for individuals to find support at all stages in their journey of healing after experiencing domestic abuse. The development of insight and resolution is a process that takes time. Conveniently, as individuals experience increased social support, and eventually gain the confidence to reach out to other resources, the Empower App is ready with connections to key resources within the individual’s community. And when individuals’ are even further along in their healing process, the Empower App’s story-sharing feature provides a place to reflect upon and identify the underlying meaning within their experience, while lending inspiration to others who are still in the grips of an abusive relationship. 



The Empower App offers users discreet and safe access to a wealth of information, innovative tools, connections to resources, and a safe place to talk about experiences free from judgement.

Security Features

  • The Empower App will be disguised on the user’s phone as a game application
  • A panic button allows users to quickly log out at any moment
  • Log-in requires a personal username and password
  • Information and resources accessed within the Empower App will not be visible in the user’s browser history


Project Timeline

For the past 14 months, I have been working closely with a local app development company in Edmonton, which has an excellent reputation for professional design, consulting and development of website and smartphone applications. 

Phase 1

The backbone of the Empower App, Phase 1 includes the majority of the Empower App's key features. There is a 6-month development time required to have both Android and I-Phone operating systems ready for free download.



Phase 2

Increased customization of safety plan and self-care features, increased security features (anti-tracking), and the ability to make discreet phone calls (calls will not be visible in the users call history). Development time varies for each individual feature, which can be introduced in succession as funding becomes available.

Phase 3

Additional services will be added according to user needs. For example, we may explore offering emergency chat services, and pulling anonymous data from user accounts to fuel research and inform public policy decisions.



How does your contribution help?

This project was kick-started in 2014 thanks to the generosity of those who contributed to our previous Indiegogo campaign and those who attended the Empower App benefit concert in Edmonton, AB. If you were one of these initial supporters, you should be very proud! Together, we raised around $4000, which funded the graphic design of the Empower App screenshots, as well as the production of a detailed map of the app functionality. Having these prerequisite steps in the app development process already complete means that we are ready to begin coding immediately once the next round of funding is secured!


Phase 1 of coding of both Android and I-Phone operating systems will cost approximately $24000 CAD. Phase 2 & 3, which bring additional customization and safety features, which range in cost from $12000 CAD and up (depending on what features I request for my coders to include), will proceed as funds are made available to our coders and as new user needs are identified. Beyond the cost of coding, I would like to set aside $4000 CAD of the Empower App's project funds for increasing community awareness about this innovative, highly-accessible new resource. This will mean that those in greatest need will be familiarized with the toolbox of features now at their fingertips. 

I know that the Empower App WILL make a real difference in the fight to end domestic abuse. Your contribution and help in spreading the word about my project will allow me to offer the Empower App as a FREE download for everyone, so that financial cost will never be a barrier for victims of abuse who wish to use this valuable resource. Any additional funds raised beyond our target will be used to include further customization, security features and practical tools within the Empower App, and focus on building community awareness about the Empower App's launch.


Now, here is YOUR chance. 

Join us in taking a stand against Domestic Abuse!

Please consider making a financial contribution today. Truly, every dollar brings us that much closer to making this a reality. We are offering some lovely perks to our backers! Plus, there is the added warm-and-fuzzy feeling you will receive by knowing you gave a helping hand to the countless individuals experiencing abuse. 

The beauty of the technology that we all take for granted today is that we can use social media to connect with hundreds of people with the simple click of a button. This is all the more reason that there is no excuse why individuals who are experiencing abuse should feel isolated any longer. The Empower App is all about harnessing the power of technology in a new way, in order to increase user confidence and safety. Take just a moment, and help me make this resource available to those who have nowhere else to turn.

Share this video on your Facebook wall.

Tweet it to your followers!

Email Friends & Family

Please help us take a stand against abuse!

Phase 2 & 3, which bring additional customization and safety features, which range in cost from $12000 CAD and up (depending on what features I request for my coders to include), will proceed as funds are made available to our coders and as new user needs are identified. Beyond the cost of coding, I would like to set aside $4000 CAD of the Empower App's project funds for increasing community awareness about this innovative, highly-accessible new resource. This will mean that those in greatest need will be familiarized with the toolbox of features now at their fingertips. I know that the Empower App WILL make a real difference in the fight to end domestic abuse. Your contribution and help in spreading the word about my project will allow me to offer the Empower App as a FREE download for everyone, so that financial cost will never be a barrier for victims of abuse who wish to use this valuable resource. Any additional funds raised beyond our target will be used to include further customization, security features and practical tools within the Empower App, and focus on building community awareness about the Empower App's launch.Now, here is YOUR chance. Join us in taking a stand against Domestic Abuse!Please consider making a financial contribution today. Truly, every dollar brings us that much closer to making this a reality. We are offering some lovely perks to our backers! Plus, there is the added warm-and-fuzzy feeling you will receive by knowing you gave a helping hand to the countless individuals experiencing abuse. The beauty of the technology that we all take for granted today is that we can use social media to connect with hundreds of people with the simple click of a button. This is all the more reason that there is no excuse why individuals who are experiencing abuse should feel isolated any longer. The Empower App is all about harnessing the power of technology in a new way, in order to increase user confidence and safety. Take just a moment, and help me make this resource available to those who have nowhere else to turn.

Share this video on your Facebook wall.
Tweet it to your followers!
Email Friends & Family
Please help us take a stand against abuse!

story:
Turn the telly on at RideStaffs 2016

Hi, I'm Paul and I organise RideStaffs, an annual cycling festival in my home town in Staffordshire. This event has 2 pro races and 2 sportives based in the beautiful grounds of Shugborough Hall. We hope to welcome you to our event as a rider, spectator or both across the weekend of July 1-3 this year. We'd also like your help in making something special happen this year that we've never been able to do before - live pictures of our bike races on a big screen. 

We've already booked a big screen for the venue across the 3 days of RideStaffs 2016 and we'll be showing TV coverage of the Tour de France for spectators and riders on Saturday and Sunday. We also have Cyclevox on site on Friday and Saturday at the festival shooting coverage for British Cycling to show on Eurosport the week after the festival. 
What we'd like you to do is help us to connect those 2 things. 
There are a few pieces of technology that we need to fund to get the pictures Cyclevox shoot live to our big screen. We've prioritised the things that will make the biggest impact on your viewing experience and the more we raise, the better it gets. 
So, it goes like this:
£1000 gets us 1 wireless camera. 
£500 more gets us a camera on the finish line along with all the rigging and camera operator to work it.  
£500 on top of that gets a second static camera at 200m to go with a camera operator and rigging to the screen. 
This project is about making the bike race that you come to watch bigger and better than ever before. With your help we can make our great little bike race a great big evening of entertainment for hundreds of cycling fans like you. 
The Perks:
Every little helps with this one. If everyone who comes to the event donates the price of a coffee or a pint of beer, we can do everything we've outlined above. So we've made it super simple to get involved:
£1 - Sees your name on the big screen. We'll make a wall of benefactors and show all their names at regular intervals over the course of the weekend 
£5 - See's your face on our wall. Like the name wall, but a picture of your lovely face for everyone to look upon with gratitude for the amazing experience you've helped create
£25 - Sponsor a lap of one of our races. We'll put your name and a pic of you (or someone you've gifted this to) on the screen and our commetators will let the crowds know that "This lap was brought to you by...."
and if you can't afford to contribute? Help us get the word out by sharing this page and pointing people at ridestaffs.co.uk so we can get more sign ups for our sportive rides and more spectators down to the event. This is really a case of the more the merrier. It's going to be a great weekend of cycling at Shugborough whatever happens, but you have the chance to say that you helped to make it awesome!

story:
Ghostick is the world’s first patented Mobile Case that sticks virtually everywhere

Ghostick is a mobile device accessory that allows you to use your device hands free. Our current primary focus is on producing protective cases for smartphones and tablets, namely through our flagship product, The Ghostick.  The Ghostick delivers all of the protective qualities that the market leading cases do, but also delivers something that they don’t – added functionality.  While current solutions only protect devices, ours is made with a unique and patented suction cup insert that allows for full hands-free use of a tablet or smartphone. Your device and its camera’s full potential and functionality are unlocked with the Ghostick Case.


  

Designs Ready for Production:

iPhone:  6/6S - 6+/6S+ - 7/7S - 7plus/7S+


                    


Why Ghostick Needs You?

  • With your support on this campaign we will be able to recommence production, start manufacturing the newer phone models listed above and expand our product into the tablet world. e.g. iPad/iPad Mini-Surface-Samsung 

  • Your support will also allow us to finalize our designs and fulfill our inventory. Finally, making it possible to get this product in your hands. With manufacturing in place we anticipate having this product ready to ship in 6 months. 

Utility Patent # US 9,124,350 B2 

  • We are overwhelmed with the enormous amount of people who love this product. The Ghostick Case is in high demand for the newer models and with your help and support we will be able to accomplish this goal and make The Ghostick Case available to everyone.  


Emails We Receive Daily: 

Dear Ghostick, 

My name is Shelby Nunn and Iv'e had your Ghostick case since you first released it. I just upgraded my phone to the 6+ and can't live without my Ghostick Case. Please, please, please let me know when the new case comes out for the iPhone 6+ so I can buy it ASAP.  

P.S. I think you should send Kylie Jenner and Khloe Kardashian one of your cases. They constantly have trouble putting their phone places when taking video for their app and Ghostick would solve all their problems! :)

Your Biggest Fan, 

Shelby Nunn

                    


Ghostick At A Glance

The full Ghostick Case is comprised of two components. The first is the outer shell, which serves as the protective element of the case. The second is the suction cup insert, which contains multiple suction points and fits firmly inside the outer shell – providing that valuable added functionality. Suction cup inserts can be removed easily when needed and quickly switched out for other colors.


  • Mix & Match your favorite Colors 
  • Match your school colors
  • Trade inserts with your friends for a new look
  • Customize it to your favorite outfit 
  • Represent your sports team
  • Add a Ghosticker to personalize your case e.g. below
  • The possibilities are endless


  All New Ghosticker Concept

We are always thinking of new innovative ways to make Ghostick better that ever and with our new Ghosticker concept you can stick a personalized picture to your case and still have the added functionality of Sticking It Everywhere.  


                   

The Press Loves Ghostick

Since our official launch at the Newsday Headquarters in Long Island, NY Ghostick has been turning heads with what it can do. One of the writers said "It's really one of the coolest cases I've ever seen and it really works!" LI Business News

Ghostick In The News

                    


Video Credit Newsday LI:  

Video Credit: NBC Today Show

More Ghostick Videos

                    


Thousands of Uses


Working Professionals: Sometimes it's hard to stay off our phones. Ghostick solves that problem by allowing the phone to stick to your PC or laptop while you continue your work on being an entrepreneur 

Motorist: Most people do not have GPS in their cars, but 98% of the world has a smartphone. Ghostick gives drivers a safe way to use hands free GPS without looking down at their phone

Kids: Like baseball cards, Ghostick inserts can be traded with your friends to make your case look different every time

City Commuters: Stick Ghostick to the window next to you on your train, plane, or automobile and listen to your favorite music or watch your favorite movie 

Shower: Love to listen to the news or music in the shower? Now you can stick your Ghostick on the mirror or tile and get your day started

Travelers: Mom, Dad!!! Are we there yet? Are we there yet? Tired of hearing that? Now you can stick Ghostick to the window and keep your kids entertained for hours on those long trips

Athletes: Need to record a video when your training alone or in the gym? Its hard to record a video when your phone is on the ground. Not anymore! Use Ghostick to capture your best training moments. 

Musicians:  Love to play the guitar or a musical instrument? Now you can stick Ghostick to your instrument and record while you jam out

Selfies: We live in a visual world and nothing is more popular than #selfies. Ghostick lets you capture the very best selfies and group photos when no one is around to take your picture  


                   


There's An APP too...

Description: 
The Ghostick App is a photo capturing and video recording app that has expanded features allowing for the uploading of pics and videos to various social media sites. Timers, delays and a one hundred photo picture capture limit makes The Ghostick App one of a kind. A video record selection lets you set the amount of time you wish to record, and a timer lets you set the delay before the video capture is initiated. A myriad of filters have been incorporated so the user can post process the captured image.

This app can be used in conjunction with the actual Ghostick product. The only iPhone case that sticks www.ghostick.com or as an independent camera app with enhanced features. Extremely useful, simple to use and it's FREE...


Download The Ghostick App FREE


Features:

  • Allows you to take up to 100 pics with a single snap
  • Record hands-free video's while using your Ghostick Case
  • Works simultaneously with your Ghostick Case e.g. Group selfies 
  • Upload right to Instagram, Twitter or Facebook
  • Has great new filters and instantly saves to your camera roll
  • Lets you set a timer in between photos so you can get in the right pose
  • And it's FREE... 

                   


    How We Plan On Using




How we plan on using the Funds in detail:

  • Molds: With manufacturing in place we will quickly open molds for the iPhone 6 |6+ and new iPhone 7 and begin manufacturing right away. $15,000
  • Inventory: This is a major part of our company, having inventory stock for everyone to enjoy this great product We will have inventory for levels fulfilled. $15,000

  • Packaging & Presentation: Complete
  • Web & App Development: Complete
  • Marketing: Complete
  • Personnel: Complete
  • Working Capital: Complete


                    



                     



Our Portfolio:

  • 10 apps in the Apple Store
  • 3 in development Mode 
  • 6 Websites Completed 
  • 2 Websites In development Mode
  • 7 Utility Patents and 5 Patent Pending
  • 4 Consumer Products in development
  • 2 Design Patents 
  • 2 Products to Market

                     


We Need Your Support: 

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our awesome Ghostick Cases, but sharing the story with a friend.  Indiegogo is an amazing platform that allows entrepreneurs like us to live the American Dream . 

We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  We hope through the use of social media and the various platforms available today, we can drive enough outside traffic to this campaign page which will result in us reaching our funding goal.  If you could do something as simple as tweeting about our page, or just liking our Facebook and Instagram page, it can really go a long way. 

                                 

                                   facebook        twitter       Instagram     YouTube

                      


To Everyone: 

We sincerely thank everyone for their support and contribution. We are extremely passionate about Ghostick and have been working hard on this product from the day we created it. We have yet to meet anyone who doesn't truly love this product. So on behalf of everyone here at Ghostick, we sincerely thank you and with your help we hope we can make this product available to everyone very soon. 

                  

For more info 

Contact us at info@ghostick.com for more information, business plan, financials and other information. 

Thank you,

story:
[中文介紹]  [中文贊助說明]



​FAQs

  • Yes, iDAC iOS can using for any iPhone 5S, 6S, 6S +,7S,7S+ / iPad lightning / iPod touch only. 
  • Yes, iDAC Android can using for Android 5.0 system and Later.
  • Yes, iDAC Android can using for Mac and PC, PC needed to download Driver from XMOS at first.
  • No. iDAC iOS can't use for Android & PC, iDAC Android can't use for iOS.
  • Yes, Backers can buy the Apple Lightning & Micro USB OTG signal line from SONICWAVE company.
  • Yes, iDAC using Hi-Fi DAC ES9018K2M and AMP SABRE9601K, to ensure sound quality higher than mobile and another u Headphone Amp.
  • No, Can't charge the phone during using iDAC.
  • iDAC output can attach any 16-300 ohm Earphones and Headphones.
  • No, iDAC haven't Headset function.
  • No, iDAC Android can't use Type C.

Yes, iDAC Android can using for Android 5.0 system and Later.

No. iDAC iOS can't use for Android & PC, iDAC Android can't use for iOS.


Yes, Backers can buy the Apple Lightning & Micro USB OTG signal line from SONICWAVE company.

No, Can't charge the phone during using iDAC.

No, iDAC haven't Headset function.


No, iDAC Android can't use Type C.
